scn scBrotherhoodSoldierComaScript
short setRestrainedDoOnce short hasPatientBeenHealed short menuType ; Value 0 is equal to the not interacted with Darius menu, Value 1 is equal to the menu when you have interacted with Darius
Begin Gamemode if (setRestrainedDoOnce != 1) scComaREF.EquipItem OutfitWasteland01 scComaREF.SetRestrained 1 set setRestrainedDoOnce to 1 endif End
begin onactivate short button if (hasPatientBeenHealed != 1) if(SCHSQuest.hasPlayerInteractedWithDarius == 1) showmessage SCComaMessage set menuType to 1 else showmessage SCComaMessageNotInteractedWithDoctor set menuType to 0 endif endif end
begin menumode set button to getbuttonpressed if(button==0) if (menuType == 1) setobjectivecompleted SCHSQuest 10 1 setobjectivedisplayed SCHSQuest 20 1 setstage SCHSQuest 20 set hasPatientBeenHealed to 1 player.rewardxp 50 endif endif
if(button==1) if (menuType == 1) setobjectivecompleted SCHSQuest 10 1 setobjectivedisplayed SCHSQuest 20 1 Setstage SCHSQuest 20 set hasPatientBeenHealed to 1 player.rewardxp 60 endif endif end

scn SCElderautoquest
short speaking
short hasPlayerTalkedToElder short hasPlayerAcceptedAllQuests short hasPlayerAcceptedQuartermasterQuest short hasPlayerAcceptedHeadScribeQuest short hasPlayerAcceptedHeadPaladinQuest
Begin Gamemode if(hasPlayerAcceptedQuartermasterQuest == 1 && hasPlayerAcceptedHeadScribeQuest == 1 && hasPlayerAcceptedHeadPaladinQuest == 1) set hasPlayerAcceptedAllQuests to 1 endif End
Begin Gamemode if (hasPlayerAcceptedAllQuests == 1) scTakeAllQuestsDoor.unlock endif End

scn SCElderTriggerScript
short eldertrigger
Begin OnTriggerEnter player
if (eldertrigger == 0) JamesonREF.RemoveFromFaction PlayerFaction JamesonREF.RemoveFromFaction DontTazeMeBroFaction JamesonREF.AddToFaction BrotherhoodSteelFaction 1 JamesonREF.AddToFaction ArmorBrotherhoodSteelFaction 1 JamesonREF.AddToFaction HVBrotherhoodKnightFaction 1 set SCElderDialogue.speaking to 1 set eldertrigger to 1 endif end

scn SCHSQuestAdvance
Begin Gamemode
if (getstage SCHSQuest >= 10) if (player.getitemcount DocAbsinthe >= 1) setobjectivecompleted SCHSQuest 10 1 setobjectivedisplayed SCHSQuest 30 1 endif endif end

scn SCSecondQuestScript
Begin Gamemode
if getobjectivecompleted SCSecondQuest 10 == 1
if getobjectivecompleted SCSecondQuest 20 == 1

setobjectivedisplayed SCSecondQuest 50 1
endif
endif
endif
end

begin OnTriggerEnter Player setstage SCLastQuest 30 end

scn scMutantsClear
short dealtWithDeterrentAndDeterrentAlive short isTheDeterrentDead short inComputerRoom short mutantDeadCompleted = 0 short objectiveCompleted = 0
Begin Gamemode if (scTheLeaderRef.getDead == 1) && (mutantDeadCompleted == 0) setstage SCLastQuest 68 setobjectivecompleted SCLastQuest 60 1 setobjectivedisplayed SCLastQuest 68 1 setobjectivedisplayed SCLastQuest 62 0 set mutantDeadCompleted to 1 SCDawnSMRouteREF.disable SCPaladinREF1.disable SCPaladinREF2.disable SCPaladinREF3.disable SCPaladinREF4.disable scMidFloorElevatorREF.unlock endif
if (player.getItemCount SCComputerroom >= 1) setstage SCLastQuest 70 setobjectivecompleted SCLastQuest 68 1 setobjectivedisplayed SCLastQuest 70 1 endif
if (SCDawnSMRouteREF.getDead == 1) && (SCPaladinREF1.getDead == 1) && (SCPaladinREF2.getDead == 1) && (SCPaladinREF3.getDead == 1) && (SCPaladinREF4.getDead == 1) && (objectiveCompleted == 0) setstage SCLastQuest 66 setobjectivecompleted SCLastQuest 62 1 setobjectivecompleted SCLastQuest 64 1 setobjectivedisplayed SCLastQuest 66 1 set objectiveCompleted to 1 SetEssential SCSMBoss 1 endif
end

scn scBrotherhoodWeaponsCrateInteractionScript
short button short screenNumber ; 0 = Root Menu ; 1 = Non-Root Menu short crateSuccessfullyLifted
Begin OnActivate if (getobjectivedisplayed SCQMGuns 20 != 1) setstage SCQMGuns 20 setobjectivecompleted SCQMGuns 10 1 setobjectivedisplayed SCQMGuns 20 1 endif showmessage scBrotherhoodWeaponsCrateInvestigateMenuMessage set screenNumber to 0 End
begin Gamemode set button to getbuttonpressed if (button == 0) if (screenNumber == 0) showmessage scBrotherhoodWeaponsCrateLiftLowStrength set screenNumber to 1 endif if (screenNumber == 1) if (crateSuccessfullyLifted != 1) showmessage scBrotherhoodWeaponsCrateInvestigateMenuMessage set screenNumber to 0 endif endif endif if (button == 1) if (screenNumber == 0) showmessage scBrotherhoodWeaponsCrateLiftHighStrength set screenNumber to 1 set crateSuccessfullyLifted to 1 set SCQMGuns.hasPlayerPickedUpGuns to 1 setstage SCQMGuns 30 setobjectivecompleted SCQMGuns 20 1 setobjectivedisplayed SCQMGuns 30 1 scBrotherhoodWeaponsCrateRef.disable endif endif end

scn scBeerTronCharacterScript
short isBeerTronActive
begin onLoad if (isBeerTronActive == 0) ; I'm currently "off" ; make me unconscious so I don't play sounds setUnconscious 1 endif end

scn scBeerTronTeleportScript
short isBeerTronLiftingWeapons float timer short hasFadedIn short hasFadedOut short controlsReenabled
Begin Gamemode
if(isBeerTronLiftingWeapons == 1) if(hasFadedOut != 1) ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackPermanent set hasFadedOut to 1 endif if(controlsReenabled != 1 || hasFadedIn != 1) set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed if (timer >= 5 && hasFadedIn != 1) RemoveImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackPermanent scBeertronRef.disable ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeInFromBlack2sISFX set hasFadedIn to 1 endif if (timer >= 11 && controlsReenabled != 1) EnablePlayerControls set controlsReenabled to 1 endif endif endif
End

ESP.TRADUIT: 风暴城枪支商店钥匙

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mayes' Key
ESP.TRADUIT: 梅耶斯的钥匙

ESP.ORIGINAL: Elevator Key
ESP.TRADUIT: 电梯钥匙

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mayor Office Key
ESP.TRADUIT: 市长办公室钥匙

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rare Absinthe
ESP.TRADUIT: 稀有苦艾酒

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nuka-Cola Victory
ESP.TRADUIT: 核子可乐胜利版

ESP.ORIGINAL: One Last Job
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后一项工作

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Courier Six,
Come to the enclosed co-ordinates. I have a job for you.
Jameson
ESP.TRADUIT:
六号邮差
请到所附坐标处来，我有份工作给你。
- 詹姆森

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shipment
ESP.TRADUIT: 运输

ESP.ORIGINAL: 5x Gatling Lasers 15x Laser Rifles 8x Plasma Rifles 2x Tri-Beam Laser Rifles
ESP.TRADUIT: 5 x 镭射加特林 15 x 镭射步枪 8 x 等离子步枪 2 x 三发镭射步枪

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stupid machine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 愚蠢的机器。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
That big stupid machine down on the bottom floor. It keeps trying to talk to me. I tried to break it but screen would not smash. It would not shut up. I found the key though. I managed to lock the door. Can't hear it anymore. Good.
Johnny
ESP.TRADUIT:
楼下那台又大又蠢的机器，它一直想跟我说话。我试图打破它，但屏幕不碎，它不会闭嘴。不过我找到钥匙了，我设法把门锁上了，再也听不见了。很好。
- 强尼

ESP.ORIGINAL: Robots got out
ESP.TRADUIT: 机器人出来了

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fucking commie bastards doomed us all. Those spineless fucks in the government let them push too far and look where we are. If only we had a real right wing government we wouldn't be in this mess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的共产主义混蛋毁了我们所有人。政府的那些没骨气的混蛋让他们走得太远，看看我们的处境，如果我们有一个真正的右翼政府，我们就不会陷入这样的困境。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stealth Boys
ESP.TRADUIT: 隐身小子

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guard these stealth boys with your lives. We need more! Those brotherhood roasters might have some in their shiny base. We attack come next week. Training drills start tomorrow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用你们的生命来保护这些隐身小子，我们需要更多！那些兄弟会的烤炉他们闪亮的基地里可能有一些。我们下周进攻，训练演习明天开始。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn Hank!
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的汉克！

ESP.ORIGINAL: That redneck fuck came in my store and tried to sell me propane. If he does it again then he's getting barred.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个混蛋乡巴佬跑到我店里想卖丙烷给我。如果他再这样做，他就会被禁止进入。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they try to shake me down again...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们再想勒索我...

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've tinkered with this here lil' shotgun. Now has double barrels. If those bastards try to shake me down again they're getting a face full o' buckshot I tells ya.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对这把小霰弹枪进行了修补，现在是双筒的了。如果那些混蛋再想勒索我，我告诉你，他们只会得到满脸的弹丸。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Evacuation
ESP.TRADUIT: 撤离

ESP.ORIGINAL: Things are getting tense in the war. People are starting to worry. Apparently we're gonna evacuate through the sewers if we reach DEFCON 1. Starting to get scared.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战争局势越来越紧张，人们开始担心了。显然，一旦进入一级戒备状态我们就会从下水道撤离，开始害怕了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Left Behind
ESP.TRADUIT: 留守

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently I don't count as key personnel. Should have known. A simple liquor store owner apparently doesn't count as much as some hot shot scientist. Fuck those nerds. I'll be fine here with my protectron. I'm sure there won't be a nuclear holocaust...
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然我不算关键人员，我早该知道的，一个普通的酒店老板显然没有一个炙手可热的科学家重要。去他妈的那些书呆子，我和我的保护者在这里会很好。我相信不会有核毁灭...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shipment
ESP.TRADUIT: 运输

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uranium Ore x250 tonnes Steel x 50 tonnes Iron Ore 25 tonnes t51 Power Armor x60 Fatman x10 Circuitry x 10
ESP.TRADUIT: 铀矿石 X 250吨 钢材 X 50吨 铁矿石 X 25吨 t51动力装甲 X 60 胖子 X 10 电路 X 10

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uranium
ESP.TRADUIT: 铀

ESP.ORIGINAL: Poseidon are wanting a lot of uranium ore. Even for a power plant that is a lot of uranium. No wonder there is such a shortage elsewhere in the country if whatever they're doing in there is the government's priority.
ESP.TRADUIT: 海神正在寻找大量的铀矿。即使对于一个发电厂来说，这也是大量的铀。如果他们在那里做的任何事情都是政府的优先事项，那就难怪这个国家的其他地方会有如此短缺。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't Enter Unless You Have Specific Training
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非你受过专门训练，否则不要进入

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're breeding chameleons mixed with a new virus sent by West Tek. Trained officials only.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们正在培育混有西部科技公司送来的新病毒的变色龙。仅限受过训练的官员。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't Enter Unless You're A Trained Official
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非你是受过训练的官员，否则不要进入

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Raul,
Rhonda made me angry so I threw this. Now it doesn't seem to work.
Please fix.
ESP.TRADUIT: 劳尔， 朗达让我很生气，所以我把这玩意丢了出去。现在它似乎不能用了。 帮忙修一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hate this job
ESP.TRADUIT: 我讨厌这份工作

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Man, I am so lonely down here. Sucks being the only engineer in this tunnel. The chances of this place actually being used are so slim. I'll have to catch up with ma over the phone sometime. It is still a comfy gig despite it being an awkward conversation killer.
That's gonna be great when she asks where I work and I say I may or may not be working in an emergency tunnel in the event that Poseidon blow the whole damn city up. Yeah great....
ESP.TRADUIT:
伙计，我在这里好孤独，作为这条隧道里唯一的工程师真糟糕，这个地方被使用的可能性微乎其微。我得找个时间和我妈打个电话，这仍然是一个舒适的工作，尽管它是一个尴尬的谈话杀手。
要是她问我在哪里工作，我说我可能在紧急隧道工作也可能不在，万一海神把整个城市都炸了那就太好了。是的，很棒...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Insomnia
ESP.TRADUIT: 失眠

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, I can't believe I'm expected to sleep down here. They say its necessary for the safety of all of the citizens here. No-one on the surface can find out about these tunnels apart from Poseidon Energy employees. I feel like telling him to try getting some shut eye himself when there's a subway transporting materials from Las Vegas every few hours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，真不敢相信我居然要睡在这下面，他们说这对这里所有公民的安全来说是必要的。除了海神能源的员工，地面上没人能发现这些隧道。我真想告诉他，每隔几个小时就有一辆地铁从拉斯维加斯运来物资，他自己也试着睡一会儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Bastards did it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杂种们干的。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Those disgusting commie bastards finally did it or was it those snakes in government? Does it even matter anymore? We're all doomed. We're outside the blast radius. The reds didn't seem to know about this place. Thankfully we're alive but maybe a better fate would've been to get wiped out in the initial blast.
The boss says the plan is to wait here while we can but I can't see that lasting. People have families and we need to know what happened to them.
ESP.TRADUIT:
那些恶心的共产党混蛋终于做到了，还是那些政府中的内鬼？这还重要吗？我们都完蛋了。我们在爆炸范围之外，赤匪似乎不知道这个地方。幸运的是，我们还活着，但如果在最初的爆炸中被消灭，也许是更好的命运。
老板说我们的计划是在这里等着，但我不认为这能持久。人们都有家庭，我们需要知道他们发生了什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jones
ESP.TRADUIT: 琼斯

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to keep a tighter leash on my officers. Jones is starting to fish around again. I've already warned him but he won't listen. Soon I won't be able to protect him. Goddammit, this country's security or a man I've known my whole life?! I just dunno...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得对我的警员们严加管教。琼斯又开始四处打探了，我已经警告过他了，但他就是不听。很快我就保护不了他了，该死，是这个国家的安全还是一个我认识一辈子的人！我真的不知道...

ESP.ORIGINAL: High military presence...
ESP.TRADUIT: 高度军事存在...

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Moving here was best for the family. Since it's so exclusive, crime rate stats tend to be low. Makes this job a cakewalk. Most of the time you're just making sure some rich kid doesn't get in too much trouble after one too many beers.
The military presence seems a lot higher than it should be for a place like this. They always seem to congregate around Sunstorm Power Plant.
ESP.TRADUIT:
搬到这里对我们家来说是最好的。由于它是如此的高档，犯罪率数据往往很低，让这份工作变得轻而易举。大多数时候，你只是在确保某个富二代喝了太多啤酒后不会惹上什么麻烦。
在这样的地方，军事存在似乎比应有的要多得多，他们似乎总是聚集在太阳风暴发电厂附近。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talked with the mayor about the disappearences...
ESP.TRADUIT: 和市长讨论了失踪事件...

ESP.ORIGINAL:
There's been some disappearances around that damn powerplant. There's something going on there. I think the military has caught some people skulking around and done lord knows what to them.
Talked with the mayor today and he wouldn't open up. Its good that I have other methods at my disposal than interrogation. Gonna try and get a warrant for that office of his.
ESP.TRADUIT:
那个该死的发电厂附近发生了一些失踪事件，那里一定发生了什么。我想军方已经抓到了一些人，鬼知道对他们做了什么。
今天和市长谈过了，他不肯开口。好在除了审讯我还有其他办法，我要去申请他办公室的搜查令。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Warrant refused...
ESP.TRADUIT: 搜查令被拒...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gutierrez refused to give me a warrant. He isn't the same man anymore. To hell with it. There's something shady going on in this town. The captain has a spare key in his desk to the mayor's office. I might break in tonight to figure out what's going on. Need to make sure to put it back when I'm finished.
ESP.TRADUIT: 古铁雷斯拒绝给我搜查令，他不再是以前的那个人了，见鬼去吧。这个城镇发生了一些见不得人的事，上尉的办公桌里有把市长办公室的备用钥匙，我今晚可能会闯进去弄清楚到底怎么回事。我得确保我用完后把它放回去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Re: Reply to me Frank
ESP.TRADUIT: 回复：请回复我，弗兰克

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Frank, its been two weeks since you last called and you haven't answerered your phone. Me and the kids are worried. Please respond for the sake of our marriage.
Jessica
ESP.TRADUIT:
弗兰克，距离你上次来电话已经两个星期了，你还没有接电话，我和孩子们都很担心。为了我们的婚姻，请回复。
- 杰西卡

ESP.ORIGINAL: Things are going smootly
ESP.TRADUIT: 事情进展顺利

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Things seem to be going smoothly. The boys in the lab have already started developing new tech. Just getting the citizens settled into their new homes. I mean they paid top dollar to get here. They deserve the best of service. Although I have no idea how those damn rednecks in the liquour store managed to set up shop here. If they hadn't got stinking rich on account of that damn lottery they wouldn't be here if it were up to me.
Either way, I've allowed Poseidon to place those speakers in the resident's homes. They seem none the wiser. This will allow us to build a language model for the machine. It can learn how to speak like an American with a large enough data set. God, could you imagine if it somehow sounded from California and Boston at the same time? That'd at least give the boys in the lab some entertainment.
Should allow us to develop weapons here right in plain sight without the reds ever suspecting that there's a military operation here.
ESP.TRADUIT:
事情似乎进展得很顺利，实验室里的男孩们已经开始开发新技术了。他们正在让市民们适应他们的新家，我的意思是，他们花了很多钱来这里，他们应该得到最好的服务。虽然我不知道那些酒店的乡巴佬是怎么在这里开店的，如果他们没有因为那该死的彩票而发大财的话，如果由我来决定，他们就不会在这里了。
不管怎样，我已经允许海神在居民家中安置了这些扬声器，他们似乎一点也不知道。这将允许我们为机器建立语言模型，通过足够大的数据集，它可以学会如何像美国人一样说话。天啊，你能想象如果这声音同时从加州和波士顿传来会怎样吗？至少能让实验室里的伙计们开心一下。
应该能让我们在众目睽睽之下研发武器而不让赤匪怀疑这里有军事行动。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stealth tech developed
ESP.TRADUIT: 研发出隐形技术

ESP.ORIGINAL:
They did it! Now if the worst comes to the worst, the reds won't be able to find us no matter what. If DEFCON goes to any value other than five, the city automatically creates a sandstorm to camouflage the city. Marvelous isn't it? Good luck seeing what we're up to you pinko bastards! I've explained to the citizens of the town that sandstorms happen more often in this part of the desert due to natural phenomena. I got one of the scientists to throw some jargon at them and they seem to have bought it.
This could be the place to move the President if we keep making breakthroughs like this.
ESP.TRADUIT:
他们成功了！现在，如果最坏的情况发生，赤匪也无论如何都找不到我们。如果警戒级别降到5以外的任何值，城市就会自动制造一场沙尘暴来伪装城市。很神奇，不是吗？祝你们好运，能看到我们在做什么，你们这些共产主义杂碎！我已经向镇上的居民解释过，由于自然现象，沙尘暴在沙漠的这一地区发生的频率更高。我让一个科学家向他们扔了一些术语，他们似乎相信了。
如果我们不断取得这样的突破，这里可能会是转移总统的地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: New project...
ESP.TRADUIT: 新项目...

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm informed that the scientists are developing a new type of nuclear weapon up at Sunstorm Powerplant. I've heard they've even managed to harness the power of Artifical Intelligence in the process. Another step towards peace!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说科学家们正在太阳风暴发电厂研发一种新型核武器。我听说他们甚至在这个过程中成功地利用了人工智能的力量。迈向和平的又一步！

ESP.ORIGINAL: That detectives been snooping around...
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个侦探一直在四处窥探...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Officer Jones has been snooping around my office. I know it. Got a picture of the bastard when he tried to hack into my terminal. I've notified the army about this. They'll deal with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 琼斯警官一直在我的办公室周围窥探，我知道。当他试图入侵我的终端时，拍下了这个混蛋的照片。我已经通知了军方这件事，他们会处理他的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The reds launched
ESP.TRADUIT: 红军出动了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: The bastards did it. As far as we know Washington, Masachusetts, New York and California have all been wiped out. We're relatively safe here but something's weird at the power plant. The scientists aren't responding to my phone calls. I need to move and fast!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是那些混蛋干的。据我们所知，华盛顿、马萨诸塞、纽约和加州都被消灭了。我们在这里相对安全，但是发电厂有点奇怪，科学家们不接我电话。我得赶快行动！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Liqour Store Password
ESP.TRADUIT: 酒类商店密码

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Bill,
We got that document back. Pretty sure that nut who owns the Gun Store tried to steal it. He was ranting and raving about you being part of some Chinese conspiracy. Let's hope that's not true otherwise the police might just disappear you like one of those old commie officers back in the day.
Anyway, you better change your password to something other than "beer123" otherwise someone will definitely be hacking that terminal of yours.
Oh and sorry, for making you meet the mayor to get this note. He's adamant that all mail goes through him. One of the rules for moving here I'm afraid.
Jones
ESP.TRADUIT:
比尔,
我们把文件拿回来了，我很确定枪店的老板想偷它。他大吼大叫说你是中国阴谋的一部分，让我们希望这不是真的，否则警察可能会像以前的老共产党官员一样让你消失。
无论如何，你最好把密码改成“beer123”以外的密码，否则肯定会有人入侵你的终端。
抱歉，让你去见市长拿这张纸条。他坚持所有的邮件都要经过他。这恐怕是搬来这里的规矩之一。
- 琼斯

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jameson Log Entry 1
ESP.TRADUIT: 詹姆森日志条目1

ESP.ORIGINAL:
It's been exciting to go out on my first real mission since the battle at Helios all those years ago. Tried getting into my power armor and it just didn't feel the same. They say it's like riding a bike (not like anyone I know has ever rode one) in that you never forget. Well, I beg to differ.
Anyway, no sign of our comrades other than the Brotherhood logo on the wall. It must have been them otherwise it's some sort of NCR trap. Can't be the latter surely with the NCR being so stretched.
This terminal mentions it is part of a "Crocketville" network. Never heard of anywhere like that on the west coast when I've looked at the pre-war maps. Pretty sure that's supposed to be in South Carolina and not Nevada. Maybe its the fabled Storm City that people have talked about in these parts. Has to be if our comrades decided to go there.
I tried getting in touch on all common frequencies but no response. Could be this radio is busted. I radioed back to Hidden Valley to request for backup. No idea if they've heard me. I'll wait for a couple of days to see if they show up.
ESP.TRADUIT:
自从多年前的太阳神一号战役后第一次执行真正的任务是很令人兴奋的。我试着穿上我的动力盔甲，但感觉不一样了。他们说，这就像骑自行车(我知道没有人骑过自行车)，你永远不会忘记。嗯，我不敢苟同。
总之，除了墙上的兄弟会标志，没有我们战友的标志。肯定是他们，否则就是某种NCR陷阱。不可能是后者，因为NCR人手也很紧张。
这个终端提到它是“科洛科维尔”网络的一部分。我在看战前的地图时，从来没有听说过西海岸有这个地方，我很确定那应该是在南卡罗来纳州，而不是内华达。也许这就是传说中的风暴之城，人们一直在谈论这些地区。如果我们的战友决定去那里，就必须去。
我试着联系所有的常用频率，但没有回应。可能这台无线电坏了。我用无线电呼叫隐谷请求支援，不知道他们有没有听到。我会等上几天看他们会不会来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Paladin Jameson Log 2
ESP.TRADUIT: 圣骑士詹姆森日志2

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Still nothing concrete for Hidden Valley. I tried again and I could hear McCann on the other end for sure. I'm guessing she could tell it was me. Hope so anyway.
I investigated more around here and there's an underground subway in the next room. With that carriage, this place is either how the residents entered the city or god forbid an emergency exit. With all the luggage and medical supplies left lying around here, I'm guessing it is the latter. You don't leave first aid kits lying around unless you need them.
ESP.TRADUIT:
还是没有隐谷的具体消息。我又试了一次，我可以很清楚地听到另一端是麦卡恩的声音，我猜她能认出是我。希望如此。
我在这附近又调查了一下，隔壁房间里有一条地铁。有了那条运输线路，这里要么是居民进入城市的地方要么是上帝禁止的紧急出口。这里到处都是行李和医疗用品，我猜是后者。除非你需要，否则不会把急救箱到处乱放。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Paladin Jameson Log Entry 3
ESP.TRADUIT: 圣骑士詹姆森日志条目3

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Saw a resident list on a network drive which listed a dossier with information about the people who came to live here. They seem to come from all over: California, New York, DC you name it. A large amount were academics. The pre-war government were looking for scientists, philosophers and the usual companies, who ruined the world tampering with technology they didn't understand, like West Tek and Poseidon Energy.
In a different dossier, one called Test Subjects (callous, right?) were people who seemed to work blue collar jobs. Construction/factory workers. Small business owners were included in the list too. What were they up to here?
ESP.TRADUIT:
我在网络驱动器上看到了一份居民名单，上面的档案里面有来这里居住的人的信息。他们似乎来自世界各地:加利福尼亚、纽约、华盛顿，应有尽有，其中很大一部分是学者。战前政府在寻找科学家，哲学家和普通公司，他们用自己不懂的技术破坏了世界，比如威斯科技和波塞冬能源公司。
在另一份档案中，一份名为“测试对象”(冷酷无情，对吧?)的是那些似乎从事蓝领工作的人。建筑/工厂工人。小企业主也榜上有名。他们在这里干什么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: GREETING
ESP.TRADUIT: 问好

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're the human who has been causing me so much trouble. You are evidently not part of the Brotherhood of Steel from what I can see...
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你就是那个给我带来这么多麻烦的人类。在我看来，你显然不是钢铁兄弟会的成员...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_GREETING_00035950_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brotherhood is obsessed with hoarding technology, and not progressing it. They are doomed to fail from their stagnancy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会痴迷于囤积技术，而不是推动技术进步。他们的停滞不前是注定要失败的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_GREETING_00035950_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now the question is, are you going to see past your prejudice or are you going to be blinded by it and try to kill me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在的问题是，你是要认清你的偏见，还是要被它所蒙蔽并试图杀死我？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_GREETING_00035950_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because I can guarantee you, unlike the others here I will not die so easily.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为我可以向你保证，我不会像其他人那样轻易死去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_GREETING_00035950_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return once you get rid of those vultures.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除掉那些秃鹫后再回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_GREETING_00035CB1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're back. I heard the combat downstairs. Are the invaders dealt with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回来了。我听到楼下的战斗了，入侵者被解决了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_GREETING_000381B4_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I'm busy at the moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我现在很忙。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Redding [0100A363] (mod) Quest : ([0100A356]SCBrotherhoodFirstEncounter) SCBrotherhoodFirstEncounter EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scBrotherhoodGuardVoiceType\SCBrotherh_GREETING_0000A357_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome back. I've heard you're helping us out. We don't normally trust anyone outside the chapter so you must be special.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回来。我听说你在帮我们，我们一般不相信分会以外的人，所以你一定很特别。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Redding [0100A363] (mod) Quest : ([0100A356]SCBrotherhoodFirstEncounter) SCBrotherhoodFirstEncounter EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scBrotherhoodGuardVoiceType\SCBrotherh_GREETING_00041DF7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope the Elder's made the right choice. Now, what can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望长老的选择是正确的。现在，我能为你做些什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Redding [0100A363] (mod) Quest : ([0100A356]SCBrotherhoodFirstEncounter) SCBrotherhoodFirstEncounter EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scBrotherhoodGuardVoiceType\SCBrotherh_GREETING_00041DF7_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're back. What can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回来了？我能为你做些什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Redding [0100A363] (mod) Quest : ([0100A356]SCBrotherhoodFirstEncounter) SCBrotherhoodFirstEncounter EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scBrotherhoodGuardVoiceType\SCBrotherh_GREETING_00041DF8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're lucky I personally know Paladin Jameson outsider. That man is a Brotherhood legend. If it wasn't for him you'd be a pile of ash right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你很幸运，我认识圣骑士詹姆森，外来者。那个人是兄弟会的传奇人物，如果不是他，你现在已经是一堆灰烬了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDialogue_GREETING_0000B3DD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess you responded to the radio broadcast. You must have thought it was a distress signal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你是对广播做出回应了，你一定以为那是求救信号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDialogue_GREETING_0000B3DD_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was a warning. They must have a jammer up in Sunstorm. Damn muties.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个警告，他们在太阳风暴中一定有一个干扰器。该死的变种人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDialogue_GREETING_0000B3DD_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set JamesonREF.IsFollowingJameson to 0 set JamesonREF.sandboxjameson1 to 0 set JamesonREF.sandboxjameson2 to 1 JamesonREF.SetPlayerTeammate 0 SetEssential SCPaladinJameson 0 JamesonREF.evp set SCElderDialogue.hasPlayerTalkedToElder to 1 scTakeAllQuestsDoor.SetOpenState 0 scTakeAllQuestsDoor.lock 255 scLadderREF.unlock
What do ya need kid?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要什么，小子？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDialogue_GREETING_0000B3E4_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who the hell are you? Can't you see I'm busy? If you're not here to help then get the hell out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底是谁？你没看到我很忙吗？如果你不是来帮忙的，那就给我滚出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C43E]SCHSGreeting) SCHSGreeting

ESP.ORIGINAL: startquest SCHSQuest
You're back. Make it quick, I'm incredibly busy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回来了。尽快吧，我非常忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C43E]SCHSGreeting) SCHSGreeting EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSGreeting_GREETING_0000C440_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're ready to hit the facility whenever you are kid. You got any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要你一到，我们随时准备攻击，孩子。你们有什么问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQuest_GREETING_0000C7B9_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for the help. For a minute, I didn't think we'd make it. But we're not done yet. We have to clear the upper floors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你的帮助，有那么一瞬间，我觉得我们挺不过来。但我们还没有结束，我们必须清空上层。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQuest_GREETING_0000E9BC_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The nightkin will be hiding there. Stay sharp, they could be lurking anywhere. We'll guard the door. The mutants might have reinforcements.
ESP.TRADUIT: 夜行族会躲在那里，保持警惕，他们可能潜伏在任何地方。我们守着门，变种人可能会有增援。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now go and kill yourself some muties.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在去杀几个变种人吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQuest_GREETING_0000E9BC_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted SCLastQuest 40 1 setobjectivedisplayed SClastQuest 50 1 SClift.unlock
So the battle is over. You'd think after everything, you humans would stop fighting fruitless wars.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么战斗结束了。我在想谁会赢，是造物主还是神秘的新种族。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_GREETING_0000FC60_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've all got a long way to go in that regard. I suppose not much has changed since the war.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你一进门我的问题就有了答案，我很惊讶你们这么长时间后还活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_GREETING_0000FC60_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even the super mutants that came and took this place from the Brotherhood have a lot to learn themselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尤其是在你们对自己造成了前所未有的破坏之后。很高兴知道至少有东西幸存了下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_GREETING_0000FC60_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apologies, I forgot to introduce myself. Usually that should come before the moral judgements of humanity as a species.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，很高兴见到你。我的代号是NDS-001。你是？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_GREETING_0000FC60_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can call me NDS-001. I brought you down here because I want to have a little chat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以叫我NDS-001。我带你来是因为我想跟你聊聊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_GREETING_0000FC60_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's start with your name. What can I call you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们从你的名字开始吧，我怎么称呼你？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_GREETING_0000FC60_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: scStormCityPowerPlantExteriorDoorREF.unlock
Looks like we did it kid. It looks like the mutants are finally scattering. What did that thing in there say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我们成功了，孩子，看起来变种人终于要散去了。里面那东西说了什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQuest_GREETING_0001033D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like we did it kid. It looks like the mutants are finally scattering. What did that that thing say in there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我们成功了，孩子，看起来变种人终于要散去了。刚才那个东西说了什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQuest_GREETING_0001033E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We had a bug in that room... I know exactly what you did. For all the men I've lost. You've gotta tell me why!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个房间里有个窃听器...我很清楚你做了什么。为了我失去的所有人，你必须告诉我为什么！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01039293] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQuest_GREETING_0001033F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, are the upper floors clear?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，上面的楼层是否安全？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [010381AE] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQuest_GREETING_000395FA_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Organism detected... Designation human. Engaging English voice module.
ESP.TRADUIT: 检测到有机体...指定为人类。适配英语语音模块。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_GREETING_00041E96_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Greetings human, this door will not open until the ongoing conflict has been resolved. This is to ensure the safety of both of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，人类，这扇门不会打开，直到持续的冲突被解决。这是为了确保我们双方的安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_GREETING_00041E96_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please stop the fighting and maybe we can talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请停止战斗，也许我们可以谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_GREETING_00041E96_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck in your future endeavours human.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人类，祝你未来的事业顺利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_GREETING_00041E9E_1.wav
NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome. I see you have the key. Come meet me further down the hall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎。我看到你有钥匙，到大厅那边来见我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_GREETING_00041EA2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return when the conflict has been resolved human.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冲突解决后再回来，人类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_GREETING_00041E99_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're the outsider everyone's talking about. I'm the quartermaster around here. If there's anything I can getcha, let me know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就是每个人都在谈论的外来者。我是这里的军需官，如果有什么我可以帮你的，让我知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scQuartermasterVoiceType\SCQM_GREETING_00000BA2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, if you're needing any weapons just let me know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，如果你需要任何武器，请告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scQuartermasterVoiceType\SCQM_GREETING_00000BA3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're back. You should head back and speak to Scribe McCann. She'll want to make sure we're safe and sound.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回来了。你应该回去和麦卡恩学士谈谈，她肯定想确保我们平安无事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [01041EAF] (mod) Quest : ([01041EB1]scJamesonAfterQuestDialogue) scJamesonAfterQuestDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\scJamesonA_GREETING_00041EB2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You did a good job out there representing the Brotherhood. It's not always easy choosing the best way to deal with technology.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你代表兄弟会做得很好。选择应对科技的最佳方式并不总是那么容易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [01041EAF] (mod) Quest : ([01041EB1]scJamesonAfterQuestDialogue) scJamesonAfterQuestDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\scJamesonA_GREETING_00041EB2_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Least it's out the hands of those mutants. Before you go, is there anything else I can do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少不会落入那些变种人之手。在你走之前，还有什么需要我帮忙的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [01041EAF] (mod) Quest : ([01041EB1]scJamesonAfterQuestDialogue) scJamesonAfterQuestDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\scJamesonA_GREETING_00041EB2_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome back. How can I help you this time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回来。这次我能帮你什么忙吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [01041EAF] (mod) Quest : ([01041EB1]scJamesonAfterQuestDialogue) scJamesonAfterQuestDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\scJamesonA_GREETING_00041EB3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see you've managed to resolve the conflict. We should speak. Meet me in the Computer Room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你已经解决了冲突，我们应该谈谈。在电脑室等我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01041EA3] (ID) Quest : ([01041EA5]scTopFloorIntercomDialogue) scTopFloorIntercomDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\scTopFloor_GREETING_00041EA6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We should speak alone without your friends in Power Armor. They can enter the plant after we're finished.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们应该单独谈谈，别让你那些穿动力装甲的朋友来。他们可以在我们结束后进工厂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01041EA3] (ID) Quest : ([01041EA5]scTopFloorIntercomDialogue) scTopFloorIntercomDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\scTopFloor_GREETING_00041EA6_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: scStormCityPowerPlantExteriorDoorREF.lock 255
<The intercom remains eerily silent.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <对讲机保持着诡异的沉默>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01041EA3] (ID) Quest : ([01041EA5]scTopFloorIntercomDialogue) scTopFloorIntercomDialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Larry will keep us safe and get us one step closer to The Unity!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拉利会保护我们，让我们离同一更近一步！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Super Mutant Brute [01041DD0] (mod) NPC : Super Mutant Master [01041DCE] (mod) Quest : ([01041E84]scLarryGuardDialogue) Larry Generic Guard Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryGuardVoiceType02\scLarryGua_GREETING_00041E85_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't cross the Leader if you know what is good for you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你知道什么对你有好处，就不要违抗领军者！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Super Mutant Brute [01041DD0] (mod) NPC : Super Mutant Master [01041DCE] (mod) Quest : ([01041E84]scLarryGuardDialogue) Larry Generic Guard Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryGuardVoiceType01\scLarryGua_GREETING_00041E86_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you found green stuff? I haven't found any. Ever. Maybe it's a lie. Maybe we're wasting our time. We could be out killing...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你找到绿色的东西了吗？我还没有找到，总是，也许这是个谎言，也许我们是在浪费时间。我们可以杀死...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Super Mutant Brute [01041DD0] (mod) NPC : Super Mutant Master [01041DCE] (mod) Quest : ([01041E84]scLarryGuardDialogue) Larry Generic Guard Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryGuardVoiceType01\scLarryGua_GREETING_00041E87_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha! You talk a lot! Sound funny when you talk, like a stupid human. Ha ha ha ha ha!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈！你话太多了！你说话的时候听起来很滑稽，像个愚蠢的人类。哈哈哈哈哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Super Mutant Brute [01041DD0] (mod) NPC : Super Mutant Master [01041DCE] (mod) Quest : ([01041E84]scLarryGuardDialogue) Larry Generic Guard Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryGuardVoiceType01\scLarryGua_GREETING_00041E88_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome to Storm City human. This isn't a place for your kind. Although, I told Harry I would hear you out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎来到风暴城，人类，这不是适合你们这种人的地方。不过，我告诉过哈里我会听你说完的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry [01041D5C] (mod) Quest : ([01041DD7]scLarryDialogue) Larry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryVoiceType\scLarryDialogue_GREETING_00041DD8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a great deal of respect for him which is why you're not lying alongside those Brotherhood dogs in the fountain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很尊重他，所以你才没有和那些兄弟会的狗一起躺在喷泉里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry [01041D5C] (mod) Quest : ([01041DD7]scLarryDialogue) Larry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryVoiceType\scLarryDialogue_GREETING_00041DD8_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll probably end up telling you what I told him. We super mutants need to stand together and The Unity is the best chance of achieving that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可能会把我对他说的话告诉你。我们超级变种人需要团结起来，同一是实现这一目标的最佳机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry [01041D5C] (mod) Quest : ([01041DD7]scLarryDialogue) Larry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryVoiceType\scLarryDialogue_GREETING_00041DD8_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what you waiting for? Let's hear it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你还在等什么？让我们听听。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry [01041D5C] (mod) Quest : ([01041DD7]scLarryDialogue) Larry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryVoiceType\scLarryDialogue_GREETING_00041DD8_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome back human. Stick around much longer and I can't guarantee your safety. So tell me what it is you want and begone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回来，人类。再呆下去，我就不能保证你的安全了。告诉我你想要什么，然后离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry [01041D5C] (mod) Quest : ([01041DD7]scLarryDialogue) Larry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryVoiceType\scLarryDialogue_GREETING_00041DE0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caleb makes sure we're well fed. Mess with him and you mess with us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯勒确保我们吃得饱，惹他就是惹我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Super Mutant [01041D9B] (mod) NPC : Super Mutant [01041D9E] (mod) Quest : ([01041DBC]scCalebGuardDialogue) Caleb Super Mutant Guard Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCalebMeleeAllyVoiceType\scCalebGua_GREETING_00041DBD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Unity will make us all equal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 同一会使我们所有人平等。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Super Mutant [01041D9B] (mod) NPC : Super Mutant [01041D9E] (mod) Quest : ([01041DBC]scCalebGuardDialogue) Caleb Super Mutant Guard Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCalebMeleeAllyVoiceType\scCalebGua_GREETING_00041DBE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the future, there will be nothing but the super mutant!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在未来，只有超级变种人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Super Mutant [01041D9B] (mod) NPC : Super Mutant [01041D9E] (mod) Quest : ([01041DBC]scCalebGuardDialogue) Caleb Super Mutant Guard Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCalebMeleeAllyVoiceType\scCalebGua_GREETING_00041DBF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop staring human!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别盯着看了，人类！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Super Mutant [01041D9B] (mod) NPC : Super Mutant [01041D9E] (mod) Quest : ([01041DBC]scCalebGuardDialogue) Caleb Super Mutant Guard Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCalebMeleeAllyVoiceType\scCalebGua_GREETING_00041DC0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Harry is a nice mutant! The Leader is too scary!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈里是个不错的变种人！领军者太可怕了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Super Mutant Brute [01041D10] (mod) Quest : ([01041DB5]scHarryGuardGenericDialogue) Harry Guard Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryBodyguardVoiceType02\scHarryGua_GREETING_00041DB6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe we can get some Squirrel Stew tonight!
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我们今晚可以吃点松鼠炖肉！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Super Mutant Brute [01041D10] (mod) Quest : ([01041DB5]scHarryGuardGenericDialogue) Harry Guard Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryBodyguardVoiceType02\scHarryGua_GREETING_00041DB7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to go home!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想回家！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Super Mutant Brute [01041D10] (mod) Quest : ([01041DB5]scHarryGuardGenericDialogue) Harry Guard Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryBodyguardVoiceType02\scHarryGua_GREETING_00041DB8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those Brotherhood men want to kill us and all we want to do is find a nice place to live!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些兄弟会的人想杀了我们，而我们只想找个好地方生活！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Super Mutant Brute [01041D10] (mod) Quest : ([01041DB5]scHarryGuardGenericDialogue) Harry Guard Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryBodyguardVoiceType02\scHarryGua_GREETING_00041DB9_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kim will want to speak with you human! Do not keep her waiting!
ESP.TRADUIT: 金会想和你说话的，人类！别让她久等！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Super Mutant Brute [01041D8E] (mod) NPC : Super Mutant Master [01041D8C] (mod) NPC : Super Mutant Brute [01041D8D] (mod) Quest : ([01041DA8]scKimGuardsGenericDialogue) Kim Guard Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimGuardVoiceType01\scKimGuard_GREETING_00041DAC_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay the hell out of my tent human!
ESP.TRADUIT: 离我的帐篷远点，人类！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Super Mutant Brute [01041D8E] (mod) NPC : Super Mutant Master [01041D8C] (mod) NPC : Super Mutant Brute [01041D8D] (mod) Quest : ([01041DA8]scKimGuardsGenericDialogue) Kim Guard Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimGuardVoiceType01\scKimGuard_GREETING_00041DAD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go ahead and try something human! Give me a reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: 继续尝试吧，人类！给我个理由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Super Mutant Brute [01041D8E] (mod) NPC : Super Mutant Master [01041D8C] (mod) NPC : Super Mutant Brute [01041D8D] (mod) Quest : ([01041DA8]scKimGuardsGenericDialogue) Kim Guard Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimGuardVoiceType03\scKimGuard_GREETING_00041DAE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd be better off joining the Leader human. Once we rebuild the vats, you can be one of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好加入领军者，人类。一旦我们重建了VATS，你就可以成为我们中的一员了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Super Mutant Brute [01041D8E] (mod) NPC : Super Mutant Master [01041D8C] (mod) NPC : Super Mutant Brute [01041D8D] (mod) Quest : ([01041DA8]scKimGuardsGenericDialogue) Kim Guard Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimGuardVoiceType03\scKimGuard_GREETING_00041DAF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't mess with Kim. Or we'll rip your legs off human!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别惹金。否则我们就把你的腿扯下来，人类！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Super Mutant Brute [01041D8E] (mod) NPC : Super Mutant Master [01041D8C] (mod) NPC : Super Mutant Brute [01041D8D] (mod) Quest : ([01041DA8]scKimGuardsGenericDialogue) Kim Guard Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimGuardVoiceType03\scKimGuard_GREETING_00041DB1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I recommend you say your piece quickly human! I promised Harry I would not kill you only because of my history with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我建议你快点把话说完，人类！我答应哈里不会杀你只是因为我和他的过去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kim [01041D5B] (mod) Quest : ([01041D74]scKimDialogue) Kim Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimVoiceType\scKimDialogue_GREETING_00041D75_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hurry and give me a reason to tear your arms off. No? What is it you want then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 快点，给我个扯断你胳膊的理由。不是？那你想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kim [01041D5B] (mod) Quest : ([01041D74]scKimDialogue) Kim Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimVoiceType\scKimDialogue_GREETING_00041D75_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You again? Hurry and speak your mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又是你？快点说你的想法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kim [01041D5B] (mod) Quest : ([01041D74]scKimDialogue) Kim Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimVoiceType\scKimDialogue_GREETING_00041D76_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caleb is hungry human. Harry says that you are off limits despite looking so tasty. Harry says you have something to say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯勒饿了，人类。哈里说尽管你看起来很美味，但还是不能碰你。哈里说你有话要说？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb [01041D5A] (mod) Quest : ([01041D5E]scCalebDialogue) Caleb Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCalebVoiceType\scCalebDialogue_GREETING_00041D5F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're back human! What do you want with Caleb?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回来了人类！你找凯勒有什么事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb [01041D5A] (mod) Quest : ([01041D5E]scCalebDialogue) Caleb Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCalebVoiceType\scCalebDialogue_GREETING_00041D6A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance my dudes and/or dudettes. You are speaking to designation Beer-Tron and I am happy to help!
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴认识你，我的哥们儿和/或姐们儿。你正在和指定的啤酒人说话，我很乐意帮助你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beertron [01041D44] (mod) Quest : ([01041D49]scBeertronDialogue) Beertron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scBeertronVoiceType\scBeertron_GREETING_00041D4A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You won't find a carrier of fragile cargo better than me and my fellow robot friends! What can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你找不到比我和我的机器人朋友们更好的运载易碎货物的承运人了！我能为你做些什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beertron [01041D44] (mod) Quest : ([01041D49]scBeertronDialogue) Beertron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scBeertronVoiceType\scBeertron_GREETING_00041D4A_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello valued customer! How can BeerTron help you today?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，尊贵的客户！啤酒人今天能为你做些什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beertron [01041D44] (mod) Quest : ([01041D49]scBeertronDialogue) Beertron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scBeertronVoiceType\scBeertron_GREETING_00041D51_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well it seems like you're hanging around Storm City for a while... I'm thinking you just don't know what's good for your health.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你要在风暴城待一段时间了...我想你只是不知道什么对你的健康有好处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDialogue_GREETING_00041D1C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, how can I help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，我能帮什么忙吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDialogue_GREETING_00041D1C_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry outsider, I'm rather busy at the moment. Come back once you've helped the Elder and I might have something for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，外来者，我现在很忙。等你帮助了长老再回来，我可能会给你一些东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_GREETING_00041881_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought the Elder had given you a job? You better get to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为长老给了你一份工作？你最好快点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_GREETING_00041882_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: As I said, come back later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像我说的，之后再来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_GREETING_00041883_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you were able to get the lockdown lifted. I'm glad. It should be good to get my hands on some new tech.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你解除了封锁。我很高兴，能接触到一些新技术应该是件好事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_GREETING_000418A2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It gets a bit boring tinkering with the same stuff every day. I wish I at least got a turn in the power armor we fix.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每天都在捣鼓同样的东西是有点无聊的。我真希望至少能有机会试试我们修好的动力装甲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_GREETING_000418A2_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe some day. Anyway, it's good you're here even if you didn't plan on meeting me today.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许有一天吧。不管怎么说，你能来真是太好了，即使你今天没打算见我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_GREETING_000418A2_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm in need of a runner and you might just be perfect for the job. Badass merc, can find a needle in a haystack. You'll do just fine alright...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要一个跑腿的人，而你可能是这个工作的完美人选。厉害的雇佣兵，能从大海里捞针。你会做得很好的...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_GREETING_000418A2_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome back. How can I help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回来。需要点什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_GREETING_000418A3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the hold up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么那么久啊？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_GREETING_0000E7D2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna stay here and train the initiates. They need all the help they can get.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我将留在这里，训练新兵。 他们需要所有能得到的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_GREETING_0000AE7F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talk to the Elder. He'll point you in the right direction. Although, maybe there's something else I can do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟长者谈谈，他会给你指出正确的方向。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_GREETING_0000AE7F_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're back. How can I help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_GREETING_0000AE80_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who the hell are you? Don't take another step if you know what's good for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你收到我的字条了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_GREETING_0000A9F0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SCJamesonDialogueStart.Jamesontalking to 2
So you're the one The Leader has told me to stay in contact with. I hope he's right about you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就是那个领军者让我保持联系的人。我希望他对你的看法是对的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crabbe [01041F65] (mod) Quest : ([01041F67]scCrabbeDialogue) Crabbe Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCrabbeVoiceType\scCrabbeDialogue_GREETING_00041F68_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You humans are like snakes in the grass just waiting for the perfect moment to strike. It's up to you to prove me wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们人类就像草丛里的蛇，只是在等待最佳时机出击。要靠你来证明我错了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crabbe [01041F65] (mod) Quest : ([01041F67]scCrabbeDialogue) Crabbe Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCrabbeVoiceType\scCrabbeDialogue_GREETING_00041F68_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Leader told me to answer any questions you may have. Maybe you'll learn something about the Unity in the process.
ESP.TRADUIT: 领军者让我回答你可能有的任何问题。也许在这个过程中你会学到一些关于同一的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crabbe [01041F65] (mod) Quest : ([01041F67]scCrabbeDialogue) Crabbe Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCrabbeVoiceType\scCrabbeDialogue_GREETING_00041F68_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome back. You must have more questions. Make it quick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回来。你肯定还有更多的问题，快问。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crabbe [01041F65] (mod) Quest : ([01041F67]scCrabbeDialogue) Crabbe Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCrabbeVoiceType\scCrabbeDialogue_GREETING_00041F69_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Another traveller from Highway 95, huh? Hate to break it to ya but you won't find any work in Boulder City.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又一个从95号公路来的旅行者？我不想告诉你，但你在巨石城找不到工作的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holbein [01041F86] (mod) Quest : ([01041F8B]scHolbeinDialogue) Holbein Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHolbeinVoiceType01\scHolbeinDialogue_GREETING_00041F8C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the quarry in Sloan shut down, there ain't no use for folks like my brother or the limestone they used to make use of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 斯隆的采石场关闭了，像我哥哥这样的人就没有用处了，他们以前在这里用的石灰石也没用了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holbein [01041F86] (mod) Quest : ([01041F8B]scHolbeinDialogue) Holbein Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHolbeinVoiceType01\scHolbeinDialogue_GREETING_00041F8C_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're best moving on, maybe someone at the 188 can give you a job. Either way, you're welcome to join me for a beer if ya want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好继续前进，也许188贸易站的人能给你一份工作。不管怎样，如果你愿意，欢迎你和我一起喝啤酒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holbein [01041F86] (mod) Quest : ([01041F8B]scHolbeinDialogue) Holbein Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHolbeinVoiceType01\scHolbeinDialogue_GREETING_00041F8C_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're back? What else can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回来了？我还能为你做些什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holbein [01041F86] (mod) Quest : ([01041F8B]scHolbeinDialogue) Holbein Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHolbeinVoiceType01\scHolbeinDialogue_GREETING_00041F8D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll make a great nation of our own here. The NCR will wish they didn't bully us super mutants!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会在这里建立一个属于我们自己的伟大国家。NCR会希望他们没有欺压过我们这些超级变种人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Super Mutant Brute [01041D8E] (mod) NPC : Super Mutant Master [01041D8C] (mod) NPC : Super Mutant Brute [01041D8D] (mod) Quest : ([01041DA8]scKimGuardsGenericDialogue) Kim Guard Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimGuardVoiceType03\scKimGuard_HELLO_00041DA9_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hate this damn sand! It's so hard to breathe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我讨厌这该死的沙子！呼吸都很困难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Super Mutant Brute [01041D8E] (mod) NPC : Super Mutant Master [01041D8C] (mod) NPC : Super Mutant Brute [01041D8D] (mod) Quest : ([01041DA8]scKimGuardsGenericDialogue) Kim Guard Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimGuardVoiceType03\scKimGuard_HELLO_00041DAA_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So much army stuff here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有很多军队的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Super Mutant Brute [01041D8E] (mod) NPC : Super Mutant Master [01041D8C] (mod) NPC : Super Mutant Brute [01041D8D] (mod) Quest : ([01041DA8]scKimGuardsGenericDialogue) Kim Guard Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimGuardVoiceType03\scKimGuard_HELLO_00041DAB_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't touch my gun!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别碰我的枪！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Super Mutant Brute [01041D8E] (mod) NPC : Super Mutant Master [01041D8C] (mod) NPC : Super Mutant Brute [01041D8D] (mod) Quest : ([01041DA8]scKimGuardsGenericDialogue) Kim Guard Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimGuardVoiceType03\scKimGuard_HELLO_00041DB0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that's more equipment for us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，这对我们来说是更多的装备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scQuartermasterVoiceType\SCQM_SCQMGoodbye_00000B3F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I buy some equipment?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以买些装备吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. As long as you're paying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，只要你付钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scQuartermasterVoiceType\SCQM_SCVendor_00000BA5_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
Sure, take a look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，看看吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scQuartermasterVoiceType\SCQM_SCVendor_00000BA6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
Can you repair my equipment?
ESP.TRADUIT: 能修理我的装备吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, but you'll have to pay for the parts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以，但你必须支付零部件的费用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scQuartermasterVoiceType\SCQM_SCRepair_00000BAA_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: showrepairmenu
What is your opinion on Paladin Dawn?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对圣骑士道恩有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep this to yourself, I wish he was Elder. If it wasn't for Jackson, we'd be far away from this hellhole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别说出去，我真希望他是长老。如果不是杰克逊，我们早就远离这鬼地方了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scQuartermasterVoiceType\SCQM_SCQMHeadPaladin_00002C2C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's gonna get us all killed one day unless Dawn does something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总有一天他会把我们都害死，除非道恩能做点什么，
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scQuartermasterVoiceType\SCQM_SCQMHeadPaladin_00002C2C_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: QMHPBarter
Don't worry. I won't tell him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，我不会告诉他的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Slowly back off.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [慢慢退后]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about the Brotherhood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我说说兄弟会。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you wanna know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想知道什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scQuartermasterVoiceType\SCQM_SCQMBrotherhood_00004EE7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This again? What do you want to know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 又是这个？你想知道什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scQuartermasterVoiceType\SCQM_SCQMBrotherhood_00004EE8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did the Brotherhood Of Steel start?
ESP.TRADUIT: 钢铁兄弟会是怎么开始的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately we're what remains of the US Army. Our first elder, Maxson, saw the dangers of uncontrolled technology in Mariposa.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，我们是美国军队的残余。我们的第一位长老麦克森，在马里波萨看到了不受控制的科技带来的危险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: They were experimenting with FEV in that place. What became the Brotherhood took a stand and put a stop to it. From there we went our own way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们在那个地方做FEV实验。后来兄弟会表明了立场，并阻止了这一行为。从那以后，我们各走各的路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scQuartermasterVoiceType\SCQM_SCQMBOSfounder_00004EEA_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ironic that FEV is still haunting us to this day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 讽刺的是，FEV至今仍在困扰着我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scQuartermasterVoiceType\SCQM_SCQMBOSfounder_00004EEA_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Weren't the Enclave the remnants of the US Army?
ESP.TRADUIT: 英克雷不是美国军队的残余吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Officially. They thought of us as traitors. We were to be exterminated like rats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 官方。他们认为我们是叛徒，我们会像老鼠一样被消灭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scQuartermasterVoiceType\SCQM_SCQMBOSfounderenclave_00004EEC_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is the goal of the Brotherhood?
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会的目标是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The long term goal of the Brotherhood is to preserve human civilization. The short term is to stop technology from getting into the wrong hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会的长期目标是保护人类文明，短期目标是阻止技术落入恶人之手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scQuartermasterVoiceType\SCQM_SCQMGoals_00004EEE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: A chimp with a machine gun couldn't be a better metaphor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿着机关枪的黑猩猩就是最好的比喻了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scQuartermasterVoiceType\SCQM_SCQMGoals_00004EEE_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们谈谈其他事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever you need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要什么就说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jackson said you lost your squad. What happened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰克逊说你失去了你的小队。发生了什么事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We pulled the guns out the police station and we got to the fountain. That's when they came out nowhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们从警察局拿出枪，来到了喷泉。就在那时，他们不知从哪里冒了出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scQuartermasterVoiceType\SCQM_SCQMMission_00005212_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe six or seven mutants. I can't remember. Last thing I remember is a missile going off at my feet. Quinlan and Williams, they weren't moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许有六、七个变种人，我记不得了。我记得的最后一件事是一枚导弹在我脚下爆炸了，昆兰和威廉姆斯，他们没动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scQuartermasterVoiceType\SCQM_SCQMMission_00005212_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I still see their lifeless bodies whenever I close my eyes. I抣l never see my brothers again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每当我闭上眼，我还是会看到他们没有生命的身体。我再也见不到我的兄弟了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scQuartermasterVoiceType\SCQM_SCQMMission_00005212_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I must have passed out at that point. Next thing I know, I'm in the infirmary. I still haven't been able to sleep since.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我当时一定是昏过去了，等我回过神来，我就进了医务室。从那以后我一直无法入睡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scQuartermasterVoiceType\SCQM_SCQMMission_00005212_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Elder sent me to help you with a problem you have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 长老派我来帮你解决你的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: With careful planning, we might just get out of this shithole alive. Our first course of action should be to deal with the enemy's chain of command.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果计划周密，我们也许能活着离开这个鬼地方。我们的第一步行动应该是对付敌人的指挥系统。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([01006617]SCHPDialogue) The Bounty Of Mutiny EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCHPDialog_SCHPQuestAdvanc_0000661C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That should buy us some time to attack the power plant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这应该可以为我们争取一些时间来攻击发电厂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([01006617]SCHPDialogue) The Bounty Of Mutiny

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivedisplayed SCHPDialogue 10 1 setobjectivedisplayed SCHPDialogue 20 1 setobjectivedisplayed SCHPDialogue 30 1 set SCElderDialogue.hasPlayerAcceptedHeadPaladinQuest to 1
Just tell me the problem, enough of this judge the outsider crap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快告诉我问题所在，别再跟我说什么局外人的废话了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: With careful planning, we might just get out of this shithole alive. Our first course of action should be to deal with the enemy's chain of command.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果计划周密，我们也许能活着离开这个鬼地方。我们的第一步行动应该是对付敌人的指挥系统。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([01006617]SCHPDialogue) The Bounty Of Mutiny EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCHPDialog_SCHPQuestAdvanc_00006621_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That should buy us some time to attack the power plant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这应该可以为我们争取一些时间来攻击发电厂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([01006617]SCHPDialogue) The Bounty Of Mutiny EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCHPDialog_SCHPQuestAdvanc_00006621_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivedisplayed SCHPDialogue 10 1 setobjectivedisplayed SCHPDialogue 20 1 setobjectivedisplayed SCHPDialogue 30 1 set SCElderDialogue.hasPlayerAcceptedHeadPaladinQuest to 1
I dealt with those mutants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了那些变种人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm impressed. Without their leadership, we might just be able to beat those bastards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我留下了深刻的印象。没有他们的领导，我们也许能打败那些杂种。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([01006617]SCHPDialogue) The Bounty Of Mutiny EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCHPDialog_SCHPQuestComple_00006623_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've already talked with Jackson. We're getting ready to move once everyone's ready. Go speak to him as soon as you can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经和杰克逊谈过了。大家准备好了，我们就出发。尽快去和他谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([01006617]SCHPDialogue) The Bounty Of Mutiny EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCHPDialog_SCHPQuestComple_00006623_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted SCSecondQuest 10 1 setobjectivecompleted SCHPDialogue 40 1 setstage SCHPDialogue 50 player.rewardxp 500
Nice to meet you. The Elder sent me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴见到你，长老让我来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh did he? I'm gonna need a hand with a sensitive issue here. Can you help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，他吗？我需要有人帮我处理一个敏感问题。你能帮忙吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([01009981]SCHSQuest) As Easy As A Heart Transplant EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSQuest_SCHSQuestStart1_00009987_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SCHSQuest.hasPlayerInteractedWithDarius to 1
No need to be so rude. I guess I'll just go elsewhere then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没必要这么粗鲁，我想我还是去别的地方吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, Apparently there was a distress call sent to Hidden Valley? We're here to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，显然有人向隐谷发出了求救信号？我们是来帮忙的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Elijah is hiring outsiders? You must be the backup we sent for. Come, stick behind me and I'll take you to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以利亚在雇用外来者？ 我想我们不能回绝帮助。 你们两个过来。，我带你们去见长老。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Redding [0100A363] (mod) Quest : ([0100A356]SCBrotherhoodFirstEncounter) SCBrotherhoodFirstEncounter EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scBrotherhoodGuardVoiceType\SCBrotherh_SCFirstEncounte_0000A359_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.MoveToMarkerWithFade BOSHQREF JamesonREF.MoveToMarkerWithFade BOSHQREF
Get that gun out my face! Do you want my help or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 把枪从我面前拿开！你到底要不要我帮忙？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Help? You must be the backup we sent for. The Elder will want to see you immediately. Come, I'll take you to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。如果是一个圣骑士，长老会马上想见你的...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Redding [0100A363] (mod) Quest : ([0100A356]SCBrotherhoodFirstEncounter) SCBrotherhoodFirstEncounter EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scBrotherhoodGuardVoiceType\SCBrotherh_SCFirstEncounte_0000A35B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.MoveToMarkerWithFade BOSHQREF JamesonREF.MoveToMarkerWithFade BOSHQREF
Yeah, let's hear it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，让我们听听。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You merc types love to hear about the pay first so we'll start with that. Two thousand caps on completion of the job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们这些雇佣兵喜欢先听报酬，所以我们就从这个开始。工作完成后有两千瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll be checking on another Brotherhood chapter. We'll be using the train in the next room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们将检查另一个兄弟会分会，我们将使用隔壁房间的火车。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart

ESP.ORIGINAL: We received a distress call a couple of days ago. Couldn't understand the message because of the interference. Nothing but static...
ESP.TRADUIT: 几天前我们收到一个求救信号。由于受到干扰，无法理解信息，除了静电声什么都没有...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart

ESP.ORIGINAL: We think something's happened to them. Storm City's a dangerous place. So, are you interested?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们认为他们出事了，风暴城是个危险的地方。那么，你感兴趣吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm not interested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不感兴趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well, we'll need to find someone new for the job then. Come back if you change your mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧，那我们得找个新人来做这项工作了。如果你改变主意了就回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about Storm City?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能跟我说说风暴城吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: How are we travelling to the city?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们如何前往该城市？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the Brotherhood?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能和我说说兄弟会吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're dedicated to preserving the past and the future. The key to our principles is technology.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们致力于保护过去和未来。我们原则的关键是科技。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_SCJamesonBrothe_0000AD3E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Despite what you may have heard if you've been anywhere near the east coast, the locals aren't the priority.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管你可能听说过，但当地人并不是优先考虑的对象。你得为大局着想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_SCJamesonBrothe_0000AD3E_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: A raider might kill a civilian. That's one casualty. A raider might get a set of power armor. That's several casualties.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个掠夺者可能杀死了一个平民，这是一个伤亡。一个掠夺者可能得到了一套动力装甲，那就是几个人的伤亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_SCJamesonBrothe_0000AD3E_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That抯 why technology comes first. That's what I tell myself anyway. Now if you're done asking questions, can we go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 反正我就是这么告诉自己的。现在如果你问完了问题，我们可以走了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_SCJamesonBrothe_0000AD3E_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to the chapter at Storm City?
ESP.TRADUIT: 风暴城的分会发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know but that's what we're gonna find out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，但这就是我们要找出来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_SCJamesonChapte_0000AD40_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: No more questions. I'm ready to travel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经准备好旅行了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, here's the key to that door over there. Lead the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，这是那边那扇门的钥匙。带路吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_SCImReady_0000AD42_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted SCFirstQuest 10 1 setobjectivecompleted SCFirstQuest 20 1 setstage SCFirstQuest 30 player.additem SCmetrokey 1 set JamesonREF.IsFollowingJameson to 1 set JamesonREF.sandboxjameson1 to 0 SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1 SetEssential SCPaladinJameson 1 JamesonREF.AddToFaction PlayerFaction 1 JamesonREF.evp
I still need to prepare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还需要准备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll do what I can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会尽力的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's better than nothing. I have an injured soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总比没有好。我有个受伤的士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([01009981]SCHSQuest) As Easy As A Heart Transplant EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSQuest_SCHSQuestAgree2_0000B1E9_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need a bottle of absinthe to help clean the wound. There's a liquor store in town according to one of our supply runners.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要一瓶苦艾酒来帮助清洗伤口。据我们的一个物资走私者说，城镇里有一家酒类商店。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([01009981]SCHSQuest) As Easy As A Heart Transplant EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He didn't come back. So be careful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他没有回来，所以要小心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([01009981]SCHSQuest) As Easy As A Heart Transplant EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivedisplayed SCHSQuest 10 1 setstage SCHSQuest 10 set SCElderDialogue.hasPlayerAcceptedHeadScribeQuest to 1
Super Mutants? Why are they here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 超级变种人？他们为什么在这里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You heard correctly. Those bastards must have stumbled across this place just like we did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没听错。那些混蛋一定是像我们一样偶然发现了这个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: They ain't nothing but beasts. And there's only one thing you can do to a feral beast and that's to put em' down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们不过是野兽。面对一头野兽，你能做的只有一件事，那就是干掉它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: It ain't gonna easy though. Bastards are as tough as nails.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这并不容易，这些杂种都是强壮又坚韧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mutants? You guys have power armor. Should be easy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 变种人？你们有动力装甲，应该很轻松啊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kid, when you're outnumbered two to one I think you need to utilize some form of strategy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 孩子，当你的人数是二比一时，我认为你需要使用某种策略。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDia_SCElderUpFront_0000B3E1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those bastards came outta nowhere. We gotta beat em' back. it ain't gonna be easy though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些杂种不知从哪冒出来的，我们得把他们打回去。但这并不容易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDia_SCElderUpFront_0000B3E1_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the plan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 计划是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're taking back the Sunstorm. Killing as many muties as it damn well takes and then some.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要夺回太阳风暴，要杀多少变种人就杀多少。
