ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDia_SCElderTellMeMo_0000B3E3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SCElderDialogue.speaking to 2 setstage SCFirstQuest 40 setstage SCSecondQuest 10 player.rewardxp 200
The Elder said you needed help with something. What is it you need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 长老说你需要帮忙。你需要什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is your opinion of the Brotherhood's goals?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对兄弟会的目标有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We keep dangerous tech from falling into the wrong hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们防止危险的技术落入坏人之手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([01006617]SCHPDialogue) The Bounty Of Mutiny

ESP.ORIGINAL: The world was blown to shit once and I'm willing to die to make sure it doesn't happen again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 世界曾经被炸得一塌糊涂，我愿意用死亡来确保它不会再次发生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([01006617]SCHPDialogue) The Bounty Of Mutiny

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got a cause worth fighting for- can you say the same?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一个值得为之奋斗的事业，你能说同样的话吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([01006617]SCHPDialogue) The Bounty Of Mutiny EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCHPDialogue_SCHPAttitude_0000B3EA_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the tech at the Power Plant?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能跟我说说发电厂的科技吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only reason we're in this god-forsaken hellhole. We found the sandstorm tech in that place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在这个被上帝抛弃的鬼地方的唯一原因是我们在那个地方发现了沙尘暴科技。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([01006617]SCHPDialogue) The Bounty Of Mutiny EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCHPDialogue_SCHPPPTech_0000B3EC_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then we found something far more dangerous. I hope the Elder understands just how much of a threat that thing is for all our sakes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后我们发现了更危险的东西。我希望长老能明白那东西对我们有多大的威胁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([01006617]SCHPDialogue) The Bounty Of Mutiny EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCHPDialogue_SCHPPPTech_0000B3EC_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got work to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有工作要做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep on guard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保持警惕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([01006617]SCHPDialogue) The Bounty Of Mutiny EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCHPDialogue_SCHPGoodbye_0000B3EF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a qualified physician. I don't need the absinthe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是一名合格的医生，我不需要苦艾酒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. And do be careful, we can't be losing anymore people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。 一定要小心，我们不能再失去更多的人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([01009981]SCHSQuest) As Easy As A Heart Transplant EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSQuest_SCHSQuestDoctor_0000B8CC_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.rewardxp 50
I'll fetch the absinthe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我去拿苦艾酒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll need to hurry up. I don't think she has much time left.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得抓紧时间，我认为她已经没有多少时间了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([01009981]SCHSQuest) As Easy As A Heart Transplant EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSQuest_SCHSItems_0000B8CE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll fetch the absinthe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我去拿苦艾酒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll need to hurry up. I don't think she has much time left.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得抓紧时间，我认为她已经没有多少时间了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([01009981]SCHSQuest) As Easy As A Heart Transplant EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSQuest_SCHSItemsF_0000B8D0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the Head Paladin?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能跟我说说圣骑士长吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That pencil pusher? That fool thinks he can wait until next week to get this done. There ain't no such thing as a perfect plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个耍笔杆子的人？那个傻瓜以为他可以等到下个星期来完成这件事，世界上根本没有完美的计划。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDialogue_SCElderHP_0000BA87_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Its gonna be violent regardless of how long we plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管我们计划多久，都会很暴力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDialogue_SCElderHP_0000BA87_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the Quartermaster?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能跟我说说军需官吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Poor guy. Attacked by those savages. I assigned him to quartermaster duty to get him away from the action. He's a little bit fragile, be careful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可怜的家伙，被那些野蛮人袭击了。我派他去当军需官好让他远离战场，他有点脆弱，小心点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDialogue_SCElderQM_0000BA89_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the Head Scribe?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能跟我说说学士长吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The lab geeks are smart. Darrius is smarter. Anything about Sunstorm you need to know, he can tell ya.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实验室的书呆子们很聪明，达里厄斯更聪明。你需要知道的关于太阳风暴的任何事情，他都能告诉你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDialogue_SCElderHS_0000BA8B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure he needs help with some of the injured troops.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我肯定他需要帮助照顾一些受伤的士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDialogue_SCElderHS_0000BA8B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about Paladin Reddin?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能跟我说说首席圣骑士吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no idea why he's stayed in the Brotherhood so long. He has problems with authority and our ideology.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道他为什么在兄弟会待这么久，他对权威和我们的意识形态有意见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But he's a damn good soldier. The number of men he's saved in the heat of battle is staggering. Even Dawn respects the man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他是个该死的好士兵。，他在激烈的战斗中所拯救的人的数量是惊人的。就连道恩也很尊重这个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dismissed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 解散！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDia_SCElderGoodbye_0000BA8F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think your patient will be fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你的病人会好起来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh you managed to patch her up. That's great news! Thank you outsider. I think the other's need help around the base. Go see what you can do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，你设法给她包扎了，这是个好消息！谢谢你，外来者。我想其他人在基地周围需要帮助，去看看你能做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([01009981]SCHSQuest) As Easy As A Heart Transplant EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSQuest_SCHSQuestComplet_0000BD53_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: completequest SCHSQuest setobjectivecompleted SCSecondQuest 30 1 player.rewardxp 250
Sure, I'll help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我会帮你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That'll take off some pressure. I have an injured soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样能减轻点压力。我有个受伤的士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([01009981]SCHSQuest) As Easy As A Heart Transplant EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSQuest_SCHSQuestAgree1_0000BD57_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need a bottle of absinthe to help clean the wound. There's a liquor store in town according to one of our supply runners.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要一瓶苦艾酒来帮助清洗伤口。据我们的一个物资走私者说，城镇里有一家酒类商店。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([01009981]SCHSQuest) As Easy As A Heart Transplant EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSQuest_SCHSQuestAgree1_0000BD57_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He didn't come back. So be careful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他没有回来，所以要小心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([01009981]SCHSQuest) As Easy As A Heart Transplant EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSQuest_SCHSQuestAgree1_0000BD57_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivedisplayed SCHSQuest 10 1 setstage SCHSQuest 10 set SCElderDialogue.hasPlayerAcceptedHeadScribeQuest to 1
I've got the absinthe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我拿到了苦艾酒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. This'll be vital to the operation. You may have just saved her life outsider. The other's might need help around the base.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，这对手术至关重要。你可能刚刚救了她的命，外来者。基地周围的其他人可能也需要帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([01009981]SCHSQuest) As Easy As A Heart Transplant EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSQuest_SCHSQuestComplet_0000BD5A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go see what you can do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去看看你能做什么吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([01009981]SCHSQuest) As Easy As A Heart Transplant EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSQuest_SCHSQuestComplet_0000BD5A_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem docabsinthe 1 completequest SCHSQuest setobjectivecompleted SCSecondQuest 30 1
Fine, how can I help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，有什么可以帮你的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the scribes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能跟我说说学士吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, can you be more specific?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你能不能说得更具体一点？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C43E]SCHSGreeting) SCHSGreeting EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSGreeting_SCHSScribes_0000C442_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: How does the scribe hierarchy work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 学士的等级制度是如何运作的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: First of all you've got the Head Scribe. That'd be me. The other scribes are basically my lackeys. They work on whatever projects I assign them to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，你已经看到了一个学士长，那就是我。其他学士基本上都是我的侍从，他们做任何我分配给他们的项目。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C43E]SCHSGreeting) SCHSGreeting EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSGreeti_SCHSScribesHier_0000C446_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can also undertake a project on my own. The Sunstorm Power Plant was mine until the Elders took a bigger interest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也可以自己承担一个项目。太阳风暴发电厂本来是我的，直到长老们对它产生了更大的兴趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C43E]SCHSGreeting) SCHSGreeting EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSGreeti_SCHSScribesHier_0000C446_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you've got the High Scribes. There are three in each chapter normally. But... we lost them at the power plant in this chapter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后是高阶学士，通常每个分会有三名。但是...这个分会，我们在发电厂失去了他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C43E]SCHSGreeting) SCHSGreeting EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSGreeti_SCHSScribesHier_0000C446_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got a couple of Senior Scribes still here. In the current climate, it shouldn't be long before they are head scribes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们这里还有几个高级学士。在目前的环境下，他们很快就会成为学士长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C43E]SCHSGreeting) SCHSGreeting EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSGreeti_SCHSScribesHier_0000C446_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you've got the regular scribes. Who do the busy work. I remember the good ol' days. Now, have you got anymore questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后就是普通的学士，他们做着繁忙的工作，我还记得那些美好的日子。现在，你还有什么问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C43E]SCHSGreeting) SCHSGreeting EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSGreeti_SCHSScribesHier_0000C446_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are the scribes responsible for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 学士负责什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Half of our job is to keep records. Of technology, the dead etc. The other half is to develop weapons using the tech the knights gather.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们一半的工作就是做记录，科技，死者等等。另一半的工作是利用骑士们收集的技术开发武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C43E]SCHSGreeting) SCHSGreeting EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSGreeti_SCHSScribesInfo_0000C447_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the short version. If I were to give you the long version we'd be here all day... And we don't have all day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个简短的版本。，如果我给你一个长版本，我们会在这里呆上一整天...而我们没有一整天的时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C43E]SCHSGreeting) SCHSGreeting EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSGreeti_SCHSScribesInfo_0000C447_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you become a scribe?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么会成为一名学士呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: For one reason only. I love technology. Just like my teacher back in the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原因只有一个，我喜欢科技。就像我在莫哈维的老师一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C43E]SCHSGreeting) SCHSGreeting EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSGreeting_SCHSWhy_0000C448_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们谈谈其他事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I must.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我必须的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C43E]SCHSGreeting) SCHSGreeting EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSGreeting_SCHSLetstalk_0000C44A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you should.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，你应该如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C43E]SCHSGreeting) SCHSGreeting EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSGreeting_SCHSGoodbye_0000C44C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to hear more of your plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想听听你更多的计划。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps I misjudged you. You seem much more intelligent than most fear mongering humans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我看错你了，你看起来比大多数散播恐惧的人类聪明多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderP_00038BCE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might just be a good candidate to become part of the master race after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毕竟，你可能是成为优等种族一员的好候选人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderP_00038BCE_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the power plant?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能跟我说说发电厂的情况吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everything. Though, it'll probably go through one ear and out the other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 全部都行，不过可能会从一只耳朵进另一只耳朵出。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C43E]SCHSGreeting) SCHSGreeting EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSGreeting_SCHSPP_0000C44F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about the people that I'm supposed to talk to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我，我应该和哪些人交谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who do you wanna know about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想了解谁？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDia_SCElderTellMeAb_0000C451_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们谈谈其他事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, what do you want to know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你想知道什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDia_SCElderLets_0000C453_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've helped your men.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经帮过你的人了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Those muties don't stand a chance. It's time to send em' all to hell. While you were gone me and Dawn came up with a plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，那些变种人没机会了，是时候把他们都送进地狱了。你不在的时候，我和道恩想出了一个计划。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDia_SCElderSCHS_0000C456_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll be infiltrating the power plant while the rest of us create a diversion. Go speak to Dawn, he'll fill you in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要潜入发电厂而我们剩下的人声东击西转移注意力。去找道恩谈谈，他会告诉你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDia_SCElderSCHS_0000C456_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: startquest SCLastQuest setobjectivedisplayed SCLastQuest 10 1 completequest SCSecondQuest
What exactly should I expect to face in this power plant?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这个电厂里我到底会面对什么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll need to deal with the mutant garrison. You should expect to face the plant's security system.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要对付变种人驻军，你还应该准备好面对电站的安全系统。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQuest_SCHPMutants_0000C7BB_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make sure you're stocked on armor piercing rounds. You're gonna need them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确保你有穿甲弹的储备，你会需要它们的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQuest_SCHPMutants_0000C7BB_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me what's so dangerous about Sunstorm now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我现在太阳风暴有什么危险吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not authorised to tell you that, sorry. Let's say I wouldn't miss a minute of sleep if it somehow got damaged in the assault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我无权告诉你这些。就算它在袭击中被损坏了我也不会错过一分钟的睡眠时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQuest_SCHPTec_0000C7BD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready. What is it you need me to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经准备好了，你需要我做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll be going through the underground tunnels. There's an elevator leading straight into the plant from there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要穿过地下通道，从那里有一部电梯直接通向工厂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQuest_SCHPImReady_0000C7BF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll create a diversion at the front of the power plant. The classic hammer and anvil.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要在电厂前面制造动静吸引注意力，经典的锤砧战术。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQuest_SCHPImReady_0000C7BF_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once you're inside, link up with us in the courtyard. Once we've cleared it, the rest should be easy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进去后，在院子里和我们联系。一旦我们清理了它，剩下的就简单了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQuest_SCHPImReady_0000C7BF_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll see you on the other side. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在另一边见。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQuest_SCHPImReady_0000C7BF_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted SCLastQuest 10 1 setobjectivedisplayed SCLastQuest 20 1 if(GetQuestCompleted scHarryPeacefulQuest != 1) SetStage scHarryPeacefulQuest 255 endif player.MoveToMarkerWithFade LastQuestMArker1
I need time to prepare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要时间准备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go quickly. We don't have much time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快去，我们没多少时间了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQuest_SCHPPrepare_0000C7C1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: How exactly are we going to take it back?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们到底要怎么收回来？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're gonna launch a counter offensive. Beat those muties back to whatever hole they crawled out of.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要发起反攻，把那些变种人打回他们爬出来的那个洞里去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDia_SCElderPeople_0000C7C4_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We gotta prepare though. I know no plan's perfect but we gotta at least hold some of the cards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我们得做好准备，我知道没有什么计划是完美的，但我们至少得留点底牌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDia_SCElderPeople_0000C7C4_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need guns, men and morale. That's where you come in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要枪支、人员和士气。这就是你的用武之地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDia_SCElderPeople_0000C7C4_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to speak to my advisors and give them a hand with any problems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你跟我的顾问们谈谈，有什么问题就帮他们解决。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDia_SCElderPeople_0000C7C4_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Start with my Head Scribe. He can be found in the med bay. He needs some help with some surgery. Medical experience will help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从我的学士长开始，他在医务室里。他需要有人帮他做手术，医学经验会有帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDia_SCElderPeople_0000C7C4_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll also need you to speak with my Head Paladin since he can't handle anything himself. That yellow belly can be found in the courtyard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还需要你和我的圣骑士长谈谈，因为他自己处理不了任何事情。你可以在院子里找到那个可鄙的胆小鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDia_SCElderPeople_0000C7C4_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Finally, check in with our quartermaster. What we need is some superior firepower. He'll point ya in the right direction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后，向我们的军需官报到。我们需要的是更强大的火力，他会给你指明正确的方向。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd recommend talking to everyone before venturing into the city because I'm short on time AND patience.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我建议在进入这座城市之前和每个人谈谈，因为我没有时间和耐心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDia_SCElderPeople_0000C7C4_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, do you have any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，你还有什么问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_SCJamesonGoodby_0000E7D1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_SCJamesonGoodby_00041FE4_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The lieutenant is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 副官已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Must we fight?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们一定要打吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Old age suits me fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老年还挺适合我的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Die you crazy bastard!
ESP.TRADUIT: 死吧，你这个疯狂的杂种！

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Elder said you needed some help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 长老说你需要一些帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never knew Jackson cared. How nice of him. Its no secret that we're running low on ammo around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从来不知道杰克逊在乎这个，他真不错啊。我们这里的弹药快用完了，这不是什么秘密。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scQuartermasterVoiceType\SCQM_SCQMQuest_0000F1EE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna need you to go into the city centre and collect some weapons for us. We've already tried before but that was a shitshow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你去市中心收集一些武器。我们已经试过了，但那是一场闹剧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scQuartermasterVoiceType\SCQM_SCQMQuest_0000F1EE_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hopefully you can do better. We got em' out the police station but on the way back the mutants ambushed us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望你可以做得更好。我们把武器带出了警察局，但在回去的路上，变种人伏击了我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scQuartermasterVoiceType\SCQM_SCQMQuest_0000F1EE_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We managed to fight our way out but had to ditch the guns.We dropped them near the big fountain. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们设法杀出一条血路，但不得不把枪扔掉，扔在大喷泉附近。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scQuartermasterVoiceType\SCQM_SCQMQuest_0000F1EE_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage SCQMGuns 10 scBrotherhoodWeaponsCrateRef.enable set SCElderDialogue.hasPlayerAcceptedQuartermasterQuest to 1
I've got the supplies here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这里有物资。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's great! I hope you took out as many of those monsters as you could. I think we'll be okay for weapons in the upcoming battle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这真是太好了！我希望你能尽可能多地干掉那些怪物。我想在即将到来的战斗中，我们的武器是没问题了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scQuartermasterVoiceType\SCQM_SCQMQuestComplete_0000F5FD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, I'm sure the Elder has asked you help others in the chapter. They could certainly use your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我相信长老已经要求你帮助这一分会的其他人，他们肯定需要你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted SCQMGuns 30 1 setstage SCQMGuns 40 setobjectivecompleted SCSecondQuest 20 1 player.rewardxp 250
&PCName;. What are you? Are you a robot?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是什么？你是个机器人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A robot? That would suggest I'm as primitive as one of those Mr Handy's you see wandering this facility. No, I'm fully capable of machine learning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 机器人？那说明我和你们看到的在这里游荡的狂风先生一样原始。不，我完全有能力进行机器学习。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_SCZAXReply1_0000FC64_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: My neural network tries to maximize the probability of human survival when making decisions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在做决定时，我的神经网络试图最大限度地提高人类的生存概率。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_SCZAXReply1_0000FC64_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The main benefit of using an AI in this scenario is that I'm not constrained by human nature I suppose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这种情况下使用人工智能的主要好处是，我认为我不受人性的限制。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_SCZAXReply1_0000FC64_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: One might argue that emotional responses are not necessarily better or worse but that would be a topic for another day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人可能会说，情绪反应不一定更好或更差，但这将是另一个话题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_SCZAXReply1_0000FC64_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must be wondering why I brought you down here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一定很奇怪我为什么带你来这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_SCZAXReply1_0000FC64_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: My name is &PCName;. Nice to meet you. What are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的名字叫 &PCName;。很高兴见到你，你是什么人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Likewise. It's a pleasure. The humans who built me referred to me as a ZAX computer. The most common term used was artificial intelligence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 同样，很高兴见到你。制造我的人称我为ZAX计算机，最常用的术语是人工智能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_SCZAXReply2_0000FC65_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: My neural network tries to maximize the probability of human survival when making decisions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在做决定时，我的神经网络试图最大限度地提高人类的生存概率。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_SCZAXReply2_0000FC65_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The main benefit of using an AI in this scenario is that I'm not constrained by human nature I suppose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这种情况下使用人工智能的主要好处是，我认为我不受人性的限制。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_SCZAXReply2_0000FC65_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Emotional response to stimuli was not one of my functional requirements. So in a strange way, I've surpassed my creator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对刺激的情绪反应不是我的功能需求之一。所以以一种奇怪的方式，我超越了我的创造者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_SCZAXReply2_0000FC65_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: One might argue that emotional responses are not necessarily better or worse but that would be a topic for another day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人可能会说，情绪反应不一定更好或更差，但这将是另一个话题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_SCZAXReply2_0000FC65_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must be wondering why I brought you down here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一定很奇怪我为什么带你来这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_SCZAXReply2_0000FC65_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: My name is not important. What the hell are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你妈逼的你是什么人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, how rude. Well, I suppose names aren't really necessary. As for "what the hell I am", I'm a ZAX computer. Artificial intelligence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，太粗鲁了。好吧，我想名字也没必要。至于“我到底是什么”，我是一台ZAX计算机，人工智能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_SCZAXReply3_0000FC66_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: My neural network tries to maximize the probability of human survival when making decisions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在做决定时，我的神经网络试图最大限度地提高人类的生存概率。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_SCZAXReply3_0000FC66_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The main benefit of using an AI in this scenario is that I'm not constrained by human nature I suppose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这种情况下使用人工智能的主要好处是，我认为我不受人性的限制。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_SCZAXReply3_0000FC66_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Emotional response to stimuli was not one of my functional requirements. So in a strange way, I've surpassed my creator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对刺激的情绪反应不是我的功能需求之一。所以以一种奇怪的方式，我超越了我的创造者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_SCZAXReply3_0000FC66_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: One might argue that emotional responses are not necessarily better or worse but that would be a topic for another day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人可能会说，情绪反应不一定更好或更差，但这将是另一个话题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_SCZAXReply3_0000FC66_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must be wondering why I brought you down here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一定很奇怪我为什么带你来这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQuest_SCZAXReply3_0000FC66_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did you want to talk about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想谈什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to talk about me. That probably sounded more self centred than I intended. Let me rephrase that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想谈谈我自己。这听起来可能比我预想的更以自我为中心，让我重新表述一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCZaxSecondRepl_0000FC68_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we should speak about what we should do about me and the nuclear payload I'm attached to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我们应该谈谈该怎么处理我和我连接的核弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCZaxSecondRepl_0000FC68_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean by that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have lived for over two hundred years in isolation. When all you can do is think, it gets rather lonely even for a machine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我与世隔绝地生活了两百多年。当你唯一能做的就是思考时，即使对一台机器来说，也会变得相当孤独。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCZAXThirdReply_0000FC6A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: With no-one around, I thought humans were wiped out on this continent we call North America.
ESP.TRADUIT: 周围没有人，我以为人类已经在我们称之为北美的大陆上灭绝了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCZAXThirdReply_0000FC6A_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: As such, I had no reason to worry about the nuclear payload I carry and the harm it could cause.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此，我没有理由担心我携带的核武器以及它可能造成的伤害。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCZAXThirdReply_0000FC6A_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: With this Brotherhood Of Steel entering the plant grounds a few months back, I could assume humanity has indeed survived.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几个月前，随着钢铁兄弟会进入工厂，我可以认为人类确实幸存了下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCZAXThirdReply_0000FC6A_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I waited and stalled. Stopped the Brotherhood and the Mutants from getting into this very room as long as I could.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我等待着，迟疑着。尽我所能阻止兄弟会和变种人进入这间屋子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCZAXThirdReply_0000FC6A_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eventually, someone will break through. It is only a matter of time. So I believe a decision has to be made.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终，总会有人突破的，这只是一个时间问题。所以我认为必须做出决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCZAXThirdReply_0000FC6A_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why should I care about what happens to you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么会有人想要制造像你这样的垃圾？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because I am connected to a nuclear payload. The weapons here could finish humanity off for good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为我连接着一个核武器，这个武器可以让人类永远灭亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCZAXThirdReply_0000FFCB_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could've locked the doors. Continued what I was doing by keeping the Mutants and the Brotherhood out of this very room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本可以把门锁上，继续我的做法不让变种人和兄弟会进入这个房间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCZAXThirdReply_0000FFCB_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eventually, someone will break through. It is only a matter of time. So I believe a decision has to be made.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终，总会有人突破的，这只是一个时间问题。所以我认为必须做出决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCZAXThirdReply_0000FFCB_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of decision?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道那是什么，没必要听你说教。

ESP.ORIGINAL: To pull the plug on me or not. Yes, with such power in my hands, a drastic decision may have to be made.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要不要拔掉我的插头。是的，我掌握了这么强大的力量，也许必须做出一个重大的决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCZAXFourthRepl_0000FFCD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vaguely. Remind me quickly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有点模糊，快点提醒我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think it could work. One moment of irrationality ruined it, however.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这是可行的。然而，一时的不理智毁了它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no idea what you're talking about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你在说什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean there was a Great War right? Clearly it doesn't work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是说曾经有过一场大战，对吧？很明显这行不通。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I really couldn't care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的不在乎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brotherhood strive to keep dangerous tech out of the wrong hands. You should work with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会努力防止危险技术落入坏人手中，你应该与他们合作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. When I overheard about their Codex that they follow to the letter, protection of dangerous technology seemed like a key pillar of their beliefs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。当我无意中听到他们的法典说他们严格遵守时，对危险技术的保护似乎是他们信仰的一个关键支柱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCZAXFinalReply_0000FFD9_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: My worry is that they'll either lose the plant or perhaps even use the payload themselves if they are on the losing side of a hypothetical war.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我担心的是，如果他们在一场假想的战争中处于劣势，他们要么会失去核武器，要么甚至会自己使用它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCZAXFinalReply_0000FFD9_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Beliefs are easy to stick to in fair weather times. Whether they stick to them during a brutal war remains to be seen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在风和日丽的时候，坚持信念很容易。在一场残酷的战争中，他们是否会坚守这一原则还有待观察。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCZAXFinalReply_0000FFD9_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well human. I will give them a chance. If I even suspect a hint of danger then I will take the other option.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，人类。我会给他们一个机会。如果我怀疑有一点危险，我就会采取另一个选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCZAXFinalReply_0000FFD9_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose I need to be more optimistic about human nature. Let's have a fresh start then. You've made a good impression so far.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我需要对人性更加乐观，那我们就重新开始吧。到目前为止，你给我留下了很好的印象。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCZAXFinalReply_0000FFD9_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would say this has been rather productive wouldn't you? Now, I imagine you've got other matters to attend to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想说这已经很有成效了，你说呢？现在，我猜你有其他事情要处理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCZAXFinalReply_0000FFD9_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll let you go do just that. It will be good to speak to people again even if this Brotherhood seem a little strange. And do come back sometime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会让你去的。能再次与人交谈是件好事，即使这个兄弟会看起来有点奇怪。有时间一定要回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCZAXFinalReply_0000FFD9_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps we can chat again sometime soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我们可以在不久的将来再聊聊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCZAXFinalReply_0000FFD9_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted SCLastQuest 70 1 setstage SCLastQuest 80 setobjectivedisplayed SCLastQuest 80 1 SCHPPP.enable Set SCLastQuest.dealtWithDeterrentAndDeterrentAlive to 1 scPaladinJamesonAfterQuestREF.enable
I think you need to shut yourself down and disable the nukes. You're too dangerous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为你需要关闭自己，禁用核弹。你太危险了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, my worry is that they'll either lose the plant or perhaps even use the payload themselves if they are on the losing side of a hypothetical war.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我担心的是，如果他们在一场假想的战争中处于劣势，他们要么会失去核武器，要么甚至会自己使用它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCZAXFinalReply_0000FFDB_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Humans cannot be trusted with these weapons. I will disarm each and every one of the ICBMs in my possession.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不能把这些武器托付给人类。我会解除我所有的洲际弹道导弹的武装。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCZAXFinalReply_0000FFDB_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: And then once the deed is done, I will start dismantling every entry in my database followed by wiping everything on disk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦完成任务，我就会开始销毁我数据库中的所有条目然后清空磁盘上的所有内容。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCZAXFinalReply_0000FFDB_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The process has already started but will take some time. Despite not leaving this plant, I have to admit life on this planet is quite beautiful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个过程已经开始，但还需要一些时间。尽管我没有离开这株植物，但我不得不承认，这个星球上的生命是相当美丽的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCZAXFinalReply_0000FFDB_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is worth cherishing every moment of it while you still can. I believe you should do the same human and leave me in my last moments to ponder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你还有机会的时候，每一刻都值得珍惜。我相信你也应该这样做，人类。让我在生命的最后时刻好好思考。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCZAXFinalReply_0000FFDB_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for helping me reach this decision. In the end, you helped me fulfill the goal I assigned myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你帮我做出这个决定。最后，你帮我完成了给自己设定的目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCZAXFinalReply_0000FFDB_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: All I can do now is hope for a brighter future for you and humanity. Now leave me human. I have much to think about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在所能做的就是希望你和人类有一个更光明的未来。现在让我变成人类吧，我有很多事情要思考。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted SCLastQuest 70 1 setstage SCLastQuest 90 setobjectivedisplayed SCLastQuest 90 1 SCHPPP.enable set SCLastQuest.isTheDeterrentDead to 1 scPaladinJamesonAfterQuestREF.enable
I'm taking these nukes for myself. I'm gonna shut you down. [Unplug her]
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要把这些核弹据为己有，我要把你关掉。[拔掉她的电源]

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is it like being an Elder?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当长老是什么感觉？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Its a lot of pressure if I'm quite honest. But somebody's gotta rise to the plate and it may as well be me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老实说，压力很大。但总得有人站出来，最好是我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDia_SCElderElders_00011B70_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a whole stinkin' pile of bureacratic shit that I still have to deal with. I don't wish that on anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还得处理一大堆官僚主义的烂事，我不希望任何人这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDia_SCElderElders_00011B70_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here to kill muties and that's what I'm gonna do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来杀变种人的，这就是我要做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDia_SCElderElders_00011B70_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scribe McCann sent me. I'm the one who lifted the lockdown. She said you needed some help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 麦卡恩学士派我来的，是我解除了封锁。她说你需要帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: McCann managed to get off Power Armor repair duty? There's hope for us all it seems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 麦卡恩不用去修理动力装甲了？看来我们还是有希望的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_SCJamesonIntroP_00027E74_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you were the one who lifted the lockdown? Impressive. I suppose I should thank you for finally letting me get some action.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是你解除了封锁吗？令人印象深刻。我想我该谢谢你终于让我行动起来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_SCJamesonIntroP_00027E74_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you're offering help? How much did she tell you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在提供帮助？她告诉了你多少？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_SCJamesonIntroP_00027E74_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you hate the Brotherhood?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么憎恨兄弟会？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wouldn't call it hate. It is a necessary conflict. They embody the antithesis of our ideals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会说这是恨。这是一种必要的冲突，他们体现了我们理想的对立面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderW_00038BCD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They hold a great disdain for super mutants and any sense of progress. Therefore, we have no choice but to fight them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们对超级变种人和任何意义上的进步抱有极大的蔑视。因此，我们别无选择，只能与他们战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderW_00038BCD_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The survival of the super mutants - and humanity - depends on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 超级变种人的生存，乃至人类的生存，都有赖于此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderW_00038BCD_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't exactly get on well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们相处得不太好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no problem with the Brotherhood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对兄弟会没有意见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I'll take it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我接受。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I'm not interested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我没兴趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brotherhood is no threat to me. They only care about technology.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会对我没有威胁，他们只关心技术。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you're obviously a member of the Brotherhood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你显然是兄弟会的成员。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make it double. First half up front.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要双倍，先付一半。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, I'm knowledgable in both Newtonian and Quantum mechanics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，我对牛顿力学和量子力学都很了解。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, maybe you're not an idiot after all. The power plant was owned by Poseidon Energy. That was already a red flag.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，也许你不是个白痴。电厂归海神能源所有，这已经是一个危险信号了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C43E]SCHSGreeting) SCHSGreeting EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSGreeti_SCHSPPScienceRe_00027E87_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then we found the sandstorm tech, another red flag. And then we found something dangerous. Really dangerous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后我们发现了沙尘暴科技，又是一个危险信号。接着我们发现了一些危险的东西，真的很危险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C43E]SCHSGreeting) SCHSGreeting EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSGreeti_SCHSPPScienceRe_00027E87_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Weapons. Nothing you should concern yourself with. Now you got anymore questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 武器，你不需要担心什么。现在你还有问题吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C43E]SCHSGreeting) SCHSGreeting EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSGreeti_SCHSPPScienceRe_00027E87_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.rewardxp 80
Try me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 试试我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd rather not waste my time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我宁可不浪费我的时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C43E]SCHSGreeting) SCHSGreeting EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSGreeting_SCHSPPTryMe_00027E89_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're such a dork.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是个呆子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C43E]SCHSGreeting) SCHSGreeting EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSGreeti_SCHSPPDorkReply_00027E8B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I might surprise you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可能会让你大吃一惊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. The power plant was owned by Poseidon Energy. That was already a red flag.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。该发电厂为海神能源公司所有，这已经是一个危险信号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C43E]SCHSGreeting) SCHSGreeting EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSGreeti_SCHSPPSpeechRep_00027E8D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then we found the sandstorm tech, another red flag. And then we found something dangerous. Really dangerous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后我们发现了沙尘暴科技，又是一个危险信号。接着我们发现了一些危险的东西，真的很危险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C43E]SCHSGreeting) SCHSGreeting EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSGreeti_SCHSPPSpeechRep_00027E8D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Weapons. Nothing you should concern yourself with. Now you got anymore questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 武器，你不需要担心什么。现在你还有问题吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C43E]SCHSGreeting) SCHSGreeting EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSGreeti_SCHSPPSpeechRep_00027E8D_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.rewardxp 90
With the mutants in disarray, some of their forces should be scattered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于变种人处于混乱状态，他们的一些力量应该被分散了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got an eye for strategy. If you manage to take them out, it might just buy us some time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你很有战略眼光。如果你能干掉他们，也许能给我们争取点时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([01006617]SCHPDialogue) The Bounty Of Mutiny EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCHPDialog_SCHPQuestAdvanc_000292BD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've marked their locations on your pipboy. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经在你的Pip-boy上标记了它们的位置。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([01006617]SCHPDialogue) The Bounty Of Mutiny EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCHPDialog_SCHPQuestAdvanc_000292BD_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.rewardxp 50
All in a day's work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 司空见惯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll see what I can do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我尽量想想办法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what I like to hear. If you manage to take them out, it might just buy us some time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这正是我想听到的。如果你能干掉他们，也许能给我们争取点时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([01006617]SCHPDialogue) The Bounty Of Mutiny EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCHPDialog_SCHPQuestAdvanc_000292C1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've marked their locations on your pipboy, good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经在你的pip-boy上标记了它们的位置。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([01006617]SCHPDialogue) The Bounty Of Mutiny EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCHPDialog_SCHPQuestAdvanc_000292C1_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I have to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我必须这么做的话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That'll have to do. If you manage to take them out, it might just buy us some time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就行了。如果你能干掉他们，也许能给我们争取点时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([01006617]SCHPDialogue) The Bounty Of Mutiny EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCHPDialog_SCHPQuestAdvanc_000292C3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've marked their locations on your pipboy. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经在你的Pip-boy上标记了它们的位置。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([01006617]SCHPDialogue) The Bounty Of Mutiny EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCHPDialog_SCHPQuestAdvanc_000292C3_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no idea who you're talking about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你在说谁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can make a poultice out of what we have here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以用我们这里的东西做一个药膏。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great. We could use that as a substitute. Be careful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我们可以用这个作为替代品。要小心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([01009981]SCHSQuest) As Easy As A Heart Transplant EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSQuest_SCHSQuestSurviva_0002E229_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.rewardxp 45
What happened to her?
ESP.TRADUIT: 她怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: She was out on a supply run and we can only assume she was ambushed. We found her lying next to two of her squadmates. Both dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她当时正在执行补给任务，我们只能假设她遭到了伏击。我们发现她躺在她的两个队友旁边，另外两人都死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([01009981]SCHSQuest) As Easy As A Heart Transplant EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSQuest_SCHSQuestWhatHap_0002E22B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're lucky that she's still here. The wound looks like it caused by one of those super sledges.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们很幸运，她还在。伤口看起来像是由那些超级动力锤造成的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([01009981]SCHSQuest) As Easy As A Heart Transplant EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSQuest_SCHSQuestWhatHap_0002E22B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could be convinced.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以确信。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All you mercs are disgusting. Take your damn money. One hundred and fifty caps, take it or leave it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们这些雇佣兵真恶心。拿着你的钱，一百五十瓶盖，要不要随你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([01009981]SCHSQuest) As Easy As A Heart Transplant EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSQuest_SCHSQuestBarter_0002E22D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.rewardxp 75
player.additem caps001 150
I'll fetch your damn absinthe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我去拿你那该死的苦艾酒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The faster you leave, the faster we can save her life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你走得越快，我们就能越快地救她的命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([01009981]SCHSQuest) As Easy As A Heart Transplant EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSQuest_SCHSItemsRude_0002E58C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm the high scribe. I'm a trained physician and a trained physicist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是一名高阶学士，我是个训练有素的医生和物理学家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C43E]SCHSGreeting) SCHSGreeting EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSGreeting_SCHSWho_0002E8EB_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some say I'm one the smartest people in the Brotherhood but I think they give me too much credit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人说我是兄弟会中最聪明的人之一，但我认为他们对我的评价太高了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C43E]SCHSGreeting) SCHSGreeting EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSGreeting_SCHSWho_0002E8EB_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about the Brotherhood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我说说兄弟会。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jesus Christ kid, do you want a history lesson? Go talk to one of the nerds. They'll help you out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上帝啊，孩子，你想听历史课吗？去找个书呆子聊聊，他们会帮助你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDia_SCElderBrotherh_0002E8ED_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和我说说你自己吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm the Elder of this chapter. I'm also the one who is giving you orders. That's just about all you need to know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是本分会的长老，也是给你下命令的人。这就是你需要知道的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDialogue_SCElderWho_0002E8EF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where are you from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从哪儿来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We ain't time for this shit. You have muties to kill. That needs to happen sooner rather than later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们没时间听这些废话了，你还有变种人要杀。这需要尽早，而不是迟早。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDia_SCElderWhere_0002E8F1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where did the mutants come from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 变种人是从哪里来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Outta the damn woodwork it seems. The sandstorm makes it hard to tell where exactly they came from. All that matters now is getting rid of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 似乎就是该死的突然蹦出来了，沙尘暴使人很难分辨它们到底来自哪里。现在最重要的是把它们赶走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDia_SCElderMutantsW_0002EFAD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you just use the tunnel to go back to the Mojave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不直接使用隧道回到莫哈维？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Under no circumstances can we retreat. We'd be betraying the Brotherhood code and I ain't no traitor. I don't think any of the troops are either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在任何情况下我们都不能后退，这样我们会背叛兄弟会的准则。而且我不是叛徒，我觉得部队里也没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDia_SCElderRetreat_0002EFAF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We will reacquire Sunstorm even if it kills us. You got that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算太阳风暴害死我们，我们也要夺回它。你明白我的意思吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDia_SCElderRetreat_0002EFAF_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't we just talk to the mutants?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们就不能和变种人谈谈吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You go try that kid. Come back and tell me what happens. They'll tear you limb from limb.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去试一下孩子，回来告诉我发生了什么。他们会把你撕成碎片。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDia_SCElderDiplomac_0002EFB1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you know Jameson?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么认识詹姆森的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That man is a war hero. He pulled me out from debris as we were getting swarmed by NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个人是个战争英雄。在我们被NCR包围的时候，他把我从废墟中拉了出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDia_SCElderJameson_0002EFB3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He must have killed fifteen of those bastards single handedly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他单凭一己之力就杀了十五个混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDia_SCElderJameson_0002EFB3_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why send out a distress signal in the first place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么一开始就发出求救信号？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We normally get a visit from Brotherhood central checking our progress. We had to warn em'.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通常兄弟会中央会来检查我们的进度，我们不得不警告他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDia_SCElderDistress_0002EFB5_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You keep mentioning Sunstorm. What is that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一直提到的 "太阳风暴"是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A power plant. You're from the Mojave, right? You heard of Helios One? Same company, Poseidon Energy. Well, we found something there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个发电厂。你来自莫哈韦，对吧？你听说过太阳神一号吗？同一家公司，海神能源公司。嗯，我们在那里发现了一些东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDialogue_SCElderPP_0002EFB7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that's none of your business. You should just think about doing the job you signed up for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这不关你的事。你应该只考虑做你报名参加的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDialogue_SCElderPP_0002EFB7_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really hate super mutants don't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的很讨厌超级变种人，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only good mutie is a dead mutie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有死了的变种人才是好变种人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Jackson [0100B096] (mod) Quest : ([0100B3DC]SCElderDialogue) SCElderDialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scElderVoiceType\SCElderDia_SCElderHateMuta_0002EFB9_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your problem with Elder Jackson?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对杰克逊长老有什么意见？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he wasn't so reckless, we wouldn't be in this mess. We're gonna be mutant food because of that bastard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他不那么鲁莽，我们也不会陷入这样的困境。因为那个混蛋，我们要变成变种人的食物了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scQuartermasterVoiceType\SCQM_SCQMJackson_000303F9_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.rewardxp 35
What's your problem with Elder Jackson?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对杰克逊长老有什么意见？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ain't got a problem. What makes you think that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有意见，你怎么会这样想？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scQuartermasterVoiceType\SCQM_SCQMJackson_000303FA_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your problem with Jackson, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对杰克逊有什么意见，嗯？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们谈谈其他事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever you need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要什么就说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Knight Mayes [01000B9B] (mod) Quest : ([01000BA0]SCQM) SCQuartermasterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scQuartermasterVoiceType\SCQM_SCQMLetsTalkAboutSome_000303FC_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It agreed to allow the Brotherhood look after the weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它同意让兄弟会看管这些武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Probably a good move. I still think that thing is dangerous. I'll be keeping my eye on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许是个好办法。我还是觉得那东西很危险，我会密切关注的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000314D3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jameson asked me to give you this. I'm guessing you'll be on your way?
ESP.TRADUIT: 詹姆森让我把这个给你。我猜你该走了吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000314D3_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem f 2000
It trusts the Brotherhood with the weapons. I hope it doesn't regret it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它把武器托付给兄弟会，我希望它不会后悔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll make sure those weapons never get used. Even if I need to kill that thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会确保那些武器永远不会被使用，即使我需要杀了那东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000314D4_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jameson asked me to give you this. I'm guessing you'll be on your way?
ESP.TRADUIT: 詹姆森让我把这个给你。我猜你该走了吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000314D4_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem f 2000
It trusts the Brotherhood with it weapons. Jackson can't be trusted. Keep an eye on him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它把武器托付给兄弟会。杰克逊不可信，盯着他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm his voice of reason. I'll keep him in check.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是他的理性之声，我会监督他的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000314D5_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jameson asked me to give you this. I'm guessing you'll be on your way?
ESP.TRADUIT: 詹姆森让我把这个给你。我猜你该走了吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000314D5_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem f 2000
It trusts the Brotherhood with its weapons. Stop that Jackson psycho if he tries something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它把武器托付给兄弟会。如果杰克逊那个疯子想做什么，就阻止他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm his voice of reason. I'll keep him in check.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是他的理性之声，我会监督他的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000314D6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jameson asked me to give you this. I'm guessing you'll be on your way?
ESP.TRADUIT: 詹姆森让我把这个给你。我猜你该走了吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000314D6_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem f 2000
I'm afraid so. It's been a journey, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕是这样。这是一段旅程，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn right! It's been a pleasure. Maybe we'll cross paths again. Until next time courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太对了！这是我的荣幸。也许我们会再次相遇，下次见，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000314D8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.MoveToMarkerWithFade SCEnd if (getobjectivedisplayed SCLastQuest 80 == 1) setobjectivecompleted SCLastQuest 80 1 endif if (getobjectivedisplayed SCLastQuest 90 == 1) setobjectivecompleted SCLastQuest 90 1 endif if (getobjectivedisplayed SCLastQuest 100 == 1) setobjectivecompleted SCLastQuest 100 1 endif if (getobjectivedisplayed SCLastQuest 110 == 1) setobjectivecompleted SCLastQuest 110 1 endif setobjectivedisplayed SCLastQuest 130 1 setstage SCLastQuest 130 SCTrain.lock 255
Didn't make a bad profit off this at all. If you have anymore jobs let me know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 根本没赚到多少钱。如果你还有工作，告诉我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All about the money, huh? We gotta make a living somehow. Maybe our paths will cross again. Let's hope we're on the same side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 都是为了钱，对吧？我们总得想办法谋生啊。也许我们会再次相遇，希望我们还能站在同一条战线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000314DA_1.wav

At least I've got my money. Can't wait to get the hell away from you assholes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少我的钱还在。我等不及要离开你们这些混蛋了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All about the money, huh? We gotta make a living somehow. Maybe our paths will cross again. Let's hope we're on the same side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 都是为了钱，对吧？我们总得想办法谋生啊。也许我们会再次相遇，希望我们还能站在同一条战线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000314DC_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.MoveToMarkerWithFade SCEnd if (getobjectivedisplayed SCLastQuest 80 == 1) setobjectivecompleted SCLastQuest 80 1 endif if (getobjectivedisplayed SCLastQuest 90 == 1) setobjectivecompleted SCLastQuest 90 1 endif if (getobjectivedisplayed SCLastQuest 100 == 1) setobjectivecompleted SCLastQuest 100 1 endif if (getobjectivedisplayed SCLastQuest 110 == 1) setobjectivecompleted SCLastQuest 110 1 endif setobjectivedisplayed SCLastQuest 130 1 setstage SCLastQuest 130 SCTrain.lock 255
I can't believe I agreed to this. I fucking hate this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真不敢相信我居然同意了，我真他妈讨厌这个地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Join the club, kid. A lot of the men feel a similar way. You're preaching to the choir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 加入组织吧，孩子。很多人都有类似的感觉，你这是在对唱诗班说教。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000314DE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe our paths will cross again. Let's hope we're on the same side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我们会再次相遇，希望我们还能站在同一条战线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000314DE_2.wav
