It was too dangerous. It had to be destroyed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它太危险了，它必须被摧毁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm inclined to agree. We'll keep this between you and me. As far as anyone is concerned, the muties destroyed it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我倾向于同意，这是你我之间的秘密。对其他人来说，变种人摧毁了它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000314E0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, Jameson asked me to give you this. I'm guessing you'll be on your way?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，詹姆森让我把这个交给你。我猜你该走了吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000314E0_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem f 2000
I destroyed it. We can't risk future generations getting a hold of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我销毁了，我们不能冒险让子孙后代得到它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm inclined to agree. We'll keep this between you and me. As far as anyone is concerned, the muties destroyed it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我倾向于同意，这是你我之间的秘密。对其他人来说，变种人摧毁了它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000314E2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, Jameson asked me to give you this. I'm guessing you'll be on your way?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，詹姆森让我把这个交给你。我猜你该走了吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000314E2_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem f 2000
I destroyed it. The Brotherhood can't be trusted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我摧毁了它，兄弟会不可信。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd normally disagree with you kid. But a weapon of that magnitude is a threat regardless of who babysits it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我通常不会同意你的观点，孩子。但这种程度的武器是一种威胁，无论谁看管它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000314E5_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll keep this between you and me. As far as anyone is concerned, the muties destroyed it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你我之间的秘密，对其他人来说，变种人摧毁了它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, Jameson asked me to give you this. I'm guessing you'll be on your way?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，詹姆森让我把这个交给你。我猜你该走了吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000314E5_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem f 2000
I destroyed it. I just didn't like that robot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我毁了它，我就是不喜欢那个机器人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's where we're in agreement. We'll keep this between you and me. As far as anyone is concerned, the muties destroyed it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我们意见一致的地方。这是你我之间的秘密，对其他人来说，变种人摧毁了它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000314E7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, Jameson asked me to give you this. I'm guessing you'll be on your way?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，詹姆森让我把这个交给你。我猜你该走了吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000314E7_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: My name is &PCName;. The Elder sent me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的名字叫 &PCName;。长老派我来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh did he? I'm gonna need a hand with a sensitive issue here. Can you help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，他吗？我需要有人帮我处理一个敏感问题。你能帮忙吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([01009981]SCHSQuest) As Easy As A Heart Transplant EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSQuest_SCHSQuestStart2_00031BA3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SCHSQuest.hasPlayerInteractedWithDarius to 1
I can't believe I need to deal with this shit. The Elder sent me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真不敢相信我要处理这些破事，是长老派我来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh did he? I'm gonna need a hand with a sensitive issue here. Can you help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，他吗？我需要有人帮我处理一个敏感问题。你能帮忙吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([01009981]SCHSQuest) As Easy As A Heart Transplant EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSQuest_SCHSQuestStart3_00031BA5_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SCHSQuest.hasPlayerInteractedWithDarius to 1
The Elder sent me. Now spit out what you want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 长老派我来的。现在吐出你想要的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh did he? I'm gonna need a hand with a sensitive issue here. Can you help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，他吗？我需要有人帮我处理一个敏感问题。你能帮忙吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([01009981]SCHSQuest) As Easy As A Heart Transplant EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSQuest_SCHSQuestStart4_00031BA7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SCHSQuest.hasPlayerInteractedWithDarius to 1
If I must.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我必须的话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's better than nothing. I have an injured soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总比没有好。我有个受伤的士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([01009981]SCHSQuest) As Easy As A Heart Transplant EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSQuest_SCHSQuestAgree3_00031BA9_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need a bottle of absinthe to help clean the wound. There's a liquor store in town according to one of our supply runners.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要一瓶苦艾酒来帮助清洗伤口。据我们的一个物资走私者说，城镇里有一家酒类商店。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([01009981]SCHSQuest) As Easy As A Heart Transplant EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSQuest_SCHSQuestAgree3_00031BA9_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He didn't come back. So be careful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他没有回来，所以要小心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([01009981]SCHSQuest) As Easy As A Heart Transplant EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSQuest_SCHSQuestAgree3_00031BA9_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivedisplayed SCHSQuest 10 1 setstage SCHSQuest 10 set SCElderDialogue.hasPlayerAcceptedHeadScribeQuest to 1
Where are you from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从哪儿来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm from California but spent most of my life in the Mojave. That's before I got transferred here. You got any more pointless questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来自加利福尼亚，但我的大部分时间是在莫哈韦度过的，那是在我被调到这里之前。你还有什么无意义的问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Scribe Darrius [010103C0] (mod) Quest : ([0100C43E]SCHSGreeting) SCHSGreeting EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHeadScribeVoiceType\SCHSGreeti_SCHSWhereYouFro_00031BAB_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where are you from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从哪儿来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm from Lost Hills, all the way back in California. I was only a boy when the NCR came knocking at our door. That sorta thing changes a man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来自失落山丘，一路来到加州。NCR来敲我们家门的时候我还是个小男孩，这种事情会改变一个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([01006617]SCHPDialogue) The Bounty Of Mutiny EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCHPDialog_SCHPWhereYouFro_00032C7E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think of Elder Jackson?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对杰克逊长老的看法如何？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a good man and he tries to do right by the rest of the chapter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个好人，他努力为分会的其他人做正确的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([01006617]SCHPDialogue) The Bounty Of Mutiny EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCHPDialog_SCHPElderJackso_00032C80_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But frankly, at times he's pig headed is all and needs to just slow down and think carefully. I try to help advise him when I can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但坦率地说，有时他就是个猪头。他需要慢下来仔细思考，我尽量给他提些建议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01002F21] (mod) Quest : ([01006617]SCHPDialogue) The Bounty Of Mutiny EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCHPDialog_SCHPElderJackso_00032C80_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you still fight? You're clearly beaten. Give up now and you can leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么还在战斗？你显然已经被打败了。现在放弃吧，你可以离开了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard of it all before, human. We won't leave here alive even if we surrender.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以前都听说过，人类。即使投降，我们也不能活着离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderS_00035952_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brotherhood will eviscerate every one of us out of mindless hatred. Our superiority as a species threatens their stagnant interests.
ESP.TRADUIT: 出于盲目的仇恨，兄弟会会把我们每一个人都开膛破肚。我们作为一个物种的优势威胁着他们停滞不前的利益。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderS_00035952_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you still fight? Submit to the Brotherhood and face justice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么还在战斗？向兄弟会投降，接受正义的审判。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you still fight? Surrender and I promise it won't be painful, much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么还在战斗？投降吧，我保证不会有什么痛苦，差不多。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you think the super mutant is superior?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你认为超级变种人更优越？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why, its quite simple. Mutants are the master race. The FEV research was conducted for the very reason of creating a super human, devoid of flaws.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么，这很简单，变种人是优等种族。进行FEV研究的目的就是创造一个没有瑕疵的超级人类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderS_00035CB8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Surviving radioactivity, immunity to disease and, as long as proper procedure is followed:
ESP.TRADUIT: 在放射性物质中存活，对疾病有免疫力，只要遵循适当的程序。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderS_00035CB8_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: FEV produces more intelligent and strong individuals, individuals who can survive this harsh world and not falling to the same mistakes of the past.
ESP.TRADUIT: FEV制造了更聪明、更强壮的个体，这些个体能够在这个残酷的世界中生存下来，而不会重蹈过去的覆辙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderS_00035CB8_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our traits far surpass human standards. But it is true the project was not perfect... Sterility being the biggest issue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的特质远远超过了人类的标准。但这个项目确实不完美...不育是最大的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderS_00035CB8_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But all problems can be fixed eventually- our scientists are on the verge of breakthrough: that is the drumbeat of progress at work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但所有的问题最终都能得到解决。我们的科学家正处于取得突破的边缘，这是工作中取得进展的鼓点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderS_00035CB8_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Solutions are made to improve every system. Evolution is inevitable and if you're smart, you'll realize this and see that the Unity is the future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 解决方案是为了改进每一个系统。进化是不可避免的，如果你聪明，你会意识到这一点，并看到同一就是未来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderS_00035CB8_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Master's plan clearly failed. How can the super mutant be superior?
ESP.TRADUIT: 主教的计划显然失败了。超级变种人怎么会更优越？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Believe what you will, Mutants are the master race. The FEV research was conducted for the very reason of creating a super human, devoid of flaws.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随你怎么想，变种人是优等种族。进行FEV研究的目的就是创造一个没有瑕疵的超级人类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderS_00036375_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Surviving radioactivity, immunity to disease and, as long as proper procedure is followed:
ESP.TRADUIT: 在放射性物质中存活，对疾病有免疫力，只要遵循适当的程序。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderS_00036375_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: FEV produces more intelligent and strong individuals, individuals who can survive this harsh world and not falling to the same mistakes of the past.
ESP.TRADUIT: FEV制造了更聪明、更强壮的个体，这些个体能够在这个残酷的世界中生存下来，而不会重蹈过去的覆辙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderS_00036375_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our traits far surpass human standards. But it is true the project was not perfect... Sterility being the biggest issue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的特质远远超过了人类的标准。但这个项目确实不完美...不育是最大的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderS_00036375_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But all problems can be fixed eventually- our scientists are on the verge of breakthrough: that is the drumbeat of progress at work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但所有的问题最终都能得到解决。我们的科学家正处于取得突破的边缘，这是工作中取得进展的鼓点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderS_00036375_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Solutions are made to improve every system. Evolution is inevitable and if you're smart, you'll realize this and see that the Unity is the future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 解决方案是为了改进每一个系统。进化是不可避免的，如果你聪明，你会意识到这一点，并看到同一就是未来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderS_00036375_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Clearly, your kind is not superior. We've killed every one of you bastards on our way up here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很明显，你们的种族并不优越。我们在来的路上把你们这些杂种都杀了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Believe what you will, Mutants are the master race. The FEV research was conducted for the very reason of creating a super human, devoid of flaws.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随你怎么想，变种人是优等种族。进行FEV研究的目的就是创造一个没有瑕疵的超级人类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderS_00036376_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Surviving radioactivity, immunity to disease and, as long as proper procedure is followed:
ESP.TRADUIT: 在放射性物质中存活，对疾病有免疫力，只要遵循适当的程序。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderS_00036376_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: FEV produces more intelligent and strong individuals, individuals who can survive this harsh world and not falling to the same mistakes of the past.
ESP.TRADUIT: FEV制造了更聪明、更强壮的个体，这些个体能够在这个残酷的世界中生存下来，而不会重蹈过去的覆辙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderS_00036376_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our traits far surpass human standards. But it is true the project was not perfect... Sterility being the biggest issue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的特质远远超过了人类的标准。但这个项目确实不完美...不育是最大的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderS_00036376_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But all problems can be fixed eventually- our scientists are on the verge of breakthrough: that is the drumbeat of progress at work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但所有的问题最终都能得到解决。我们的科学家正处于取得突破的边缘，这是工作中取得进展的鼓点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderS_00036376_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Solutions are made to improve every system. Evolution is inevitable and if you're smart, you'll realize this and see that the Unity is the future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 解决方案是为了改进每一个系统。进化是不可避免的，如果你聪明，你会意识到这一点，并看到同一就是未来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderS_00036376_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough of this. Time to die!
ESP.TRADUIT: 够了，该去死了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: So be it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderS_00036378_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player SetEnemy scSuperMutantLeaderFaction PlayerFaction 0 0
Why are you here in Storm City?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么来风暴城？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The humans have straddled us with guilt ever since our great Master fell- His plan had its flaws, indeed; but the dream itself was noble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自从我们伟大的主教倒下后，人类就一直用罪恶感来支配我们。他的计划确实有缺陷，但梦想本身是崇高的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if there existed a place where human bigotry did not apply? A place where the super mutant isn't blamed for all their village's problems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果存在一个人类的偏见不适用的地方呢？在那里，超级变种人不会因为他们村庄的所有问题而受到指责。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderW_00037783_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I, we, can make the super mutant the race they were originally envisioned to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我，我们，可以让超级变种人成为他们最初设想的种族。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderW_00037783_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you see our vision of Unity? You're smarter than you look. If what you say is true. Remove the invaders from this place immediately.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你看到了我们对同一的愿景？你比你看起来更聪明。如果你说的是真的，那么 马上把入侵者从这里赶走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderW_00037785_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those suits of armor will be their graves. You will be well rewarded for your service. I guarantee it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些盔甲将会是他们的坟墓。你的服务将得到丰厚的回报，我保证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderW_00037785_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage SCLastQuest 62 setobjectivecompleted SCLastQuest 60 1 setobjectivedisplayed SCLastQuest 62 1 SCDawnSMRouteREF.enable SCPaladinREF1.enable SCPaladinREF2.enable SCPaladinREF3.enable SCPaladinREF4.enable scMidFloorElevatorREF.lock 255
I can help... for a price.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以帮忙...但要付出代价。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is The Unity?
ESP.TRADUIT: 同一是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think of a world free of human squabbles. No conflict, no war. This goal will be difficult to achieve and not without sacrifice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想象一个没有人类争吵的世界，没有冲突，就没有战争。这一目标很难实现，而且必须做出牺牲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderU_00038BD0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But it is a world that is worth it. I will evolve the human race into something better, something stronger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这是一个值得的世界。我会让人类进化得更好，更强大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderU_00038BD0_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something that can survive in this harsh wasteland. It is for humanity's own good. I will create peace in our time, even if it kills me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 能在这片荒芜的废土上生存，这是为了人类自身的利益。我要在我们的时代创造和平，即使这会杀死我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderU_00038BD0_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, super mutants are sterile?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，超级变种人是不育的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: When was the last time you saw a mutant child? It is an unfortunate side effect of the FEV. One we are intent on finding the solution to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最后一次见到变种人儿童是什么时候？这是FEV的副作用，我们正致力于找到解决这个问题的办法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderS_00038BD2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is an issue we are close to solving. Our researchers have identified where the issue lies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个我们即将解决的问题，我们的研究人员已经发现了问题所在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderS_00038BD2_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: All that is left, is to finish the project. I will not let you and your Brotherhood thugs destroy progress.
ESP.TRADUIT: 剩下的就是完成这个项目了。我不会让你和你的兄弟会暴徒破坏进展。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderS_00038BD2_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Humans outnumber you. How would you survive an assault from say, the NCR?
ESP.TRADUIT: 人类比你们多，你怎么从NCR的攻击中幸存下来？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is a weapon of great power in this very buidling. Concealed in the basement. One which could bring even the great bear to heel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这座大楼里有一件威力巨大的武器，藏在地下室里，甚至能让大熊就范。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderD_00038BD4_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no intent on using it unless all other options are exhausted. Rather, the threat of such a weapon would be enough to keep aggressors away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有打算使用它，除非所有其他选择都用尽了。相反，这种武器的威胁足以让侵略者敬而远之。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderD_00038BD4_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once we have cleared the Brotherhood from this building. We will harness its power and it shall forever protect our mutant state.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等我们把兄弟会的人清出这栋楼，我们将利用它的力量。它会永远保护我们的变种人国家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderD_00038BD4_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR could use these weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR可以使用这些武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd entrust this power to an old world democracy. Look around you. The world is fucked because of that exact scenario.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会把这种权力托付给一个旧世界的民主国家。看看你的周围，世界就是因为这种场景才完蛋的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01039293] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000395F5_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've learned nothing... On behalf of all the boys that died. I'm gonna rip your fucking head off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你什么都没学到...我代表所有死去的弟兄们，我他妈的要把你的脑袋拧下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01039293] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000395F5_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player SCTrain.lock 255 player.addreputation RepNVBrotherhood 0 4
Caesar would love to see these weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯撒很想看到这些武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caesar's ideals wouldn't permit the use of this power. This kind of technology is for the weak in his eyes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯撒的理想不允许使用这种力量。在他眼中，这种科技是为弱者准备的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01039293] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000395F7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But he's always been a hypocrite. I can't take the chance. On behalf of all the boys who died today, I'm gonna rip your fucking head off!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他一直是个伪君子，我不能冒这个险。代表今天死去的所有兄弟，我他妈要把你的脑袋拧下来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01039293] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000395F7_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player SCTrain.lock 255 player.addreputation RepNVBrotherhood 0 4
Vegas could use these weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维加斯可以利用这些武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you've fallen back on deterrence theory. Take a look around you. Plentiful evidence that it doesn't work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你已经倒向了威慑理论。看看你周围吧，大量的证据表明它不起作用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01039293] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000395F9_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR will eventually create their own weapons. Same with Caesar. You'll be creating a cycle that can only be broken by mutual destruction.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR最终会制造他们自己的武器，凯撒也是如此。你会创造一个只有相互毁灭才能打破的循环。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01039293] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000395F9_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't take that chance. On behalf of all the boys that died. I'm going to rip your fucking head off!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能冒这个险。我代表所有死去的弟兄们，我他妈的要把你的脑袋拧下来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [01039293] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000395F9_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player SCTrain.lock 255 player.addreputation RepNVBrotherhood 0 4
No. On behalf of the mutants. I'm going to have to ask you to leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我代表变种人。我得请你离开了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You turned out to be like every other merc. You're a damn vulture. What did they offer you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你变成了和其他佣兵一样的人，你是个该死的秃鹫。他们给了你什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [010381AE] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000395FC_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It doesn't matter. A traitor is a traitor. On behalf of all the boys that died I'm going to rip your fucking head off!
ESP.TRADUIT: 无所谓，叛徒就是叛徒。我代表所有死去的弟兄们，我他妈的要把你的脑袋拧下来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [010381AE] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000395FC_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player SCTrain.lock 255 player.addreputation RepNVBrotherhood 0 4
No. I'm here to clear you guys out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我是来清理你们的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, what? Brothers! Defend yourselves!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，什么？兄弟们！保护你们自己！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [010381AE] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_000395FE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player SCTrain.lock 255 player.addreputation RepNVBrotherhood 0 4
I'm going to enjoy killing you bastards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我将会享受到杀死你们这些杂种的快乐。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, what? Brothers! Defend yourselves!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，什么？兄弟们！保护你们自己！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Dawn [010381AE] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scDawnVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCHPLastEncount_00039600_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player SCTrain.lock 255 player.addreputation RepNVBrotherhood 0 4
The Brotherhood are dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会已死。

ESP.ORIGINAL: With their leadership gone. They won't be able to hold our counter attack. All we have to do is sit here and wait.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随着他们的领导层的死亡，他们将无法守住我们的反攻。我们所要做的就是坐在这里等待。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderF_0003A044_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks to you; the super mutant has a place it can call home. A place where we can build a great future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多亏了你，超级变种人有了一个可以称之为家的地方，一个我们可以建立一个伟大未来的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderF_0003A044_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We can ascend humanity to new heights. Make it something greater. You will one day become a mutant, your mind willing to the possibility.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可以将人类提升到新的高度，变得更伟大。有一天你会变成一个变种人，你的头脑愿意接受这种可能性。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderF_0003A044_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Consider yourself an honorary mutant for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 暂时把自己当作一个荣誉变种人吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: However... there is potential in you becoming an agent of our interests, a human ally in the outside world. What do you say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而...你有可能成为我们利益的代理人，成为外部世界的人类盟友。你说呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderF_0003A044_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those bastards are dead. Now where's my reward?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些杂种已经死了，现在我的报酬在哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It'll come in due time. With the invaders killed. They won't be able to hold our counter attack. All we have to do is sit here and wait.
ESP.TRADUIT: 会在适当的时候。随着入侵者的被杀，他们将无法守住我们的反攻。我们所要做的就是坐在这里等待。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderF_0003A046_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks to you; the super mutant has a place it can call home. A place where we can build a great future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多亏了你，超级变种人有了一个可以称之为家的地方，一个我们可以建立一个伟大未来的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderF_0003A046_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We can ascend humanity to new heights. Make it something greater. You will one day become a mutant, your mind willing to the possibility.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可以将人类提升到新的高度，变得更伟大。有一天你会变成一个变种人，你的头脑愿意接受这种可能性。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderF_0003A046_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Consider yourself an honorary mutant for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 暂时把自己当作一个荣誉变种人吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderF_0003A046_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: However... there is potential in you becoming an agent of our interests, a human ally in the outside world. What do you say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而...你有可能成为我们利益的代理人，成为外部世界的人类盟友。你说呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderF_0003A046_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a good plan. I'll be your agent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个好计划，我做你的代理人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It will a pleasure working with you. Now, go to the Mojave and serve The Unity's interests. This reward will be the first of many.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴与你一起工作。现在，到莫哈维去，为同一的利益服务吧。这个奖励将是众多奖励中的第一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderG_0003A3A7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Together we will create a better world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们将共同创造一个更美好的世界。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderG_0003A3A7_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem Caps001 3000
player.MoveToMarkerWithFade SCEnd CompleteQuest SCLastQuest player.rewardxp 1000 SCTrain.lock 255 showmessage scEndingMessage scCrabbeRef.enable
Just give me my money. I'm out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把我的钱给我，我要离开这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. Here is the reward I promised. Whether you agree with The Unity or not does not matter. We will find a way to create a better future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧，这是我答应给你的报酬。你是否同意同一计划并不重要，我们会找到创造更美好未来的方法的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderG_0003A3A6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think that you will change your mind eventually. For now, you can leave and enjoy your petty riches. Until next time, human.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为你最终会改变主意的。现在，你可以离开，享受你的小财富。下次见，人类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderG_0003A3A6_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem Caps001 3000
player.MoveToMarkerWithFade SCEnd CompleteQuest SCLastQuest player.rewardxp 1000 SCTrain.lock 255 showmessage scEndingMessage scCrabbeRef.enable
I assume Poseidon Energy created you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想海神能源公司创造了你？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I really couldn't care who created you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的不在乎是谁创造了你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Master used psychic powers to stop conflict between super mutants. How are you going to do that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 主教用灵力阻止超级变种人之间的冲突。你打算怎么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: As I said, there will be sacrifice. Those who do not conform to the Unity are traitors, and will be dealt with accordingly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正如我所说，会有牺牲。那些不服从同一的人是叛徒，将得到相应的处理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderI_00040645_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: And even then,most mutants will realize that the Unity is the means of surviving for the future.There will be sacrifice as I've mentioned previously.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使如此，大多数变种人也会意识到，团结是未来生存的手段。正如我之前提到的，会有牺牲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderI_00040645_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those who do not conform to the Unity and oppose its ambitions will be swept away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凡是不服从同一，反对同一野心的人，都要被扫除。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderI_00040645_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if the Super Mutant race as a whole wishes to proliferate they will realize the Unity is the only way of ensuring that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而如果超级变种人种族作为一个整体希望繁殖，他们会意识到同一是确保这一点的唯一途径。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderI_00040645_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The therapy for curing sterility is only possible through us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有通过我们才能治愈不育症。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Leader [0100EDB8] (mod) Quest : ([0103594F]scMutantLeaderDialogue) 0103594F (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scMutantLeaderVoiceType\scMutantLe_scMutantLeaderI_00040645_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I've seen nightkin and super mutants of various generations squabble with each other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我见过不同世代的夜行族和超级变种人互相争吵。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁来着？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh me? I'm just one of the scribes. Usually one of the Paladins comes in here with busted power armour and I have to fix the damn thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢我吗？我只是其中一个学士。通常有个圣骑士带着破损的动力装甲进来我就得修理这该死的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_scScribeMcCannW_000418A5_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where would they be without us? We scribes are just fountains of knowledge aren't we? Speaking of which, what else can I help you with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有我们，他们将何去何从？我们学士就是知识的源泉，不是吗？说到这个，我还能帮你什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_scScribeMcCannW_000418A5_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You said you were in need of a runner?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说你需要一个跑腿的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah that's right! I'll try and get straight to the point as you've already done a lot for the Brotherhood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，没错！我尽量开门见山，因为你已经为兄弟会做了很多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_scScribeMcCannQ_000418A7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The long and short of it is that we picked up a strange signal being broadcast on what's typically a secure Brotherhood channel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 简而言之，我们接收到一个奇怪的信号在兄弟会的一个安全频道上播放。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_scScribeMcCannQ_000418A7_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We decrypted it and it was a three letter message. Do you know Morse code? Probably not, wasteland schools don't seem to teach anything useful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们解密了，是一条三个字母的信息。你知道摩斯电码吗？可能不知道，废土的学校似乎没有教任何有用的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_scScribeMcCannQ_000418A7_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, the message was S.O.S. which if you didn't know is typically used in the event of an emergency.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，这条信息是S.O.S，如果你没听说过的话，这通常是在紧急情况下求救使用的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_scScribeMcCannQ_000418A7_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Judging from the format of the message and the signal it's been broadcast on, we have reason to believe it's a Brotherhood distress signal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从信息的格式和播放的信号来看，我们有理由相信这是兄弟会的求救信号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_scScribeMcCannQ_000418A7_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could be someone's in danger. I've already sent Paladin Jameson up north to investigate. However, he could definitely use some help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能有人有危险。我已经派詹姆森圣骑士去北边调查了。不过，他肯定需要一些帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_scScribeMcCannQ_000418A7_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There'd be caps in it for you. So how about it then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 里面会有瓶盖给你的。那怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_scScribeMcCannQ_000418A7_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Paladin Jameson still needs help with that distress signal if you've changed your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你改变主意了，圣骑士詹姆森还需要帮忙处理求救信号吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_scScribeMcCannQ_00041DA3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me too. I've still gotta fix Ramos' spare set of T-51. I better get back to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也是。我还得修好拉莫斯的备用T-51，我还是回去工作吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_scScribeMcCannG_000418A9_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll head there when I can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一有空就去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. You've already done so much for us. You don't know how much this means to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你。你已经为我们做了很多了，你不知道这对我意味着多少。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_scScribeMcCannA_000418AD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll mark the location of the signal on your map. We managed to pinpoint the location of the transmitter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会在你的地图上标出信号的位置，我们设法精确定位了发射机的位置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_scScribeMcCannA_000418AD_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: One more thing, Jameson doesn't know you're coming so try and not scare the shit out him. He will probably just incinerate you if you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有一件事，詹姆森不知道你要去所以尽量别吓到他。如果你这么做，他可能会把你烧成灰烬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_scScribeMcCannA_000418AD_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage SCFirstQuest 10 setobjectivedisplayed SCFirstQuest 10 1 set SCFirstQuest.playerHasAcceptedQuest to 1 scTheDeterrentFirstDoorRef.unlock
Sorry, I'd rather not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我不愿意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well I suppose I can't force you to go. I'm sure Jameson will be fine but if you're ever in that area, I'd appreciate it if you checked in on him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我想我不能强迫你去。我相信詹姆森会没事的，但如果你去那个地区，我希望你能去看看他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_scScribeMcCannR_000418AE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have some questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有些问题要问。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. I'll answer what I can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我会尽我所能回答。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_scScribeMcCannQ_000418AF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no more questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有更多问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, so back to business. Can you go check on Jameson then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，言归正传。你能去看看詹姆森吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_scScribeMcCannN_000418B1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: scHarryForceGreetingFirstTime
Halt human! Judging from the lack of plasma being flung my way, I doubt you're with the Brotherhood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 站住人类！ 从你没有向我扔等离子体来看，我怀疑你是兄弟会的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryForceGre_00041D16_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suggest you turn back. This is super mutant territory and my brethren don't take too kindly to your kind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我建议你回头。这是超级变种人的地盘，我的兄弟们对你们不太友好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryForceGre_00041D16_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our "great" leader has spoken that we should shoot on sight. Don't worry, us three know he's a fraud.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们“伟大”的领袖说过，我们应该一见到人就开枪。别担心，我们三个都知道他是个骗子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryForceGre_00041D16_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll let you through if you insist but we can't guarantee your safety. I just thought I'd let you know. I'm tired of all the blood being spilled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你坚持，我们可以让你过去，但我们不能保证你的安全。我只是想让你知道，我受够了这些流血事件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryForceGre_00041D16_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: scHarryRef.RemoveScriptPackage scHarryDialogueForceDialoguePackage scHarryRef.evp
<Attack> Ah fuck! Another mutant!
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>啊操！又是个变种人！

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got another Brotherhood attack on our hands! Mutants, defend yourselves!
ESP.TRADUIT: 又有兄弟会袭击我们了！变种人，保护自己！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryFirstRea_00041D1F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: scHarryRef.startCombat Player scHarryGuardRef01.startCombat Player scHarryGuardRef02.startCombat Player
Thanks for the warning. But I need to get into the city.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你的警告，但我需要进城。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose it's your life. We won't stop you. You should really leave while you can. Nothing good can come from this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这就是你的生活，我们不会阻止你。但你应该趁还能走的时候离开，这个地方不会有什么好东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryFirstRea_00041D21_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The bones of the old world are best left undisturbed. Exactly why we're leaving here as soon as we have the supplies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 旧世界的遗骨最好保持原状。这就是为什么我们一拿到补给就离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryFirstRea_00041D21_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've tried to convince some of the other mutants who used to be under my command to leave with me but I've had no such luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我试着说服其他曾经听从我指挥的变种人跟我一起离开，但我没有那么幸运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryFirstRea_00041D21_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there anything else we can do for you or are you desperate to continue on this crusade of yours?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还能为你做什么吗，还是说你不顾一切地想继续你的远征？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryFirstRea_00041D21_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't need your warning. I can handle myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不需要你的警告。我能照顾好自己。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose it's your life. We won't stop you. You should really leave while you can. Nothing good can come from this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这就是你的生活，我们不会阻止你。但你应该趁还能走的时候离开，这个地方不会有什么好东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryFirstRea_00041D23_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The bones of the old world are best left undisturbed. Exactly why we're leaving here as soon as we have the supplies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 旧世界的遗骨最好保持原状。这就是为什么我们一拿到补给就离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryFirstRea_00041D23_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've tried to convince some of the other mutants who used to be under my command to leave with me but I've had no such luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我试着说服其他曾经听从我指挥的变种人跟我一起离开，但我没有那么幸运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryFirstRea_00041D23_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there anything else we can do for you or are you desperate to continue on this crusade of yours?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还能为你做什么吗，还是说你不顾一切地想继续你的远征？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryFirstRea_00041D23_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck. You're going to need it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你好运，你会需要它的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryGoodbye_00041D25_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you and the rest of the super mutants come here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你和其他的超级变种人要来这里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We were promised safety. That goes a long way in the Wasteland especially for our kind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们被许诺安全。这在废土上很有帮助，尤其是对我们这种人来说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryWhyAreMu_00041D27_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Life as a super mutant isn't easy. I can't speak for everyone but I personally bounced around a few human towns and all I've found is hatred.
ESP.TRADUIT: 超级变种人的生活并不容易。我不能代表所有人，但我个人辗转过几个人类城镇，发现的都是仇恨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryWhyAreMu_00041D27_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Truth is that people don't forget wars like the one we had. Mutants are looked upon with suspicion at the best of times.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实是，人们不会忘记我们经历过的战争。即使在最有利的情况下，变种人也会受到怀疑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryWhyAreMu_00041D27_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The worst of times? Well, I've taken my fair share of bullets from a varmint rifle. Tickles but I didn't appreciate the sentiment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最糟糕的时候？ 好吧，我也挨过猎枪的子弹。 挠痒痒，但我不喜欢这种感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryWhyAreMu_00041D27_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our leader promised to get us away from that but all I'm seeing is an upgrade in the weaponry that I'm being shot with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的领袖承诺让我们摆脱这种状况，但我所看到的只是用来射杀我们的武器升级了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryWhyAreMu_00041D27_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You talked about your leader before. Tell me about them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你之前说过你的领袖，给我讲讲。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He talks a big game. I think I remember his face from the war. Pretty sure he was one of the Master's Lieutenants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他只会夸夸其谈。我想我还记得他在战争中的样子，他肯定是主教的一个副手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryTellAbou_00041D29_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not the one that's in all those NCR history books. He's dead and buried alongside the vats, nothing survives that explosion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是NCR历史书里的那个。他已经死了，被埋在了大桶旁边，没有什么能在爆炸中幸存下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryTellAbou_00041D29_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our great leader is nothing but a loudmouth who makes false promises to tighten his grasp of power.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的伟大领袖只不过是一个满嘴大话的家伙，为了加强对权力的掌握而做出虚假的承诺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryTellAbou_00041D29_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: His guarantees of safety have been fruitless. Here we are in another war with humans which is why we're going to leave as soon as we're able.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他对安全的保证毫无效果，我们又陷入了一场与人类的战争，这就是为什么我们要尽快离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryTellAbou_00041D29_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We mutants must face the facts. The Master's dream is gone. There is no bringing it back. We must look to the future; not the past.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们变种人必须面对现实。主教的梦想破灭了，再也无法挽回了，我们必须展望未来，而不是过去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryTellAbou_00041D29_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, is there anything else I can help you with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么我能帮你的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryTellAbou_00041D29_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mentioned you tried to convince the others to leave. Maybe I can help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你提到你试图说服其他人离开。也许我能帮上忙？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I doubt they'd listen to you human. They've been brainwashed pretty thoroughly by our so-called leader.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怀疑他们不会听你的话，人类。他们已经被我们所谓的领袖彻底洗脑了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestSta_00041D2B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But ultimately they're loyal to whoever leads their squad so perhaps you'll have more success than I did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但归根结底，无论谁带领他们的队伍，他们都会忠于领袖，所以也许你会比我更成功。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestSta_00041D2B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell you what, you're more than welcome to give it a try. I'll radio ahead and tell Larry and the rest to expect you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉你吧，我非常欢迎你试一试。我会提前用无线电告诉拉利和其他人等着你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestSta_00041D2B_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You shouldn't be shot at anymore if you go into the city. However, I should definitely warn you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你进了城就不会再被枪击了。但是，我必须警告你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestSta_00041D2B_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: My super mutant brethren don't have a lot of patience for humans. So say your piece and leave as quickly as possible when you meet them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的超级变种兄弟们对人类可没多少耐心。所以，当你见到他们时，说出你的想法并尽快离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestSta_00041D2B_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you start shooting then that peace I managed to broker will be out of the window. So do be careful. Do you have any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你开始开枪，我努力促成的和平就会付之东流，所以一定要小心。你有什么问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestSta_00041D2B_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage scHarryPeacefulQuest 0 setobjectivedisplayed scHarryPeacefulQuest 0 1 setobjectivedisplayed scHarryPeacefulQuest 10 1 setobjectivedisplayed scHarryPeacefulQuest 20 1 SetEnemy PlayerFaction scKimMutantFaction 1 1 SetEnemy PlayerFaction scCalebSuperMutantFaction 1 1 SetEnemy PlayerFaction scLarrySuperMutantFaction 1 1
I have no more questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有更多问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. First you want to go and meet Caleb. Convincing him should be easy. All he cares about is what's in he and his squad's stomach.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常好。首先你要去见凯勒，说服他应该很容易，他只关心他和他的队员们的肚子里有什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestNoM_00041D32_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Larry on the other hand not so much. He's a big believer in what the leader has us fighting for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另一方面，拉利就不这么认为了。他坚信领军者让我们为之奋斗的目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestNoM_00041D32_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, he cares about the mutants under his command. Convincing him that this war is no good for anyone might do the trick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，他关心他指挥下的变种人。让他相信这场战争对任何人都没有好处可能会奏效。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestNoM_00041D32_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The final mutant I need you to talk to is Kim. The Brotherhood killed her companion and this war is all about revenge for her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你找的最后一个变种人是金。兄弟会杀了她的同伴，这场战争是为她复仇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestNoM_00041D32_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can somehow get them all to drop everything and come with me then we can all get out of here before anyone else gets hurt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能想办法让他们放下手头的事跟我一起走，那么我们就能在有人受伤之前离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestNoM_00041D32_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now if that's everything I'll let you go. Good luck, you'll need it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这就是全部，我就放你走。 祝你好运，你会需要它的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestNoM_00041D32_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Say I help you all leave, what will you all do next?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我帮你们离开，你们接下来会做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not sure. The priority is getting away from this warzone. I know Kim for certain has some farming knowledge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不确定，当务之急是离开这个战区。我知道金有一定的农业知识。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestQue_00041D34_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I remember she used to talk about her time as a Brahmin herder before you know...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我记得她曾经谈论过她作为婆罗门牧民的时光，在你知道之前...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestQue_00041D34_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Setting up a nice little farming town for mutants would be nice. Protect our own without attracting any attention.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为变种人建立一个漂亮的小农场是个不错的选择。保护我们自己，不要引起别人的注意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestQue_00041D34_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think that's me gathered everyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这就是我召集大家的原因。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, looks like you have. I'll make sure we've got everything before we make our journey and then we'll be off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，看起来是。在我们出发之前，我会确保一切都准备好了，然后我们就走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041D36_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you managed to get everyone. That was no easy feat. It's not very often you get a second chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你搞定了所有人。这可不是一件容易的事，你不太可能有第二次机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041D36_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for everything you've done. I really mean it. Perhaps there's hope for you humans after all. I suppose you're not all bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢你所做的一切，我说真的。也许你们人类还是有希望的，我想你们也不全是坏人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041D36_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to give you one last warning before we start making preparations. Don't go near the Sunstorm Powerplant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们开始准备之前，我想最后警告你一次。不要靠近太阳风暴动力装置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041D36_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The mutants there are more fanatical to The Leader than any of us and will not be open to a reasonable discussion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那里的变种人对领军者比我们任何人都狂热，他们不会接受合理的讨论。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041D36_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you do happen to go poking around that area, be sure to have your weapon handy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你碰巧要去那个地方，一定要准备好你的武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041D36_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now unless there's something else I believe that'll be all. Until next time human.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在除非有别的事，我想就这样了。下次见，人类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041D36_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted scHarryPeacefulQuest 30 1 setstage scHarryPeacefulQuest 40 rewardxp 200
I think I've gathered everyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我已经召集了所有人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, looks like you have. I'll make sure we've got everything before we make our journey and then we'll be off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，看起来是。在我们出发之前，我会确保一切都准备好了，然后我们就走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041DF0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sad to hear that Kim won't be joining us but I'm sure you did everything you could.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很遗憾金不能来，但我相信你已经尽力了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041DF0_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for everything you've done. I really mean it. Perhaps there's hope for you humans after all. I suppose you're not all bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢你所做的一切，我说真的。也许你们人类还是有希望的，我想你们也不全是坏人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041DF0_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to give you one last warning before we start making preparations. Don't go near the Sunstorm Powerplant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们开始准备之前，我想最后警告你一次。不要靠近太阳风暴动力装置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041DF0_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The mutants there are more fanatical to The Leader than any of us and will not be open to a reasonable discussion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那里的变种人对领军者比我们任何人都狂热，他们不会接受合理的讨论。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041DF0_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you do happen to go poking around that area, be sure to have your weapon handy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你碰巧要去那个地方，一定要准备好你的武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041DF0_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now unless there's something else I believe that'll be all. Until next time human.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在除非有别的事，我想就这样了。下次见，人类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041DF0_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted scHarryPeacefulQuest 30 1 setstage scHarryPeacefulQuest 40 rewardxp 200
I think I've gathered everyone I could. Kim couldn't make it though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我已经召集了所有人。但金没能来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, looks like you have. I'll make sure we've got everything before we make our journey and then we'll be off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，看起来是。在我们出发之前，我会确保一切都准备好了，然后我们就走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041DF1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sad to hear that Larry won't be joining us but I'm sure you did everything you could. He always was loyal to The Leader.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很遗憾拉利不能来，但我相信你已经尽力了。他一直忠于领军者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041DF1_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for everything you've done. I really mean it. Perhaps there's hope for you humans after all. I suppose you're not all bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢你所做的一切，我说真的。也许你们人类还是有希望的，我想你们也不全是坏人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041DF1_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to give you one last warning before we start making preparations. Don't go near the Sunstorm Powerplant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们开始准备之前，我想最后警告你一次。不要靠近太阳风暴动力装置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041DF1_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The mutants there are more fanatical to The Leader than any of us and will not be open to a reasonable discussion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那里的变种人对领军者比我们任何人都狂热，他们不会接受合理的讨论。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041DF1_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you do happen to go poking around that area, be sure to have your weapon handy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你碰巧要去那个地方，一定要准备好你的武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041DF1_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now unless there's something else I believe that'll be all. Until next time human.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在除非有别的事，我想就这样了。下次见，人类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041DF1_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted scHarryPeacefulQuest 30 1 setstage scHarryPeacefulQuest 40 rewardxp 200
I think I've gathered everyone I could. Larry couldn't make it though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我已经召集了所有人。但拉利没能来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, looks like you have. I'll make sure we've got everything before we make our journey and then we'll be off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，看起来是。在我们出发之前，我会确保一切都准备好了，然后我们就走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041DF2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sad to hear that Caleb won't be joining us but I'm sure you did everything you could. Probably was thinking too much about what was in his stomach.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很遗憾凯勒不能来，但我相信你已经尽力了。可能是他对肚子里的东西想得太多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041DF2_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for everything you've done. I really mean it. Perhaps there's hope for you humans after all. I suppose you're not all bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢你所做的一切，我说真的。也许你们人类还是有希望的，我想你们也不全是坏人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041DF2_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to give you one last warning before we start making preparations. Don't go near the Sunstorm Powerplant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们开始准备之前，我想最后警告你一次。不要靠近太阳风暴动力装置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041DF2_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted scHarryPeacefulQuest 30 1 setstage scHarryPeacefulQuest 40 rewardxp 200
I think I've gathered everyone I could. Caleb couldn't make it though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我已经召集了所有人。但凯勒没能来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's not an outcome I expected. Regardless, I'll make sure we've got everything before we make our journey and then we'll be off.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kim and Larry really could've contributed a lot but it seems The Leader's hooks were in too deep.
ESP.TRADUIT: 金和拉利本可以做出很大贡献，但似乎领军者的圈套太深了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041DF3_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for trying human. You've done a lot more than what the majority of your kind would be willing to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你的尝试，人类。你所做的比大多数人愿意做的要多得多。

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted scHarryPeacefulQuest 30 1 setstage scHarryPeacefulQuest 40 rewardxp 200
I think I've gathered everyone I could. Kim was the only one open to discussion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我已经召集了所有能召集的人。金是唯一愿意讨论的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Did you even try human? I should never have let you through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你尝试了吗人类？我就不该让你通过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041DF6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose that's not fair. We had to try something. In the end, we were only delaying the inevitable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得这不公平，我们必须试一试。最终，我们只是在拖延不可避免的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041DF6_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it wasn't you then it would have been the Brotherhood or eventually the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果不是你，那就会是兄弟会，或者最终是NCR。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041DF6_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're free to leave human, god knows I'll be doing the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以自由离开了，人类，天知道我也会这么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestCom_00041DF6_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted scHarryPeacefulQuest 30 1 setstage scHarryPeacefulQuest 40 rewardxp 200
I wasn't able to gather any of your friends. They were all hostile to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没能召集到你的朋友，他们都对我抱有敌意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're thinking of leaving, why would the other mutants listen to you about me being peaceful?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想离开，其他变种人怎么会听你说我是和平主义者？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The other mutants have a great deal of respect for me. I used to serve as a commander in the Master's army.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其他变种人都很尊重我，我曾经是主教军队的指挥官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestQue_00041D57_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: As much as I'd like to just put my feet up and live a relaxing life, sadly everyone here needed me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我很想放松一下，过一种轻松的生活，但不幸的是这里的每个人都需要我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestQue_00041D57_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, as you already know, me and the leader have had some disagreements to put it mildly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，正如你已经知道的，我和领袖有一些分歧，说得委婉点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestQue_00041D57_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Luckily, a lot of mutants still look up to me. I'll put in a good word for you don't worry. I'll tell them you're my messenger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幸运的是，还有很多变种人尊敬我。别担心，我会为你美言几句的。我会告诉他们你是我的信使。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestQue_00041D57_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They should at least hear you out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们至少应该听你说完。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Harry [01041D0E] (mod) Quest : ([01041D14]scHarryDialogue) Harry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHarryVoiceType\scHarryDia_scHarryQuestQue_00041D57_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to pick up some cargo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你去取些货物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure thing! I can fulfill all your liquour based desires! In fact, let me take that one back!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然了！我可以满足你所有的酒瘾！事实上，让我收回那句话！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beertron [01041D44] (mod) Quest : ([01041D49]scBeertronDialogue) Beertron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scBeertronVoiceType\scBeertron_scBeerTronCargo_00041D4C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please input the coordinates of the pick up and delivery locations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请输入取货和送货地点的坐标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beertron [01041D44] (mod) Quest : ([01041D49]scBeertronDialogue) Beertron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scBeertronVoiceType\scBeertron_scBeerTronCargo_00041D4C_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No problem! Remember and drink responsibly!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题！记住，要负责任地喝酒！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beertron [01041D44] (mod) Quest : ([01041D49]scBeertronDialogue) Beertron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scBeertronVoiceType\scBeertron_scBeerTronGoodb_00041D4E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is your purpose?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的目的是什么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a rather deep question when I am sober friend. That was a joke. I serve to carry, you the customer's purchase to your motor vehicle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我清醒的时候，这是个相当深奥的问题，朋友。 开个玩笑，我负责把客户买的东西搬运到你的车上。
