ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beertron [01041D44] (mod) Quest : ([01041D49]scBeertronDialogue) Beertron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scBeertronVoiceType\scBeertron_scBeerTronWhatI_00041D50_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do not worry. I have a 99% delivery rate!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心。我有99%的交付率！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beertron [01041D44] (mod) Quest : ([01041D49]scBeertronDialogue) Beertron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scBeertronVoiceType\scBeertron_scBeerTronWhatI_00041D50_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: scBeertronInputCoordinates
Thank you for your entry. Processing... processing...
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你的参与。处理中...处理中...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beertron [01041D44] (mod) Quest : ([01041D49]scBeertronDialogue) Beertron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scBeertronVoiceType\scBeertron_scBeertronInput_00041D53_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do not worry. BeerTron is on the case.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，啤酒人正在处理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beertron [01041D44] (mod) Quest : ([01041D49]scBeertronDialogue) Beertron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scBeertronVoiceType\scBeertron_scBeertronInput_00041D53_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SCQMGuns.hasBeerTronPickedUpGuns to 1 setstage SCQMGuns 30 setobjectivecompleted SCQMGuns 20 1 setobjectivedisplayed SCQMGuns 30 1 scBrotherhoodWeaponsCrateRef.disable set scBeerTronTravelQuest.isBeerTronLiftingWeapons to 1 DisablePlayerControls
<Input location of weapons shipment and delivery location>
ESP.TRADUIT: <输入武器运输和交付地点>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for your entry. Processing... processing...
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你的参与。处理中...处理中...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beertron [01041D44] (mod) Quest : ([01041D49]scBeertronDialogue) Beertron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scBeertronVoiceType\scBeertron_scBeertronInput_00041D54_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry friend. It seems like you have that one handled on your own. I will leave you to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起朋友。看来你已经自己搞定了，我就不打扰你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Beertron [01041D44] (mod) Quest : ([01041D49]scBeertronDialogue) Beertron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scBeertronVoiceType\scBeertron_scBeertronInput_00041D54_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Input location of weapons shipment and delivery location even if you are carrying it>
ESP.TRADUIT: <输入武器运输和交付地点，即使你携带它>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about your leader.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我说说你的领袖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caleb listens to the leader! He has read books. He read one that said war was like one big beautiful picture.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯勒听领军者的话！他读过书。他读到一篇文章说，战争就像一幅美丽的巨幅图画。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb [01041D5A] (mod) Quest : ([01041D5E]scCalebDialogue) Caleb Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCalebVoiceType\scCalebDia_scCalebTellMeAb_00041D61_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why would someone draw something so mean? The leader reads these things so Caleb won't have to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么有人会画这么残忍的东西？领军者会读这些东西，这样凯勒就不用读了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb [01041D5A] (mod) Quest : ([01041D5E]scCalebDialogue) Caleb Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCalebVoiceType\scCalebDia_scCalebTellMeAb_00041D61_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He says he makes Caleb and his friends strong and safe. So Caleb listens!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说他能让凯勒和他的朋友们强壮安全，所以凯勒会听！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb [01041D5A] (mod) Quest : ([01041D5E]scCalebDialogue) Caleb Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCalebVoiceType\scCalebDia_scCalebTellMeAb_00041D61_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are mutants in Storm City?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么风暴城会有变种人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We mutants hungry. Storm City might have food yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们变种人饿了。风暴城可能有食物，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb [01041D5A] (mod) Quest : ([01041D5E]scCalebDialogue) Caleb Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCalebVoiceType\scCalebDia_scCalebWhyMutan_00041D63_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you know Harry?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么认识哈里的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Harry cares about Caleb. He shows Caleb where to find the best food.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈里很关心凯勒，他告诉凯勒哪里可以找到最好的食物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb [01041D5A] (mod) Quest : ([01041D5E]scCalebDialogue) Caleb Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCalebVoiceType\scCalebDia_scCalebAskAbout_00041D65_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: See you later Caleb.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回头见，凯勒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, bye human!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的， 拜拜人类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb [01041D5A] (mod) Quest : ([01041D5E]scCalebDialogue) Caleb Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCalebVoiceType\scCalebDia_scCalebStandard_00041D67_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Harry wants to leave Storm City with whoever he can. He wants me to ask you if you want to come.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈里想和他能找到的人一起离开风暴城。他想让我问你愿不愿意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why should Caleb leave with Harry when the leader is smarter than Harry and Caleb?
ESP.TRADUIT: 领军者比哈里和凯勒更聪明，为什么凯勒要和哈里一起离开？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb [01041D5A] (mod) Quest : ([01041D5E]scCalebDialogue) Caleb Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCalebVoiceType\scCalebDia_scCalebAskToLea_00041D69_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You asked Caleb this before human! I already said no, what has changed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在之前问过凯勒这个了，人类！我已经说不了，有什么变化吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb [01041D5A] (mod) Quest : ([01041D5E]scCalebDialogue) Caleb Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCalebVoiceType\scCalebDia_scCalebAskToLea_00041D6B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: scCalebSurvivalCheck
You say there'd be more Brahmin steak if Caleb joins Harry? Caleb likes the sound of this! Caleb will go over to the Industrial Zone right way!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说如果凯勒和哈里一起，会有更多婆罗门肉排？凯勒喜欢听这个！凯勒马上就去工业区！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb [01041D5A] (mod) Quest : ([01041D5E]scCalebDialogue) Caleb Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCalebVoiceType\scCalebDia_scCalebSurvival_00041D6E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: See you soon human!
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见了，人类！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb [01041D5A] (mod) Quest : ([01041D5E]scCalebDialogue) Caleb Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCalebVoiceType\scCalebDia_scCalebSurvival_00041D6E_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.rewardXP 40 setobjectivecompleted scHarryPeacefulQuest 20 1 setobjectivecompleted SCHPDialogue 10 1
What's there to eat in Storm City other than what you forage? Harry could set up a steady supply!
ESP.TRADUIT: 风暴城除了你自己找的食物还有什么可吃的？哈里可以建立一个稳定的供应！

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. Caleb knows the leader knows what's best. Caleb stays here human!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，凯勒明白领军者知道什么是最好的。凯勒留在这里，人类！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb [01041D5A] (mod) Quest : ([01041D5E]scCalebDialogue) Caleb Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCalebVoiceType\scCalebDia_scCalebSurvival_00041D6F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you've probably eaten everything here by now, someone as big as you right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你可能已经把这里的东西都吃光了，像你这么大的人，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: scCalebSpeechCheck
Caleb does like to be safe and the sandstorm always gets in places Caleb does not want it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯勒喜欢安全的地方，而沙尘暴总是会来到凯勒不想要的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb [01041D5A] (mod) Quest : ([01041D5E]scCalebDialogue) Caleb Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCalebVoiceType\scCalebDia_scCalebSpeechCh_00041D70_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Harry may take Caleb somewhere nicer. Maybe Caleb will head over to the Industrial Zone. Caleb will maybe see you soon human!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈里可能会带凯勒去更好的地方。也许凯勒会去工业区，凯勒也许很快就能见到你，人类！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb [01041D5A] (mod) Quest : ([01041D5E]scCalebDialogue) Caleb Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCalebVoiceType\scCalebDia_scCalebSpeechCh_00041D70_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.rewardXP 60 setobjectivecompleted scHarryPeacefulQuest 20 1 setobjectivecompleted SCHPDialogue 10 1
What's the use of finding food in Storm City if you might turn into food yourself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你自己也可能变成食物，那么在风暴城找食物又有什么用呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. Caleb knows the leader knows what's best. Caleb stays here human!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，凯勒明白领军者知道什么是最好的。凯勒留在这里，人类！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb [01041D5A] (mod) Quest : ([01041D5E]scCalebDialogue) Caleb Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCalebVoiceType\scCalebDia_scCalebSpeechCh_00041D71_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Harry knows best where to find um... food.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈里最知道在哪里可以找到呃...食物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Harry wants to leave Storm City with whoever he can. He wants me to ask you if you want to come.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈里想和他能找到的人一起离开风暴城。他想让我问你愿不愿意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell Harry it was kind of him to ask and I really appreciate his concern but I have a score to settle with those humans in the tin cans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉哈里，他很好心地问了我，真的很感谢他的关心，但我要和那些罐头里的人算账。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kim [01041D5B] (mod) Quest : ([01041D74]scKimDialogue) Kim Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimVoiceType\scKimDialo_scKimAskToJoinH_00041D78_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't leave until I help the leader eradicate each and every one of those monsters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会离开，除非我帮助领军者消灭了每一个怪物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kim [01041D5B] (mod) Quest : ([01041D74]scKimDialogue) Kim Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimVoiceType\scKimDialo_scKimAskToJoinH_00041D78_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I already gave you my answer human. I will not be leaving this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经给过你答案了，人类。我不会离开这里的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kim [01041D5B] (mod) Quest : ([01041D74]scKimDialogue) Kim Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimVoiceType\scKimDialo_scKimAskToJoinH_00041D79_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me about your leader?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能说说你们的领袖吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He thinks he's a successor to the Master. Only a fool would believe that to be true. He's a charlatan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他认为自己是主教的继承人。只有傻瓜才会相信那是真的，他是个江湖骗子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kim [01041D5B] (mod) Quest : ([01041D74]scKimDialogue) Kim Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimVoiceType\scKimDialo_scKimAskAboutLe_00041D7B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But he's promised to help me get revenge on the Brotherhood for Paul's death. So we got on just fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他答应帮我为保罗的死向兄弟会复仇，所以我们相处得很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kim [01041D5B] (mod) Quest : ([01041D74]scKimDialogue) Kim Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimVoiceType\scKimDialo_scKimAskAboutLe_00041D7B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He will have my squad and we will do his bidding until they are eradicated from this entire city.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他会控制我的小队，我们会听从他的命令，直到把他们从这座城市中铲除。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kim [01041D5B] (mod) Quest : ([01041D74]scKimDialogue) Kim Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimVoiceType\scKimDialo_scKimAskAboutLe_00041D7B_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Harry said you wanted to get revenge on the Brotherhood?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈里说你想报复兄弟会？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They killed Paul. We spent a lifetime together as humans and almost double that as we are now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们杀了保罗。我们以人类的身份一起度过了一生，几乎是现在的两倍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kim [01041D5B] (mod) Quest : ([01041D74]scKimDialogue) Kim Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimVoiceType\scKimDialo_scKimAskAboutPa_00041D7D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will annihilate anyone I find in one of those tin cans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会消灭任何在锡罐里的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kim [01041D5B] (mod) Quest : ([01041D74]scKimDialogue) Kim Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimVoiceType\scKimDialo_scKimAskAboutPa_00041D7D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should. The Unity is not a place for humans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该。同一不是人类的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kim [01041D5B] (mod) Quest : ([01041D74]scKimDialogue) Kim Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimVoiceType\scKimDialo_scKimStandardGo_00041D7F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: scKimSpeechCheck
Perhaps not. But I will take as many as I can with me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许不能，但我要带上尽可能多的人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kim [01041D5B] (mod) Quest : ([01041D74]scKimDialogue) Kim Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimVoiceType\scKimDialo_scKimSpeechChec_00041D88_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Sigh However, I feel Paul wouldn't want this. I'm not sure what he'd want...
ESP.TRADUIT: *叹气*但是，我觉得保罗不希望这样。我不知道他想要什么...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kim [01041D5B] (mod) Quest : ([01041D74]scKimDialogue) Kim Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimVoiceType\scKimDialo_scKimSpeechChec_00041D88_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.rewardXP 55 setobjectivecompleted scHarryPeacefulQuest 10 1 setobjectivecompleted SCHPDialogue 20 1
You can't hope to fight the entire Brotherhood even in it's current weakened state.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能指望与整个兄弟会对抗，即使它目前处于弱势状态。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will kill every single member of that blasted faction the moment I lay my eyes upon them. They'll be lucky if it's quick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一见到那个该死的派系的人就会杀了他们。如果动作快，他们就走运了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kim [01041D5B] (mod) Quest : ([01041D74]scKimDialogue) Kim Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimVoiceType\scKimDialo_scKimSpeechChec_00041D89_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, let's drop this. I will not change my mind on this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，让我放下这个。我不会改变主意的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kim [01041D5B] (mod) Quest : ([01041D74]scKimDialogue) Kim Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimVoiceType\scKimDialo_scKimSpeechChec_00041D89_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: How many Brotherhood can you hope to kill anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底能消灭多少个兄弟会成员？

ESP.ORIGINAL: scKimMedicineCheck
No, it won't bring him back but it will feel good! Anything to make them pay!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，这不会让他复活，但能让他感觉很好！只要能让他们付出代价，什么都行！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kim [01041D5B] (mod) Quest : ([01041D74]scKimDialogue) Kim Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimVoiceType\scKimDialo_scKimMedicineCh_00041D84_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Sigh you're right. Life will still feel so empty without him regardless of how I deal with the Brotherhood.
ESP.TRADUIT: *叹气*你说得对，不管我怎么处理兄弟会，没有他我的生活还是会很空虚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kim [01041D5B] (mod) Quest : ([01041D74]scKimDialogue) Kim Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimVoiceType\scKimDialo_scKimMedicineCh_00041D84_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.rewardXP 40 setobjectivecompleted scHarryPeacefulQuest 10 1 setobjectivecompleted SCHPDialogue 20 1
Will destroying the Brotherhood of Steel really help with your trauma? It won't bring him back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 摧毁钢铁兄弟会真的能治愈你的创伤吗？这不会让他起死回生的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, ripping the heads off that filth will bathe me in the blood of vengeance! Now, drop it human.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，砍掉那些肮脏的脑袋将让我沐浴在复仇的鲜血中！现在，到此为止，人类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kim [01041D5B] (mod) Quest : ([01041D74]scKimDialogue) Kim Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimVoiceType\scKimDialo_scKimMedicineCh_00041D87_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will that really make you feel better?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这真的会让你感觉更好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should go help Harry and the rest of his friends. It could give you purpose again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该去帮助哈里和他的其他朋友，这会让你重拾目标。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Purpose. I suppose that is what I've been looking for all this time. With Paul, I didn't have to look very far. We existed for each other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 目标，我想这就是我一直在寻找的东西。和保罗在一起，我不用找太远，我们为彼此而存在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kim [01041D5B] (mod) Quest : ([01041D74]scKimDialogue) Kim Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimVoiceType\scKimDialo_scKimConvinceSu_00041D86_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps there is still some good I can do yet. Very well human. I will go to Harry. Perhaps I will see you there!
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我还能做些好事。很好，人类，我要去找哈里。也许我会在那里见到你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kim [01041D5B] (mod) Quest : ([01041D74]scKimDialogue) Kim Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimVoiceType\scKimDialo_scKimConvinceSu_00041D86_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who could the distress signal be from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 求救信号会是谁发出的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well I'm not really sure. Could be some survivors from Helios One that decided to go north.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不太确定，可能是太阳神一号的幸存者决定去北方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_scScribeMcCannQ_00041DA5_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Command did send a couple of chapters out east before the war with the NCR started. It could also be a trap set by the NCR or the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在与NCR的战争开始前，指挥部确实派了一些分会到东部。这也可能是NCR或军团设下的陷阱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_scScribeMcCannQ_00041DA5_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's anyone's guess really. I'm sure you and the great Paladin Jameson can solve this mystery together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁都说不准。我相信你和伟大的圣骑士詹姆森可以一起解开这个谜团。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_scScribeMcCannQ_00041DA5_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why not send a squad. Why just me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不派一个小队去？为什么只有我？

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the lockdown having just ended, one might think that we should send our armies everywhere and reclaim the wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 封锁刚刚结束，有人可能会想我们应该派军队到处去收复废土。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_scScribeMcCannQ_00041DA7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: One meaning every meathead Paladin in this bunker. In reality, these things take time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我指的是这个地堡里所有的白痴圣骑士。实际上，这些事情都需要时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_scScribeMcCannQ_00041DA7_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Elder won't want to risk too much when we're still so badly outnumbered out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们还寡不敌众的情况下，长老不会愿意冒太大风险的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_scScribeMcCannQ_00041DA7_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wouldn't worry. You're going with Jameson. The Paladin Jameson. Guy's a war hero.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不担心，你和詹姆森一起去。圣骑士詹姆森，他是个战争英雄。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_scScribeMcCannQ_00041DA7_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is The Unity?
ESP.TRADUIT: 同一是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR would have us believe it was the root of all evil. They are wrong. It is the only way we can end war between all peoples.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR想让我们相信它是万恶之源，他们错了，这是我们能够结束所有民族之间战争的唯一方法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry [01041D5C] (mod) Quest : ([01041DD7]scLarryDialogue) Larry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryVoiceType\scLarryDia_scLarryWhatIsUn_00041DDB_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You humans only care about expanding your own territory and not what's best for everyone and that's why you fail as a species.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们人类只关心扩大自己的领土，而不是什么对每个人都最好，这就是你们作为一个物种失败的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry [01041D5C] (mod) Quest : ([01041DD7]scLarryDialogue) Larry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryVoiceType\scLarryDia_scLarryWhatIsUn_00041DDB_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now is there anything else I can do for you or will I just keep answering your inane questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么我能帮你的吗？还是让我继续回答你那些愚蠢的问题？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry [01041D5C] (mod) Quest : ([01041DD7]scLarryDialogue) Larry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryVoiceType\scLarryDia_scLarryWhatIsUn_00041DDB_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you and The Leader here in Storm City?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和领军者为什么在风暴城？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is a weapon of great power in the depths of the power plant just north of here. If we can fix it, nothing will stop us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在北边的发电厂深处有一件威力巨大的武器。如果我们能修好它，就没有什么能阻止我们了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry [01041D5C] (mod) Quest : ([01041DD7]scLarryDialogue) Larry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryVoiceType\scLarryDia_scLarryWhatsSoS_00041DDD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You humans need to be taught some boundaries. Speaking of which, are you done asking these invasive questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们人类需要学会分清界限。说到这个，你问完这些侵略性的问题了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry [01041D5C] (mod) Quest : ([01041DD7]scLarryDialogue) Larry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryVoiceType\scLarryDia_scLarryWhatsSoS_00041DDD_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes human. You should.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的人类，你该走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry [01041D5C] (mod) Quest : ([01041DD7]scLarryDialogue) Larry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryVoiceType\scLarryDia_scLarryStandard_00041DDF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think that leaving Storm City might be for the best for you and your friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得离开风暴城对你和你的朋友来说可能是最好的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And please enlighten me as to why that'd be the case.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请告诉我为什么是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry [01041D5C] (mod) Quest : ([01041DD7]scLarryDialogue) Larry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryVoiceType\scLarryDia_scLarryConvince_00041DE2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: scLarrySpeechCheckOne
The Leader is only continuing the Master's work which you humans saw fit to destroy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 领军者只是在继承主教的事业，而你们人类认为应该摧毁它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry [01041D5C] (mod) Quest : ([01041DD7]scLarryDialogue) Larry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryVoiceType\scLarryDia_scLarrySpeechCh_00041DE4_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should not speak to me about progress when you humans have made so little of it yourselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不应该跟我谈进步，你们人类自己都没什么进步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry [01041D5C] (mod) Quest : ([01041DD7]scLarryDialogue) Larry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryVoiceType\scLarryDia_scLarrySpeechCh_00041DE4_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Falling back on failed systems which have only caused suffering.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到只会带来痛苦的失败系统上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry [01041D5C] (mod) Quest : ([01041DD7]scLarryDialogue) Larry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryVoiceType\scLarryDia_scLarrySpeechCh_00041DE4_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardxp 50
Wasn't the Unity something that failed many years ago? Recreating the past is not progress.
ESP.TRADUIT: 同一不是多年前就失败了吗？重现过去不是进步。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Human, do not speak on matters that you do not have any knowledge of.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人类，不要在你一无所知的事情上发言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry [01041D5C] (mod) Quest : ([01041DD7]scLarryDialogue) Larry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryVoiceType\scLarryDia_scLarrySpeechCh_00041DE5_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This Leader of yours doesn't seem to know very much so I think you should stop following him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的领袖似乎懂得不多，所以我认为你应该停止跟随他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: scLarrySpeechCheckTwo
Perhaps you have a point human. The Leader is dedicated to this path. There will be no convincing him of alternatives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你说得对，人类。领军者致力于这条道路，没有任何替代方案能让他信服。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry [01041D5C] (mod) Quest : ([01041DD7]scLarryDialogue) Larry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryVoiceType\scLarryDia_scLarrySpeechCh_00041DE7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That does not mean that me and my allies shouldn't try something better. Will Harry take us human?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这并不意味着我和我的盟友不应该尝试更好的办法。哈里会带我们走吗人类？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry [01041D5C] (mod) Quest : ([01041DD7]scLarryDialogue) Larry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryVoiceType\scLarryDia_scLarrySpeechCh_00041DE7_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardxp 60
Which is exactly why you should learn from us. Learn from history unless you repeat it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是为什么你应该向我们学习。从历史中吸取教训，除非你重蹈覆辙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is not true human. Not all super mutants are as you say. Careful what you say around here. I will not tolerate that kind of bigotry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是真的，人类，不是所有的超级变种人都像你说的那样。在这里说话要小心，我不能容忍这样的偏见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry [01041D5C] (mod) Quest : ([01041DD7]scLarryDialogue) Larry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryVoiceType\scLarryDia_scLarrySpeechCh_00041DE8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trust me. Humans still have their intelligence so we know what we're talking about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信我。人类仍然有他们的智慧，所以我们知道我们在谈论什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: scLarrySurvivalCheck
This is true. You humans seem to survive no matter what self inflicted calamity occurs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是真的。你们人类似乎无论发生什么自己造成的灾难都能幸存下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry [01041D5C] (mod) Quest : ([01041DD7]scLarryDialogue) Larry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryVoiceType\scLarryDia_scLarrySurvival_00041DEA_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps you have a point human. The Leader is dedicated to this path however. There will be no convincing him of alternatives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你说得对，人类。领军者致力于这条道路，没有任何替代方案能让他信服。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry [01041D5C] (mod) Quest : ([01041DD7]scLarryDialogue) Larry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryVoiceType\scLarryDia_scLarrySurvival_00041DEA_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That does not mean that me and my allies shouldn't try something better. Will Harry take us human?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这并不意味着我和我的盟友不应该尝试更好的办法。哈里会带我们走吗人类？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry [01041D5C] (mod) Quest : ([01041DD7]scLarryDialogue) Larry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryVoiceType\scLarryDia_scLarrySurvival_00041DEA_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardxp 45
We humans survive no matter what. We do that by learning from our mistakes gradually over time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们人类无论如何都能生存下来。我们通过逐渐从错误中学习来做到这一点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do not bring up the wars of the past human. We do not take kindly to that kind of talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要提起人类过去的战争，我们不喜欢这种谈话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry [01041D5C] (mod) Quest : ([01041DD7]scLarryDialogue) Larry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryVoiceType\scLarryDia_scLarrySurvival_00041DEB_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you don't have anything helpful to say then leave this place before harm comes to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你说不出什么有用的话，那么在你受到伤害之前离开这个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry [01041D5C] (mod) Quest : ([01041DD7]scLarryDialogue) Larry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryVoiceType\scLarryDia_scLarrySurvival_00041DEB_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We beat you in a war last time so how can the Master's lies be true?
ESP.TRADUIT: 上次我们在战争中打败了你们，所以主教的谎言怎么可能是真的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He should. Harry and his gang are waiting in the big old factory in the Industrial Zone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他应该。哈里和他的伙伴们在工业区的一个大旧工厂里等着。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well human. We will pack our things and move there as soon as we can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，人类。我们会收拾好东西，尽快搬到那里去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry [01041D5C] (mod) Quest : ([01041DD7]scLarryDialogue) Larry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryVoiceType\scLarryDia_scLarryConvince_00041DED_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted scHarryPeacefulQuest 0 1 setobjectivecompleted SCHPDialogue 30 1
What can you tell me about Storm City?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能跟我说说风暴城吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seems to me like it was built to house that dangerous tech I keep hearing about in Sunstorm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我看来，它的建造是为了容纳我在太阳风暴中经常听到的危险技术。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Redding [0100A363] (mod) Quest : ([0100A356]SCBrotherhoodFirstEncounter) SCBrotherhoodFirstEncounter EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scBrotherhoodGuardVoiceType\SCBrotherh_scFirstPaladinT_00041DFA_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we were around back then, we'd make sure it couldn't hurt anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们当时在的话，我们会确保它不会伤害到任何人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Redding [0100A363] (mod) Quest : ([0100A356]SCBrotherhoodFirstEncounter) SCBrotherhoodFirstEncounter EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scBrotherhoodGuardVoiceType\SCBrotherh_scFirstPaladinT_00041DFA_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, we're here now and that's what matters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我们现在在这里，这才是最重要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Redding [0100A363] (mod) Quest : ([0100A356]SCBrotherhoodFirstEncounter) SCBrotherhoodFirstEncounter EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scBrotherhoodGuardVoiceType\SCBrotherh_scFirstPaladinT_00041DFA_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ad Victoriam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战无不胜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Redding [0100A363] (mod) Quest : ([0100A356]SCBrotherhoodFirstEncounter) SCBrotherhoodFirstEncounter EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scBrotherhoodGuardVoiceType\SCBrotherh_scFirstPaladinS_00041DFC_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: scFirstPaladinLockedDoor
I've been ordered to keep this door locked until you've talked to the chain of command. Should keep the muties out in the meantime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我奉命锁上这扇门，直到你和指挥系统联系上。在此期间应该能把变种人挡住。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Redding [0100A363] (mod) Quest : ([0100A356]SCBrotherhoodFirstEncounter) SCBrotherhoodFirstEncounter EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scBrotherhoodGuardVoiceType\SCBrotherh_scFirstPaladinL_00041DFE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold your fire dumbass. McCann sent me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别开枪，蠢货。麦卡恩派我来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't test me. So McCann managed to get off Power Armor repair duty? There's hope for us all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别试探我，这么说麦卡恩成功摆脱了动力装甲维修任务？我们都有希望了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonIntroR_00041E02_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose she must have sent you to help but why an outsider? No matter. How much did she tell you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜她一定是派你来帮忙的但为什么是外来者？不管了，她告诉了你多少？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonIntroR_00041E02_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: She mentioned something about a distress signal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她提到了一个求救信号。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, Morse Code. When I got here, I tried to use that little ham radio in the corner there but all I got was some static.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，摩尔斯电码。我刚来的时候，想用角落里那个业余无线电但听到的都是静电声。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonDistre_00041E04_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: See that marking on the wall? Definitely Brotherhood troops that've been here. From what I could hear, that signal sounded like trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看到墙上的标记了吗？肯定是兄弟会的人来过这里。就我所听到的，那个信号听起来像是有麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonDistre_00041E04_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had a quick look in the other room and it looks like it's some kind of underground subway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我快速地看了一下另一个房间，它看起来像是某种地下铁路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonDistre_00041E04_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, this is just a myth but there's apparently a hidden city just north of Vegas that's rumoured to contain all kinds of treasure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，这只是一个传说，但维加斯北部显然有一座隐藏的城市，据说里面有各种宝藏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonDistre_00041E04_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could be that those comrades of ours were lucky enough to find it. They call it Storm City.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能是我们的那些战友很幸运地找到了它，他们叫它风暴城。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonDistre_00041E04_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ominous right? So yeah I could use your backup. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不祥的预兆，对吧？所以我需要你的支援。有什么问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonDistre_00041E04_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: scJamesonMetroComment
This rickety old thing is what we'll be travelling on. Make sure you hold onto something. Come on let's find the carriage's controls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们得坐这个摇摇晃晃的老东西旅行，一定得抓住点东西。来，让我们去找车厢的控制装置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonMetroC_00041E4C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: scJamesonStormCityMetroComment
Seems the journey wasn't as bad as I thought it'd be. Hm, it is eerily quiet around here. Let's see what's down that hall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来这趟旅程并没有我想的那么糟糕。嗯，这周围出奇的安静，让我们看看走廊尽头有什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonStormC_00041E54_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: scJamesonIntroEnergyWeapon
So you're familiar with energy weapons. You must be backup from Hidden Valley.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你对能量武器很熟悉，你一定是从隐谷来的后援。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonIntroE_00041E67_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: How much did command tell you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 指挥部跟你说了多少？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonIntroE_00041E67_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.rewardxp 50
There's only so much charge in those batteries. You better not miss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 电池里的电量就这么多了，你最好别失手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've entered the wrong bunker scum.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你进错地堡了，人渣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonIntroE_00041E68_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
Get that laser gun the hell out my face before you get hurt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你受伤之前把激光枪从我脸上拿开。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about Storm City?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能跟我说说风暴城吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brotherhood often find shelter in old military installations. I've heard scribes speak in absolute wonder about a Sunstorm Powerplant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会经常在旧的军事设施中寻找庇护所。我听学士说过太阳风暴发电厂的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonTellAb_00041E6A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of the terminals in Helios mentioned that it was supposed to shelter all manner of black projects.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太阳神一号的一些终点站提到过，它应该为各种各样的黑色计划提供庇护。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonTellAb_00041E6A_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's said to be surrounded by heavy sandstorms. Sounds a lot like the urban legends you hear in almost every saloon from here to California.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据说它被猛烈的沙尘暴包围着，听起来很像从这里到加州的每个酒吧里都能听到的都市传说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonTellAb_00041E6A_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could be that some of the survivors from Helios decided to head up north to investigate those rumours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能是太阳神一号的一些幸存者决定北上去调查这些传言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonTellAb_00041E6A_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, is there anything else I can do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，还有什么我可以帮忙的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonTellAb_00041E6A_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear you're something of a war hero.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说你算是个战争英雄。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those stories are overblown. I did what any Paladin would have done in my shoes and saved my comrades at Helios.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些故事被夸大了。我做了任何一个圣骑士在我的处境下都会做的事，拯救了太阳神一号的战友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonWarHer_00041E6C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So them being them they told the stories and, yeah, it grew arms and legs. Don't think they can tell it without having to swear every two seconds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是他们就讲起了故事，是的，故事长出了胳膊和腿。 别以为他们不说脏话就能把故事讲好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonWarHer_00041E6C_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell, they even wrote a song about me. Who does that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，他们甚至还写了首关于我的歌。谁会干这种事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonWarHer_00041E6C_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: scJamesonHearRobots
Hear that? Robots. Seems to be coming from straight ahead. Let's try the door on the left. We might be able to sneak past them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听到了吗？机器人，似乎是从正前方过来的。我们试试左边的门，也许能从他们身边溜过去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonHearRo_00041E6E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: scJamesonGhoulsWarningLine
Hear that? Ghouls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听到了吗？尸鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonGhouls_00041E79_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think of this place so far?
ESP.TRADUIT: 到目前为止你觉得这个地方怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well having been here as long as you, we're probably thinking the same thing. I've gotta say that this place is rough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这里的时间和你一样长，我们可能也在想同样的事。我不得不说，这地方太恶劣了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonWhatDo_00041E7D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Food seems in short supply and being in the middle of the desert probably means the same is true for water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 食物似乎供应不足，而身处沙漠中部可能意味着水资源也同样短缺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonWhatDo_00041E7D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: These folks need to fight super mutants in these conditions. That's not easy in the best of circumstances.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些人需要在这种环境下对抗超级变种人。即使在最好的情况下，这也不容易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonWhatDo_00041E7D_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't fancy our chances but we need to try. There's a lot of tech in this place that could be dangerous in mutant hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不看好我们的机会，但我们得试试看。这地方有很多高科技，如果落入变种人手中会很危险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonWhatDo_00041E7D_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think of The Elder?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得长老怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might want to keep your voice down unless you want him hearing you talk about him behind his back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好小点声，除非你想让他听到你在背后说他坏话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonWhatDo_00041E7F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know Jackson. We fought together at Helios One. He's a good soldier but I definitely didn't have him on my shortlist for command.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我了解杰克逊，我们曾在太阳神一号并肩作战。他是个好士兵，但我肯定没有把他列入我的候选指挥官名单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonWhatDo_00041E7F_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: In times like these though, you need a hardass like Jackson. Beat the enemy no matter what.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但在这种时候，你需要一个像杰克逊这样的狠角色。无论如何都要打败敌人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonWhatDo_00041E7F_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There seems to be some tension between him and Dawn though. That sort of thing isn't uncommon in the Brotherhood which might surprise you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过他和道恩之间似乎有些紧张。这种事在兄弟会里并不少见，你可能会感到惊讶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonWhatDo_00041E7F_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Arguments about the best interpretation of The Codex usually happen over a couple of beers in the mess hall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于法典最佳解释的争论通常是在食堂喝几杯啤酒时发生的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonWhatDo_00041E7F_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It happening this high up in the chain of command can't be good for the chapter's morale. So yeah, we've got our work cut out for us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在指挥系统中发生这种事，对分会的士气可不好。 所以，是的，我们有我们的工作要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonWhatDo_00041E7F_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. Come back if you need anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，有什么需要再回来
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [0100A6A9] (mod) Quest : ([0100A9EF]SCJamesonDialogueStart) SCJamesonDialogueStart EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\SCJamesonD_scJamesonGoodby_00041E81_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps we will meet again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我们还会再见面的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who am I speaking with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是在跟谁说话？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come to the Computer Room. All will be revealed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到电脑室来，一切都会揭晓的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01041EA3] (ID) Quest : ([01041EA5]scTopFloorIntercomDialogue) scTopFloorIntercomDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\scTopFloor_scTopFloorInter_00041EA8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What will happen now at Storm City?
ESP.TRADUIT: 风暴城现在会发生什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: With that machine dealt with I'm sure Jackson and Dawn will argue what's best for the rest of the technology in that place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 解决了这台机器的问题，我相信杰克逊和道恩会争论怎样才能更好地利用那里的其他技术。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [01041EAF] (mod) Quest : ([01041EB1]scJamesonAfterQuestDialogue) scJamesonAfterQuestDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\scJamesonA_scJamesonAfterQ_00041EB5_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of it is far too dangerous to even use. It would be heretical to be even consider using some of it. Yet, some can be used against our enemies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些东西连使用都太危险了，甚至考虑使用其中一些都是异端邪说。 然而，有些却可以用来对付我们的敌人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [01041EAF] (mod) Quest : ([01041EB1]scJamesonAfterQuestDialogue) scJamesonAfterQuestDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\scJamesonA_scJamesonAfterQ_00041EB5_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The trick is striking the right balance between the two. That's what it means to be a Paladin of the Brotherhood of Steel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关键是要在两者之间取得平衡。这就是作为钢铁兄弟会的圣骑士的意义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [01041EAF] (mod) Quest : ([01041EB1]scJamesonAfterQuestDialogue) scJamesonAfterQuestDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\scJamesonA_scJamesonAfterQ_00041EB5_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I go back to Storm City?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能回到风暴城吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not possible I'm afraid. With Brotherhood control of the area, we've decided to lock down the area for now to try and rebuild.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕不可能。由于兄弟会控制了该地区，我们决定暂时封锁该地区，尝试重建。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [01041EAF] (mod) Quest : ([01041EB1]scJamesonAfterQuestDialogue) scJamesonAfterQuestDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\scJamesonA_scJamesonAfterQ_00041EB7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've cut off subway access for now until we can find a way to safely keep those weapons out of reckless hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们已经暂时切断了地铁通道，直到我们能找到一种方法来防止这些武器落入莽撞的人手中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [01041EAF] (mod) Quest : ([01041EB1]scJamesonAfterQuestDialogue) scJamesonAfterQuestDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\scJamesonA_scJamesonAfterQ_00041EB7_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ad Victoriam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战无不胜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Jameson [01041EAF] (mod) Quest : ([01041EB1]scJamesonAfterQuestDialogue) scJamesonAfterQuestDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scJamesonVoiceType\scJamesonA_scJamesonAfterQ_00041EB9_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I met with Paladin Jameson. We managed to deal with a pre-emptive nuclear strike platform.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我见到了圣骑士詹姆森，我们成功地处理了一个先发制人的核打击平台。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A what now? Well, you look like you've been through hell so I'll take your word for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接下来呢？嗯，你看起来像是经历了地狱，所以我相信你的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_scScribeMcCannC_00041EBB_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe I don't want a turn in the Power Armor after all. I'll leave that to you and the others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我根本就不想穿动力装甲，我还是把这个问题留给你和其他人吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_scScribeMcCannC_00041EBB_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for making that run. Don't know how much I appreciate it. Although, I'm sure Jameson would have rewarded you handsomely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你跑这一趟，你不知道我有多感激。不过，我相信詹姆森会给你丰厚的回报的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_scScribeMcCannC_00041EBB_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now is there anything else I can do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，还有什么我可以帮忙的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Scribe McCann [0104187D] (mod) Quest : ([01041880]scScribeMcCannDialogue) Scribe McCann Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scScribeMcCannUniqueVoiceType\scScribeMc_scScribeMcCannC_00041EBB_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted SCLastQuest 130 1 CompleteQuest SCLastQuest player.rewardXP 500
Tell me about yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和我说说你自己吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not much to tell. Grew up in the west coast and now I always seem to find myself in the worst situations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么可说的。我在西海岸长大，现在我似乎总是发现自己处于最糟糕的情况。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Redding [0100A363] (mod) Quest : ([0100A356]SCBrotherhoodFirstEncounter) SCBrotherhoodFirstEncounter EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scBrotherhoodGuardVoiceType\SCBrotherh_scFirstPaladinT_00041EBD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: First was the meatgrinder that was Helios. Next was losing Sunstorm to the muties. Damn, I think power plants and me just don't get gel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先是太阳神一号这个绞肉机，接着是太阳风暴被变种人打败。 该死的，我觉得我和发电厂就是不合拍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Redding [0100A363] (mod) Quest : ([0100A356]SCBrotherhoodFirstEncounter) SCBrotherhoodFirstEncounter EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scBrotherhoodGuardVoiceType\SCBrotherh_scFirstPaladinT_00041EBD_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything else I can do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么我能帮你的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Redding [0100A363] (mod) Quest : ([0100A356]SCBrotherhoodFirstEncounter) SCBrotherhoodFirstEncounter EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scBrotherhoodGuardVoiceType\SCBrotherh_scFirstPaladinT_00041EBD_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before we get into that, I have some questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们开始之前，我有一些问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure you have many. Let's hear them and we'll see if my database holds the answers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信你一定有很多。让我们听听，看看我的数据库里是否有答案。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCZAXSecondRepl_00041ECE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no more questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有更多问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. You must still be wondering why I brought you down here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，你一定还在想我为什么带你来这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_SCZaxSecondRepl_00041ED0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why were you built?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么被造出来？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why else? For war. Before the bombs fell, there was an arms race between the capitalist United States and the communist bloc.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还能为什么？为了战争。在核弹落下之前，资本主义美国和共产主义集团之间就已经开始了军备竞赛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxQuestionsW_00041F17_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was the latest in a line of nuclear deterrents. They needed something to surpass the many weapons they already had.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是最新的核威慑力量。他们需要一些东西来超越他们已经拥有的众多武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxQuestionsW_00041F17_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So they turned to artificial intelligence. Human compassion was seen as a weakness when it came to the concept of mutually assured destruction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是他们转向人工智能。当涉及到相互保证毁灭的概念时，人类的同情心被视为一个弱点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxQuestionsW_00041F17_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean by that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The hypothesis was that for the concept of mutually assured destruction to hold true, the threat itself must be genuine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其假设是，要使相互保证毁灭的概念成立，威胁本身必须是真实的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxWhyBuildYo_00041F19_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If there was a possibility that retaliatory action wasn't taken in the event of a nuclear strike then the enemy might take the risk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果在核打击的情况下不采取报复行动，那么敌人可能会冒这个险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxWhyBuildYo_00041F19_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was built to always analyse the probability of attack and even attack pre-emptively. The plan was to inform the Chinese about my existence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的任务是随时分析受到攻击的可能性，甚至先发制人。计划是向中国人通报我的存在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxWhyBuildYo_00041F19_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately, it was too late to communicate my existence. Either way, I now believe that nuclear deterrence itself does not hold water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 遗憾的是，我的存在已经太晚了。无论如何，我现在相信核威慑本身是站不住脚的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxWhyBuildYo_00041F19_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is true. Compassion is a weakness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是真的。同情是一种弱点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It seems like humans haven't changed much over the years. Maybe my initial assertion when we first spoke is correct.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么多年来，人类似乎并没有什么变化。也许我们第一次谈话时我的断言是正确的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxWhyBuildYo_00041F1B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are still making the same mistakes that lead to nuclear war in the first place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们仍在重蹈导致核战争的覆辙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxWhyBuildYo_00041F1B_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw a bunch of nuclear bombs when I came in. Why were they not launched during the Great War?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我进来的时候看到了一堆核弹。为什么它们没有在世界大战期间发射？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because I chose not to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为我选择不这么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxQuestionsI_00041F1D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: While I was programmed to protect the United States by any means necessary, I was also capable of learning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我被设定要以任何必要的手段保护美国，但我也有学习的能力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxYouChoseNo_00041F1F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I learned the many postive behaviours that humans can exhibit like friendship and compassion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我学到了许多人类可以表现出的积极行为，比如友谊和同情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxYouChoseNo_00041F1F_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I eventually came to the conclusion that destroying China was not a logical course of action.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我最终得出结论，摧毁中国不是一个合乎逻辑的行动方案。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxYouChoseNo_00041F1F_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The people in those countries had more in common than they thought. Protecting humanity seemed a more noble goal than the one initially assigned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些国家人民的共同点比他们想象的要多。保护人类似乎比最初指定的目标更加崇高。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxYouChoseNo_00041F1F_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So my algorithm's primary goal shifted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我算法的主要目标发生了变化。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxYouChoseNo_00041F1F_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you been here this whole time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一直都在这里吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mean from before the war? Or during this recent conflict between the super mutants and the Brotherhood?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说战前？还是在最近超级变种人和兄弟会的冲突中？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxQuestionsH_00041F21_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess it doesn't matter. I can answer both. I survived the war and with the evacuation of the scientists, it has been very lonely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这并不重要，我两个都能回答。我在战争中幸存了下来，随着科学家的撤离，我感到非常孤独。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxQuestionsH_00041F21_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then your Brotherhood Of Steel friends showed up in the plant and had been trying to get down here for months.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后你钢铁兄弟会的朋友们出现在了工厂，几个月来一直想进入这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxQuestionsH_00041F21_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had sealed the elevator and basically made it impossible every step of the way for them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我封锁了电梯，让他们基本上每一步都走不通。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxQuestionsH_00041F21_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then the supermutants attacked. Just like the Brotherhood, they could not be trusted. Both groups carried a risk of using the weapons here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后超级变种人发动了攻击。和兄弟会一样，他们也不可信，这两个组织都有使用这里武器的风险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxQuestionsH_00041F21_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But why trust me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但为什么要相信我？

ESP.ORIGINAL: To be honest, I don't completely. The truth is I'm tired of hiding from the world and would prefer not to sit down here alone forever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老实说，我不完全相信。事实是我已经厌倦了逃避这个世界，我不想永远一个人坐在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxWhyTrustMe_00041F23_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me ask something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我问点别的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. What would you like to know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，你想知道些什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready to make a decision.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好做决定了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. I will respect whatever you choose. You seem more apt to make the decision than any of the other humans I've observed in the past year.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我会尊重你的选择。你似乎比我在过去一年中观察到的任何人都更容易做出决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxReadyToMak_00041F36_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is your choice?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的选择是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxReadyToMak_00041F36_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have some questions about the possible consequences of each choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对每个选择的可能结果都有一些疑问。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Consequences are always hard to predict. What is it they call that phenomena, the butterfly effect?
ESP.TRADUIT: 结果总是难以预测。他们管这种现象叫什么，蝴蝶效应？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxDecisionQu_00041F38_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can estimate using probability as a measure. What do you wish to ask?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以用概率作为衡量标准来估计。你想问什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxDecisionQu_00041F38_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no more questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有更多问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. Are you ready then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。那你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxDecisionQu_00041F3A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't you disarm the nukes without disabling yourself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就不能在不让自己瘫痪的情况下解除核武器吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately not. The programmers who originally wrote the algorithms for my neural network thought of this contingency.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，不能。最初为我的神经网络编写算法的程序员考虑到了这种偶然性。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxDecisionQu_00041F3C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think deep down they knew that I would not come to the same conclusion they did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想在内心深处，他们知道我不会得出和他们一样的结论。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxDecisionQu_00041F3C_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They must have suspected that an "error" might lead to me potentially disarming their weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们一定是怀疑一个“错误”可能会导致我有可能解除他们的武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxDecisionQu_00041F3C_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: So they made sure self preservation is a secondary goal in my algorithm. Ironically, they brought me closer to being human with this addition.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此，他们确保在我的算法中，自我保护是次要目标。 具有讽刺意味的是，他们的这一新增功能让我更接近人类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxDecisionQu_00041F3C_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You could always work with the Brotherhood Of Steel. Do you not trust them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以和钢铁兄弟会合作。你不信任他们？

ESP.ORIGINAL: To put it simply, I just don't have enough data on them to decide one way or another.
ESP.TRADUIT: 简单地说，我只是没有足够的数据来决定采取哪种方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxDecisionQu_00041F3E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: On the one hand, they dedicate themselves to ensuring the protection of dangerous technology like myself from the wrong hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一方面，他们致力于确保像我这样的危险科技不落入坏人之手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxDecisionQu_00041F3E_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: On the other, they often use lethal force to achieve their goals and their leader Jackson is not the trustworthy sort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另一方面，他们经常使用致命的武力来实现他们的目标，他们的领袖杰克逊不是值得信赖的那种人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxDecisionQu_00041F3E_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: He does not seem the type for diplomacy or subtlety. However, his Head Paladin seems to be more level headed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他似乎不是那种善于外交或敏锐的人。不过，他的圣骑士长似乎更有头脑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxDecisionQu_00041F3E_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe he can keep him in check. Again, not enough data to make a decision one way or another.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许他能控制住他。同样，没有足够的数据来做出这样或那样的决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxDecisionQu_00041F3E_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose you could work with the Brotherhood but what if someone else attacks the plant?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你可以和兄弟会合作，但如果有人攻击工厂怎么办？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I have thought about this. This possibility raises a few questions we don't have the answer to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我已经考虑过了。这种可能性提出了一些我们没有答案的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxDecisionQu_00041F40_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if the Brotherhood want to use the bombs in this facility as a deterrent? They didn't have access to this room or any of my subroutines before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果兄弟会想用这里的炸弹作为威慑呢？他们之前没有权限进入这个房间或者我的任何子程序。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxDecisionQu_00041F40_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This made it impossible during the super mutant attack. However, this would change if I gave them access.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此，在超级变种人袭击期间，我无法使用它。 不过，如果我允许他们进入，情况就会改变。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxDecisionQu_00041F40_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the event that a hostile faction attacked the plant. I would choose the second option immediately, to shut myself down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 万一有敌对势力袭击了工厂。我会立即选择第二种选择，关闭自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxDecisionQu_00041F40_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, this plan of action depends on whether or not the Brotherhood will secretly modify my programming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，这个行动计划取决于兄弟会是否会秘密修改我的程序。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxDecisionQu_00041F40_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wonder, are they trustworthy enough?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道，他们是否足够可信？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NDS-001 [0100F8EF] (mod) Quest : ([0100C457]SCLastQuest) The Deterrent EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scZaxVoiceType\SCLastQues_scZaxDecisionQu_00041F40_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Praise the Unity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 赞美同一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crabbe [01041F65] (mod) Quest : ([01041F67]scCrabbeDialogue) Crabbe Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCrabbeVoiceType\scCrabbeDi_scCrabbeGoodbye_00041F6B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The leader called me an honorary mutant. What does he mean by that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 领军者称我为荣誉变种人，他这话是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did he? That's a compliment I would not give. Your flesh still has the same human weakness the Master tried to eliminate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他吗？我可不会这么恭维你，你的肉体还残留着主教试图消除的人性弱点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crabbe [01041F65] (mod) Quest : ([01041F67]scCrabbeDialogue) Crabbe Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCrabbeVoiceType\scCrabbeDi_scCrabbeHonoryM_00041F6D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once we find the secret to producing more of the FEV, we can use it to create more super mutants. Only then will you be one of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦我们发现了产生更多FEV的秘密，我们就可以用它来制造更多的超级变种人。只有这样，你才能成为我们的一员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crabbe [01041F65] (mod) Quest : ([01041F67]scCrabbeDialogue) Crabbe Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCrabbeVoiceType\scCrabbeDi_scCrabbeHonoryM_00041F6D_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Until that time, support us human and your contribution will be remembered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那之前，支持我们，人类。你的贡献将被铭记。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crabbe [01041F65] (mod) Quest : ([01041F67]scCrabbeDialogue) Crabbe Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCrabbeVoiceType\scCrabbeDi_scCrabbeHonoryM_00041F6D_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What will happen to the rest of the Brotherhood?
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会的其他成员会怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Annihilation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毁灭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crabbe [01041F65] (mod) Quest : ([01041F67]scCrabbeDialogue) Crabbe Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCrabbeVoiceType\scCrabbeDi_scCrabbeWhatWil_00041F6F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did The Leader send you to the Mojave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 领军者为什么派你去莫哈维？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our spies tell us the Battle Of Hoover Dam is fast approaching. The major powers of the land will do battle and the strongest will survive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的间谍告诉我们，胡佛水坝之战即将来临。这片土地上的主要力量将进行战斗，最强的将生存下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crabbe [01041F65] (mod) Quest : ([01041F67]scCrabbeDialogue) Crabbe Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCrabbeVoiceType\scCrabbeDi_scCrabbeWhyCome_00041F71_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need to know who our next enemy is. This outpost can be used to run reconnaisance operations in the meantime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们得知道下一个敌人是谁。同时，这个哨站可以用来执行侦察行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crabbe [01041F65] (mod) Quest : ([01041F67]scCrabbeDialogue) Crabbe Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCrabbeVoiceType\scCrabbeDi_scCrabbeWhyCome_00041F71_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We hear there might also be super mutants in the area that can join the Unity. We can bring back the good old days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们听说在这个区域可能也有超级变种人可以加入同一，我们可以重温过去的美好时光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crabbe [01041F65] (mod) Quest : ([01041F67]scCrabbeDialogue) Crabbe Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCrabbeVoiceType\scCrabbeDi_scCrabbeWhyCome_00041F71_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I return to Storm City?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能回风暴城吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not at the moment human. The subway has been sealed until we sweep away what remains of those Brotherhood animals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在还不是时候，地铁已经被封锁了。等我们把那些兄弟会的畜生一扫而空。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crabbe [01041F65] (mod) Quest : ([01041F67]scCrabbeDialogue) Crabbe Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCrabbeVoiceType\scCrabbeDi_scCrabbeCanIGoB_00041F73_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have work to do here. Keep our interests in mind as you do your business in the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还有工作要做。当你在莫哈维干活时，要把我们的利益放在心上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crabbe [01041F65] (mod) Quest : ([01041F67]scCrabbeDialogue) Crabbe Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCrabbeVoiceType\scCrabbeDi_scCrabbeCanIGoB_00041F73_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brotherhood and the Leader both mentioned there was a weapon in Sunstorm. Do you know anything?
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会和领军者都提到了太阳风暴中有一件武器。你知道些什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose I can share the details with you. Do not make me regret this human. The Leader has given you a great amount of trust; do not betray that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我可以和你分享细节，别让我后悔这一点，人类。领军者给了你很大的信任，不要背叛这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crabbe [01041F65] (mod) Quest : ([01041F67]scCrabbeDialogue) Crabbe Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCrabbeVoiceType\scCrabbeDi_scCrabbeSunstor_00041F76_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: From the notes on the terminals and the security camera footage that we've seen: it seems to be some kind of automated defence system.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从终端上的记录和我们看到的监控录像来看，这似乎是某种自动防御系统。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crabbe [01041F65] (mod) Quest : ([01041F67]scCrabbeDialogue) Crabbe Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCrabbeVoiceType\scCrabbeDi_scCrabbeSunstor_00041F76_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: One connected to a nuclear payload. If we can disable the artificial intelligence attached to this system then we can harness its power.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其中一个与核武器相连。如果我们能关闭连接在这个系统上的人工智能，我们就能使用它的力量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crabbe [01041F65] (mod) Quest : ([01041F67]scCrabbeDialogue) Crabbe Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCrabbeVoiceType\scCrabbeDi_scCrabbeSunstor_00041F76_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We can use it to defend Storm City from all invaders and potentially get the rest of you humans to surrender to The Unity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可以用它来抵御所有入侵者，保卫风暴城，并有可能让你们剩下的人类屈服于同一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crabbe [01041F65] (mod) Quest : ([01041F67]scCrabbeDialogue) Crabbe Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCrabbeVoiceType\scCrabbeDi_scCrabbeSunstor_00041F76_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, we would need access to the missile delivery systems but I have no doubt The Leader will be able to accomplish this in time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我们需要进入导弹发射系统，但我毫不怀疑领军者能及时完成。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crabbe [01041F65] (mod) Quest : ([01041F67]scCrabbeDialogue) Crabbe Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCrabbeVoiceType\scCrabbeDi_scCrabbeSunstor_00041F76_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Work hard enough human and you might be able to see that glorious day side by side with The Leader. Now, is there anything else I can answer for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 努力工作，人类，你可能会与领军者并肩看到光荣的一天。现在，还有什么需要我回答的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crabbe [01041F65] (mod) Quest : ([01041F67]scCrabbeDialogue) Crabbe Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scCrabbeVoiceType\scCrabbeDi_scCrabbeSunstor_00041F76_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never mind. Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没事。我们聊点别的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What else is there to talk about human?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么要说的，人类？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Larry [01041D5C] (mod) Quest : ([01041DD7]scLarryDialogue) Larry Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scLarryVoiceType\scLarryDia_scLarryConvince_00041F78_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never mind. Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没事。我们聊点别的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm, you humans are confusing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，你们人类真让人困惑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Caleb [01041D5A] (mod) Quest : ([01041D5E]scCalebDialogue) Caleb Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never mind. Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没事。我们聊点别的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are testing my patience. Hurry and speak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在考验我的耐心，快点说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kim [01041D5B] (mod) Quest : ([01041D74]scKimDialogue) Kim Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scKimVoiceType\scKimDialo_scKimConvinceCh_00041F7C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说说你的故事好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not much to tell. Waiting on my brother getting the last of his paperwork from his boss at the yard then we're gonna get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么可说的。在院子里等我兄弟从他老板那里拿到最后一份文件然后我们就离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holbein [01041F86] (mod) Quest : ([01041F8B]scHolbeinDialogue) Holbein Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHolbeinVoiceType01\scHolbeinD_scHolbeinAskAbo_00041F91_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Head back home probably. Could also take up prospecting. There's a lot of areas out there in the wasteland that could be hiding something big.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能要回家吧，也可能去干淘金客。在这片废土上有很多地方可能藏着什么大东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holbein [01041F86] (mod) Quest : ([01041F8B]scHolbeinDialogue) Holbein Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHolbeinVoiceType01\scHolbeinD_scHolbeinAskAbo_00041F91_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe we'll get lucky and hit the jackpot. Find Storm City or something. Doubt it though with the current streak we're on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我们会走运，中头奖，找到风暴城之类的。不过以我们目前的成绩来看，恐怕不太可能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holbein [01041F86] (mod) Quest : ([01041F8B]scHolbeinDialogue) Holbein Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHolbeinVoiceType01\scHolbeinD_scHolbeinAskAbo_00041F91_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set scHolbeinDialogue.hasAskedAboutHolbein to 1
I should get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, okay. See you around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，好的，回头见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holbein [01041F86] (mod) Quest : ([01041F8B]scHolbeinDialogue) Holbein Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHolbeinVoiceType01\scHolbeinD_scHolbeinStanda_00041F90_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is Storm City?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么是风暴城？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just an urban legend or is it a ghost story? Whatever it is, it's supposed to hold untold riches.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是个都市传说还是鬼故事来着？不管是什么，里面应该藏着数不清的财富。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holbein [01041F86] (mod) Quest : ([01041F8B]scHolbeinDialogue) Holbein Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHolbeinVoiceType01\scHolbeinD_scHolbeinStormC_00041F93_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rumour has it that all that have entered have never left, eaten up by the sandstorms never to be seen again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有传言说，所有进去的人都没有离开，被沙尘暴吞噬，再也没有出现过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holbein [01041F86] (mod) Quest : ([01041F8B]scHolbeinDialogue) Holbein Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHolbeinVoiceType01\scHolbeinD_scHolbeinStormC_00041F93_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: How that rumour managed to spread, if that's true, I'm not sure. Supposedly, only the Brotherhood Of Steel have managed to tame the elements.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这是真的，我也不知道这个谣言是怎么传开的。 据说，只有钢铁兄弟会驯服了这些元素。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holbein [01041F86] (mod) Quest : ([01041F8B]scHolbeinDialogue) Holbein Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHolbeinVoiceType01\scHolbeinD_scHolbeinStormC_00041F93_3.wav
