ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck verifying that rumour because the Brotherhood haven't been seen in these parts since we kicked their asses at Helios One.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望你有好运能证实这个传言。因为自从我们在太阳神一号把兄弟会打得落花流水后，他们就再也没有出现过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holbein [01041F86] (mod) Quest : ([01041F8B]scHolbeinDialogue) Holbein Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHolbeinVoiceType01\scHolbeinD_scHolbeinStormC_00041F93_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Best just letting sleeping dogs lie if you ask me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要我说，最好还是别自找麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holbein [01041F86] (mod) Quest : ([01041F8B]scHolbeinDialogue) Holbein Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHolbeinVoiceType01\scHolbeinD_scHolbeinStormC_00041F93_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened at the Quarry?
ESP.TRADUIT: 采石场发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You haven't heard? With the prison breakout down near Primm, the convicts have been ransacking the area.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没听说吗？随着普瑞姆附近监狱发生的越狱事件，罪犯们一直在洗劫这一地区。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holbein [01041F86] (mod) Quest : ([01041F8B]scHolbeinDialogue) Holbein Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHolbeinVoiceType01\scHolbeinD_scHolbeinAskAbo_00041F96_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They've supposedly stolen all the dynamite at the quarry and NCR brass are saying deathclaws have moved into the area.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据说他们偷走了采石场的所有炸药，NCR的人说死亡爪已经进入了这片区域。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holbein [01041F86] (mod) Quest : ([01041F8B]scHolbeinDialogue) Holbein Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHolbeinVoiceType01\scHolbeinD_scHolbeinAskAbo_00041F96_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think it'll be a while before that gets sorted out. Fuck dealing with one of those monsters never mind a whole pack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想还需要一段时间才能解决这个问题。对付一个怪物就够操蛋的了，更别提对付一整群了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holbein [01041F86] (mod) Quest : ([01041F8B]scHolbeinDialogue) Holbein Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHolbeinVoiceType01\scHolbeinD_scHolbeinAskAbo_00041F96_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sadly, its left folks out of a job but I suppose that's just the way the cookie crumbles. Nothing to do but try our luck elsewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可悲的是，它让人们失去了工作，但我想这就是生活吧。除了去别的地方碰碰运气，别无他法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holbein [01041F86] (mod) Quest : ([01041F8B]scHolbeinDialogue) Holbein Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\TheDeterrent.esm\scHolbeinVoiceType01\scHolbeinD_scHolbeinAskAbo_00041F96_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: SCQuartermasterDialogue
The Bounty Of Mutiny
ESP.TRADUIT: 叛乱的赏金

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deal with the Super Mutant Sergeant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 消灭超级变种人军士。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deal with the Super Mutant Lieutenant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 消灭超级变种人副官。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deal with the Super Mutant Captain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 消灭超级变种人队长。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Head Paladin Dawn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回去找圣骑士长道恩

ESP.ORIGINAL: As Easy As A Heart Transplant
ESP.TRADUIT: 像心脏移植一样简单

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage SCMedicineSuccessful
Use your skills to heal the injured soldier or get a bottle of Absinthe for Head Scribe Darrius.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用你的技能来治疗受伤的士兵，或者为学士长达里厄斯搞到一瓶苦艾酒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have healed the soldier. Return to Darrius.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经治好了这个士兵，回去找达里厄斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have got the bottle of Absinthe. Return to Darrius so he can heal the patient.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经拿到了那瓶苦艾酒。回去找达里厄斯，让他为病人治病。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talk to the Elder and convince him to increase the deadline for Head Scribe Darrius.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和长老谈谈，说服他延长学士长达里厄斯的最后期限。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talk to Quartermaster Mayes and convince him to send Laser Rifles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟军需官梅耶斯谈谈，说服他送激光步枪来。

SCSergeant

SCElderDialogue
SCHSGreeting
The Deterrent
ESP.TRADUIT: 威慑

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go talk to Paladin Dawn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去和圣骑士道恩聊聊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Infiltrate the power plant by going through the caves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通过山洞潜入发电厂。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Clear the first floor of mutants. Then go outside and help the others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 清除第一层的变种人，然后到外面去帮助其他人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Help clear the courtyard, then talk to Paladin Dawn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮忙清理院子，然后跟圣骑士道恩谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make your way up to the top floor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一路射向顶层。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Confront the mutant leader.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对抗变种人的首领。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Check out the Computer Room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 查看电脑室。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Paladin Dawn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回去找圣骑士道恩。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Paladin Dawn
ESP.TRADUIT: 回去找圣骑士道恩。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Paladin Dawn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回去找圣骑士道恩。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Paladin Dawn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回去找圣骑士道恩。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You now have possesion of 300 nukes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在拥有300枚核弹了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Confront Head Paladin Dawn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对抗圣骑士长道恩。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Dawn and the Brotherhood Of Steel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死道恩和钢铁兄弟会。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to The Leader.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回去找领军者。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Search The Leader's corpse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 搜索领军者的尸体。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Scribe McCann.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回去找麦卡恩学士。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have You Ever Seen The Sand?
ESP.TRADUIT: 泽祖拉

setobjectivecompleted scfirstquest 10 1

Find Paladin Jameson at the last known location of the unknown signal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去普瑞姆的莫哈维快递检查你的邮件。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talk to Paladin Jameson when you are ready to travel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去会面地点。

ESP.TRADUIT: 当你准备好旅行时，与圣骑士詹姆森交谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Steel Be With You
ESP.TRADUIT: 钢铁与你同在

Help Head Paladin Dawn with his problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮助圣骑士长道恩解决他的问题。

ESP.TRADUIT: 帮助军需官梅耶斯解决他的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Help Head Scribe Darrius with his problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮助学士长达里厄斯解决他的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to the Elder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回去找长老。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We Need Guns, Lots Of Em'
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要枪，很多枪

setobjectivecompleted SCQMGuns 10 1 setobjectivedisplayed SCQMGuns 20 1
Search for the weapons cache.
ESP.TRADUIT: 搜索武器库。

ESP.TRADUIT: 把武器带回去给军需官。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scribe McCann Dialogue
Harry Dialogue
Beertron Dialogue
Quest Allowing BeerTron To Teleport To BoS
Come Go With Me
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我走

ESP.ORIGINAL: Convince Larry to join Harry's peaceful group of mutants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说服拉利加入哈里的和平变种人组织。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Convince Kim to join Harry's peaceful group of mutants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说服金加入哈里的和平变种人组织。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Convince Caleb to join Harry's peaceful group of mutants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说服克雷布加入哈里的和平变种人组织。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Harry and inform him of the news.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回去找哈里，告诉他这个消息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caleb Dialogue
Kim Dialogue
Kim Guard Generic Dialogue
Harry Guard Generic Dialogue
Caleb Super Mutant Guard Dialogue
Larry Dialogue
Larry Generic Guard Dialogue
scTopFloorIntercomDialogue
scJamesonAfterQuestDialogue
Crabbe Dialogue
Holbein Dialogue
The Storm City Brotherhood chapter is embroiled in a war with super mutants over the technology in the city.
ESP.TRADUIT: 风暴城兄弟会分会陷入了一场与超级变种人争夺城市技术的战争中。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Storm City was a hidden city originally envisioned to hold the elite and wealthy. As well as this, it was to be the "new Area 51". Dangerous experiments were conducted and new technology was developed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 风暴城是一个隐藏的城市，最初的设想是容纳精英和富人。除此以外，它还将成为 "新51区"。这里进行了危险的实验，开发了新技术。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The woman lies comatose on the bed. Someone with knowledge of medicine or healing powders could diagnose and come up with a remedy. What do you want to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那女人昏迷不醒地躺在床上。有医学知识或者治疗粉的人可以诊断并想出治疗方法。你想做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A Comatose Soldier
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个昏迷的士兵

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use your survival skills to create a remedy. (Survival 60)
ESP.TRADUIT: 使用你的生存技能创造一个补救措施(生存60)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Medicate to the best of your abilities. (Medicine 50)
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽你所能地用药治疗(医疗50)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the patient alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要打扰病人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Using your advanced knowledge of medicine, you manage to patch the soldier up with minimum issue during surgery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 利用你先进的医学知识，你设法在手术中以最小的问题为士兵包扎伤口。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You failed the procedure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的手术失败了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Using your advanced knowledge of healing powders. You create one which is able to disinfect the wound which allows Darius manage to patch the soldier up with minimum issue during surgery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通过你对治疗粉的先进知识，你创造了一个能够消毒伤口的装置。这样达吕斯就能在手术中以最小的问题修补士兵的伤口。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You fail to even make the concoction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你连调制都做不好。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
As a courier you've walked the wastes for a long time. You think it might be time for another routine job. I should check with Johnson Nash at the Mojave Express to see if he has any mail requesting a job for me.
[Recommended for late game Couriers 35+]
ESP.TRADUIT:
作为一名邮差，你已经在废土上行走了很长时间，你觉得是时候换一份日常工作了。我应该去问问莫哈维快递的约翰逊·纳什看他有没有找我工作的邮件。
[推荐给游戏后期的邮差，35级以上]

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Deterrent
ESP.TRADUIT: 威慑

ESP.ORIGINAL: Without Head Paladin Dawn, the Brotherhood of Steel chapter in Storm City disintegrates. They are forced to retreat. You now have access to over three hundred nukes which could be used to defend Vegas from its enemies. Good job dick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有了圣骑士长道恩，风暴城的钢铁兄弟会分会瓦解了，他们被迫撤退。你现在可以获得三百多枚核弹，这些核弹可以用来抵御拉斯维加斯的敌人。干得好，伙计。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Congratualtions
ESP.TRADUIT: 恭喜你

ESP.ORIGINAL: You managed to retake the Sunstorm Power Plant from the mutants. The Brotherhood of Steel will guard the dnagerous technology there with their lives ensuring it stays out of the wrong hands. You may have saved the world again...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你成功地从变种人手中夺回了太阳风暴发电厂，钢铁兄弟会将会用生命保护这些危险的技术确保它们不落入坏人之手。你可能又一次拯救了世界...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Congratulations
ESP.TRADUIT: 恭喜你

ESP.ORIGINAL: You destroyed NDS-001 forever ending the threat of another nuclear war. The Brotherhood of Steel secure the facility preventing any volatile tech getting into the wrong hands. You managed, with the help of Paladin Dawn and his men, to prevent a nuclear winter from ever happening again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你摧毁了NDS-001，永远结束了另一场核战争的威胁。钢铁兄弟会保护了设施，防止任何不稳定的技术落入坏人手中。在圣骑士道恩和他的手下的帮助下，你成功地阻止了核冬天的再次到来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Congratulations
ESP.TRADUIT: 恭喜你

ESP.ORIGINAL: The vending machine seems to be broken. After further inspection you realise it sold weapons and ammunition. This could be useful. It seems to be lacking a power source. The vending machines also seemed to be set up in a network. You'll need to reactivate both if these are to work again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自动售货机似乎已经坏了。经过进一步检查，你意识到它卖的是武器和弹药，这可能是有用的。它似乎缺少一个电源。这些自动售货机似乎也被设置在一个网络中，如果你想让它们再次工作，你需要重新激活它们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really are the paragon of virtue and justice. You managed to convince NDS-001 to disarm the nuclear warheads deep within the Sunstorm power plant. The world is safe from another nuclear catastrophe and it was all done with the minimum amount of lives lost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的是美德和正义的典范。你成功地说服了NDS-001，解除了太阳风暴发电厂深处的核弹头。世界免受另一场核灾难的影响，而这一切都以最少的生命损失完成了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Congratulations
ESP.TRADUIT: 恭喜你

ESP.ORIGINAL:
As you may be aware, this mod is a redux. I'd like to thank my original voice actors in the old version. Without you guys, this mod wouldn't exist:
Tyler Davis, Qenosa, VaultHuntersUnion, PsyenceOG, Sir Fritz, Scott Brown and Benjamin Tuttle
The old version is still available on the Nexus.
Special shoutout to the Frontier Team. Check it out when it comes out, it was nice to work with you guys on that project. Another special shoutout to the Project Brazil Team as well for keeping Fallout: New Vegas alive. Another shoutout goes to Cellblock Psycho, his constant mod releases have kept me personally playing and got me back into modding.
A shoutout to AlChestBreach is also in order. The New Vegas mod community is still alive due to his mod reviews; letting people know what mods are available each week.
Finally, a shoutout to all the New Vegas players. Again, thanks everyone for playing!
ESP.TRADUIT:
你可能知道，这个mod是一个重制版。我想感谢我在旧版中最初的配音演员，没有你们，这个mod就不会存在:
Tyler Davis, Qenosa, VaultHuntersUnion, PsyenceOG, Sir Fritz, Scott Brown和Benjamin Tuttle
Nexus上仍然可以使用旧版本。
特别向前沿团队致敬，当它出来的时候，请看看它，很高兴在这个项目上与你们合作。另外还要特别感谢巴西项目组，他们让《辐射：新维加斯》得以延续。还有Cellblock Psycho，他不断发布的mod让我能够继续玩游戏并重新回到mod制作中。
同时也要向AlChestBreach致敬。由于他的mod评论，新维加斯mod社区仍然活跃，让人们知道每周有哪些mod可用。
最后，让我们为新维加斯的玩家们欢呼。再次感谢大家的参与！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for playing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢游玩

ESP.ORIGINAL: Next to the bodies of two Brotherhood Of Steel Paladins lies the weapon crate that Quartermaster Mayes mentioned. You try to lift the crate but realise that it would require a person of tremendous strength to carry all of these weapons back. Perhaps a robot with the appropriate load handling mechanisms would be capable of the same thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在两个钢铁兄弟会圣骑士的尸体旁边放着军需官梅耶斯提到的武器箱。你试着抬起箱子，但你意识到要把所有这些武器搬回去需要一个非常强壮的人。也许一个拥有适当负载处理机制的机器人能够完成同样的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heavy Weapons Crate
ESP.TRADUIT: 重型武器箱

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try and lift the crate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 试着把箱子抬起来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try and lift the crate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 试着把箱子抬起来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the crate alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管箱子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You try to lift the crate but it is so heavy that you need to drop it. You're lucky you did not crush your toes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想抬起箱子，但它太重了，你不得不把它放下。算你走运，没把脚趾压伤。

ESP.ORIGINAL: OK.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You lift the crate with all your might and put it alongside the rest of your inventory. It should be good to return to Quartermaster Mayes now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你用尽全力抬起箱子，把它和其他库存物品放在一起。现在该回去找军需官梅耶斯了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: OK.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The woman lies comatose on the bed. Someone with knowledge of medicine or healing powders could diagnose and come up with a remedy. I should talk to the Head Scribe like the Elder suggested first before attempting anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那女人昏迷不醒地躺在床上，有医学知识或治疗粉的人可以诊断并提出补救措施。在尝试任何事情之前，我应该先像长老建议的那样和首席学士谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A Comatose Soldier
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个昏迷的士兵

ESP.TRADUIT: 威慑
